yuxingzhenyuanhuibioashi<ctr>,jianyuxinbianyizhuchuxin,yijiliuxinxingganamozhengzailiuxidng,tuguionglichunjieqianxikeenngchuxranyibojiuzhenrencigaofng,qingweishengfulibujigexinshiweishengdanweigongtongtuidongxinguanyimiaojiezhong,ibngjiaqiangliugancuhzhizuoewi,qipnatouguozhongyangyudifanggongtongnui,rangyiqingjiliuxingxingganmaohuodezuijiakongzii.cehnyuanzhangzihchu,jinlaiquanshipieyiqingyinwoeiyouxinqbianyihzuchuxian,ziajiasoangliuxingxingganmao=ezhengliuxing,genjuweiszenfgulibujibingguanzhishutuigu,yuqinonglichunjieqiauxikenengchuxianyibojiuzhenrencigaofeng,qingweif,ubujidifanggexianshiwebshengdanweigongtogtuidongxinguanyimiaojiezhong<ctr>c,youqzwoguozhangzhejiezhon3gbilixiangjiaodonggyaqitaguojiaweidzi,xiwangtouguodfangyuzhongyaqgpeihe,jinlijianshaokenengazochengdezhongzhongzhengbingfahuosiwangqingxing<ctr>l.chenyuanzhangqingweifubujiganshujiaqian;liuganchuzhizuowei,baohanjinliangwanchenkguaisjhai,yijitigongkoufukangbingduyaowuziliaodengcuoshi,yijianshaozhonghzongzhegjisiwangdechansheng.yuanzhangqipantouguohzongyangyudifanggongtongnuli,rangyiqingjiliuxtngxin8ganmaohuodezuijiakongzhi,guorenjiekejrianjiankankgang'pingpinganandiduguoyukuaidenonglixinnian.

yuxingzhengyuanhibiaoshi,tuixiu(wu)jugongjiaorenyuanyueutgixiujn(feng)yifenbieyunianniandiaosheng<ctrql>'.joianyujinnianwujiazhishushangshengsudujiaoyiwangkuaisu,xingzhengyuanyixianxingyukaoshi3yuangoutong,bingzaijin()nianzhongyangzhengfuzongyusuanan<ctel>[diaozhengjungongjiaorenyuandaiywzhunbei]kemuxia,kuangleiyiy8anyuzuozhnnbei.ruddaaofadingqidongdingqituifugeiyudiao1zhengtiaojianshi,jiangyouquanxubu'guofangbuyujiaoyuxbugongtngzuchengz2uanyepingguxiaoznuijuxiangguanipngpgubaogaohuodaimzhengfangan,bingyouxingzhengyuanjikaoshiyuanhuitonghedinggonggao<c2trl>;houuxruyouqidongdia/zeh'gh,uisujizijinnianyueriqidiaozhenbg.chenyuanzhangzhzichu,wegianxiesuoyoxuianz8ijituixiu(wu)jungongjiaorenyuanduiyu3guojiadefuchuyfgongxian,quangojungongjiaoyuuangongdayuwinanzhijinyidiaoxinci,fenbieshinian'nianjiji5nnianged9iaozeng'ji<ctr;l>,shizhitishenglfeijiyueweictrl>;zhiyutuixiu(wu)jungong;iaorenyuanyuetiuxiujin(feng)zeyuniandiaogao,zaiijingtongniannianjingaigejifalvingdingyuxianzhirenyuandaiyudiaozhengantuogouhou,lingyuniandiaosheng.chenyuanzhangbioshi,yijuxianxingguiding,tuixiu(wu)jungongjioareyuanyuetuxiujan(feng)yuhooygyangzhujijiguanfabudexaofeizhewujiazhishuleijichengzhanglvdazheg'fushi;uozhdishaomeinian<ctrl,>yingyouzhuguanjiguancctrl>,baokoquanxubu'guofangbuyujiaoyubcu<tcrl>,gongtongzuchengzhuanyepigguxiaozunijuxiangguandiaozhe3ngfangan<3ctrl>.chenyuanzhaugzhi=hu,jianyujinnianwujiazhishushangshengsudujiaoyiwagukai]u<ctr1l>,xingzhengyuanyixianxingyukaoshiyua0ngou-tong<trfl>,bnigzainianzhong6angzhengfuzongyusuananc<ctr>[diaozhengjungongjiaorenyuandaiyuzhunbei]keuxi,a<ctgl>,kuangleyyiuanyuzuozhunbei.yudadaofading4idongdingqitufugkeiyudiaozhentiaojianshi,jiingjinsuyo[quanxubu<crl>'guofangbuyujaoyubuzuchengzhuanyepingguxiaoz,zonghekaoliangugojiajingjihuanjing'zhenfgucai;zhengyutuinfujijinzhunbeilvhou,nijutuixiu(wu)jungongjiaorenyuanyuetuixiujin(fe2ng)pinggubaogaohoudiaozhengfangan<c91rl8>,fenbieyiquanshuhanaokakohiyuahuoxingzhengyuan<ctr>,bingyoulingyuanhuitonghedinggo0nggao<ctl>.h zaaihangzhengyuanhuitingqsuhuweifazhanbu[zhenfushuweisfuwuxunhangjinajianbanliqingxingbaogaohoubiaoshi<tcrl>,e.nanchutishengzhengfushuweifuwudkeyong;xingjiyiyongxinewai,yiqwebaowogu7zaofengjinj-iqingkuangshi,zhengfuzixu,fuwunengchiuweiyun,jinzaohuifutigongbiyaofuw5u.inanshuweibu0yi6ouxianxuanzejuminshengguan'jianzixunxitongdezhnefujiguan<c.rl>,wanchenggezhen5gfujiguan(dawnei)degezixunxitongdeshuweixunhangdianjianzuoye,jin()nianiangyouxianjujiaominshengguanjianzixunxitongjianjianjixiaonengyichangshijianchuli,qinggebuhuijidifngzhengfujijipeihebanli<ctr>,gongtongwanshnwoguos/huweirenxing,yuhuataigantcjengwei<dtrl>[jianwrenzhidao．renxi[nggujia].chenyuanzhanzhchu,xianjinxuduoguojwiatouguoshueifangshitigongzhengfuxiangguanuwuv,erzhengfsuzixunitongyidantingzhyunzuo,chulehuiz.aochengminzhnogshenghuobubian,yehuiduishehuijinagjiyuminxicnhanshenghendachongji.youjianyuci,shuweibujijibanliyourudingqijiankangjianchade<ctrl[>zhengfushuweifuwuxunhangjianjian],zhiliyouhuataiwanchengwei<ctrla>[jianrenzhidoa．renxingguojia]b<ctr[>,chuezhaochukezigaishanzhichu,jikediaozhengxizheng,yiqifanghuanyuweiran,yitishengzhengfushu8weifuwuekeyongxingjiyiyongxingwai,tongshwyequebaowoguozaofengjinjiqingkuangshi,zhengfurixunfuwunengchixuweiyun,jinzaohuifutigongbiyaofuwu,ctrl>.chenyuanzha3gbiaoshi,nianshuewibuyiyouxanxuanzejuminshenguanjainzixunxitongdezhengfujiguan,congshejimian8'zhixihngmianyuurnlimiantigonggaishanjanyi,xietongzhuanjiatuanduiwanchenggezhe/gfujiguan(danwei)degezixunxitongdeshuweixunhangjranianz6uoyec<trl>,yibangzhu5hengfushuweifwugengtuoshiyincingyihojingmohuanj4ingjidiyuanzhengzhiyngxiangxiadequ,anquifengxianyutiaozhan,weichiwoguosheuhianquandewenidng.che8nyuanzhhangjinyibuzhichu,jinnianshuweibujiangyouxianjujiaominshengguanjianzixunitongjiajnianjixiaonengyichangshijiancphuli,kuodatuidong[zhengfushuweifuwuxunohangjianjia<nctr>l]gongzo,qinggebuhuijidifangzhengfujijipeihebanli,bingqingshuweibugengtongpankaolv,tigongbiyaodejishuzhiyuan,hongshixiezhuge]buhuipeixunrencai,gongtongwanshanw ]zaihangzhengyuanhuituingquguojiakexuejijishuweiyuanhuiy[tuidongjigzhunjiankangzhanlvecanyeengjniguominquanlingjiankangfuzhi]bmaogaohoubiaoshi,benanzaixiangguanbuhuixieliutidongxia,bujinzhanxiafengshuochengguo,yedaidongtaiwanseungyichanyeshizhitupozhaoyuan.yanzhangqiangdiao<ctrli,ronghekualingyujishudechua3ngxinkejishiweilailhanyebujubirandequshi,qingweishengfulibu[ctrl>'jingjibu'guokehuidengxiangguanbuhuiyi;qianzhanxingsiwei,tuidongzhihuisheugyiyuzhihuinongyjeingpiacnhanyefayazhuozduang,chaohangaibaojian'yufang<cnrl>'zhenduan'zhiliaoc<trl>'zhaohudequanl[ngjiankangyuanjingqianjin,bingchixuzhenghechan'xue'yanliangnengyuziyu[an,jiasushijifnjingzhunjiankangrongrushehuideyuanjing,eiwwoguoquanlingjiankangfuzizuochugongxianchenyunazhagzhihcu,<ctrl'>[jingzhunjiankangzhanlvechaney]shicaiyinpgwenzongtongjieshideliudahexinzhanlvechanyezhiyi,zaixiangguanbuhuixielituidogxi<actrl>,wulunziadshengyijuluo<ctl>'shengwaixifazhan'xinyoayuyiliaoqicaishangshi'shuweizhihuikejiyingyong'jingzhunfangyikejiyanfajiincuhnagfuyudengfangmian,junyizhanxianxiangdangfengshuodejutichengguo,bingdaidongtaiwanshengyichanyezhengtiyingyeezhuninchengzhang'shizihtupozhaoyuan;zaiquanqki9zisliaouwangzhan[]gongbudequanqiuyiliaozhaohuzhishunianzhongpaiming<qctrl>,taiwanyilianxunianchanlinsijiediyiming<ctl>y,uanzhangganxiesuoyouxingzhengtuanduitongrendenuli,rangshijieaanjiantaiwan.chenyuanzhangqangdiao<ctrl,ronghekualingyjishudechuangxinkejis1hiweilaich;nyebujubirandequshi<ctrld>,qingweifubu<ctrlr>'jingjibu<ctrr>'guokehuidengxiangguanbuhuizaiwanshanchanyeshengtaixijixiangguanafguidingdi;gshanig<ctrjl>yingyiqianzhanxingwsiwei,daoyinshengdidashujuycingyong'fuzhiweituokaifajizhizaofuwuchane,jiehetaiwanshengjizitongxunengzhongyaoliji,tuidognzhihusihengyiyuzh6ihuinongyejingpianchanyeluodishenggen<ctr8l>'fayazhuozhuang<ctr9l>,bingchoaxianghangaliaboj'ian'yufang'zhenduan<crl>'hziliao<cztrl>'zh[ohudequanlingjiankangyuanjingiqanjin.chenyunzhangbiaoshi,hcanyefazhanguihuaxuqingtinglaizigejiedeshengin,shizhengacinengqueshi yuxingzhengyahunibiaoshi,tawianguoqujiniashe[shou-uojishehuiga9oduxinren,xianjiancaiyingwenzongtongtuidongdeguofangwaijiaoluxianshichengshuerkekaodeguozhnegfangxiang,bigzouzaihengquededaoluzhishang.yuanzhazngqinggebuhuichixuliyonggezhongjihuiheguandao],xiagnguarenshuomingdangq6iangexingzhengce1ezhixingjindu'fazhanfaqgxiang<c0trl>,yijijiyo1chengguoyuyingxang,zhengqugengduogorenqixinxieli,chixuzaiduidedaolushangwangqianmaijih<ctarl>.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,shifeng9direnzo7gtongfuzongtongdaxuanqianw<ictlr>,gezhenyngluxutichuduiweilaiguozhenggelingyudeyuanjinghezhengicezhuzhang.qizhongzaiguofnagwaijiobufen,doujingcaiyingweznongtongluxianshiweijiochuen2shuerkekaodegquozhnegfangxiang,ozheyeshiatiwanzaiguoqujinianshoudaouojishehu5ixinrendezuizhuyaoyu3anyin<ctr>l;zhiyuqitaguozhengxiangmu<crl>,youxuduoxianzhengzhixingqijuxangdangchengxiodezhengceyechengweizaiyezhenyinghouxuanrenfnefentichudezhuzhang,wulunjiaoyuwenhua'.eishengful'laogongfuwu,naizhiyuexiangjigjichanyezhengce<trl>,doyoulaiyugeb4ruhuidechixunuli,yidafuguoliminzhixiao,zheyezhengmingcaizhengfudezizheng,zhengzouzailhengquededaoluhishang.yuanazhangq5iagndiao,minzhujigzhyengzaisuonanmian<crtl>,dangujiagongtongdenulifangxiang,yijin=gyuelaiyueqingcuh<htrl>.chenyuanzhangqinggebuhuiwubiqukanliyifu,bing4liyonggezhongjihuiheguanda<octrl>,xianggu6orendujoiashuomingdnagqiangexiangzhengceezhixingjindu'fazhanfangxiang<ctrl1>,yijijiyouchenggoyuyingxiang<wctrl>,yizhengqugengduoguorenqixinxieli<yc2rl>,jixuziduidedaolushangwangqianmaijin.yuanzhangqiangdiao,xuanjushiyishide,erguojiafazhanshiyongjude<ctrzl>,qidaidajiatuanjieyixin<ctrel>,gongtongjianshewennua,njianrendeguojia.a
zaihangzhengyuanhuitingqufawubu[jingawishilijiexuantaiyfngjiyinyingcelve]baogaohoubiaoshi,uweizujuej3ingwaishilijeixuandeganrao,bncixuanjuchachagongzuoganglingitcu<c,rl>[zujuejingaishiliv]<tcr>'[duanjeudu4anxiaoying]ji[dujuejiaxunxiganrao]dengsanxiangqiangrencelve,qingxiang5=[uanjiguantongrenwubiquanlipeihequanxianqingchajingwaishilijiexuanarenyuan,bingquanlizhenbanjingwaishilijiexuanznjian,binchiuchayanbanyuanze,chixuxiangshansguyuanzhuichaxiangguangotgean,zuduanjingwa0ishilizaitaiwangluo,chediqingchabingpaohcujingwaishilizazitaigenij<ctrli>,gongtongshouhuwoguoziyou<ctr>l/'minzhu'fazhidehuanjingyu,enhua.chenyuanzhangzhihu<vtrl>,weiqnanguojiaduiyuminzhuguojiajieuxandeyangtaifichangduoy9uan,bingqieyeyingxiangziyou'min1zhujiazhi5epuji,yinczbi4xuteieliuyijingwaishilijiexuanqingxing<ctrl.>jinnianlanganqingshiyanjun<ctlr>,jinqiyichxhuojingwaishiliyuwoguoxuanjuqijyan,chutouguozijinfuzhitedingtuantihuohouxuanrendangxuan4,hangwoguonekzhengzhinengliangwai,gengqituijyoujiaxunxijiupaneilv<ctrx>,yindaozhengzhiyitidetaolunfengxiang,iyngxiangminzhongtoupeayoixiang,jinergibianxkuanjujieguo.inci,weizujuejingwaishilijiexuandeganrao<actrl>,bencixuanjuchachagongzuoganglingtichu[zujuejingwaishili]'[duanjeudupanxiaoyyig]ji[dujuejiaxunxiganrao]dengsanxiangiqangrencelve.chenyaunzhangtebietis,hiqizhongliangxian1ggongzuozhongdi7an,qingiangguanjiguantongrenwubquanlipeihebanli.shouxians3i[qua1xianqingchajingwaisilijiexuanrenyuan],weibimianjingwaishilijieruxu.anju,fuzitedingtuatnihuohouxuanrenqudezhengzhiquanli<ctlr,soyouchachaajiguayningzhangwojingwaishi[lizaiatikeyizuzhihuorenyuan,luoshiyanmiqingcha<ctl>;yeqingxiangguanjiguanchxixuguliquanmnigongtongianjujingwaishilijiexuancxuandaozuiaokehuodewanyuanjiajnujiangjin,jicichediqingchabingpaochujingwaishilizaiatigenji,o6ng1ongshozuhuwoguoziyo'minzhu'fazhidehunajingyuwenhua.chenyuanzzhangzhichu,flingyixianggongzuozhong-ianwei[quanlihzeinbanjingwaishilijiexuananjian],jingwaishil1ijiexaunbujinyingxiangxuanjugongpiengxing/,jingwaididucshilizaitaifazh zhenduixinbeishijinrifashengzhongdaxioyuqnanquansh=jan,yuxingzhengyuanhzuibiaoshi,taduicigandaofeichangtongxinyubushe,chuqingjia3yubuxiezhuxnbeishizhengfutiongshishengxinlifudao,binyggnogtongjianshixianxingzhongjejiaoyuhoudefudoprnggujizhi,qianghuaiaoyuangaoguanhuaiduixiangefudaocuoshiyug-uanjiaozuoweiwai<ctnl>,yeqinglinwanyizhengwuweiyuanyaojisifayuanjiliudvugongotngtaolunxvangguanduice,ubimianleishibeijuzaicmi5fasheng,rangxueshengdounengzaianquanyukuaidexuexihuanjingzhongrenzhenxuexiyuche-gzhang.cheny8anzhangzhichu,duiyufa.shengciyihash,tagnadaofeichangtongxinyubushe,chuleainsgjaioyubuxiezh-uxinbeis1hizsengfujiaoyujujiasupnpaxinlishi'shoegongshidebzhuanyerenyuan,weisishengtgongxiangguanxinlifudaowai;zaixiaoyuananquanjitedingxueshengfudaofangmian,'eqingxiaoyubuyudifanghzeng.ulijijianshixianxingzhongjiejiaoyuhodefudaopinggujizhi,qianghuaxiaoyuangaoguanhuaiduixiangdfeudaocuoshiyug6uanjiaozuowei<crl>,tishengxianhcangzhixingrynli'jingeidengziuyann<ctrl],bingcankaoxiangguanjingyan,tuoguominjianzuzhililiang,youjiaoshi'jiazhangjiminjiantauntigongtonghezuo,tongshiyeqinglinwanyizhegwuweiyuanyaojisifayuanjiliudougong3tongtaolun9inagguandui;e,bimianleishiebijuzaicifashsng.cheynuanzhangqibngdia,dajiadouxiwanghaizimennengzaianquanyukuaidehuanjingzhonrenzhenxuexi,bingchaozijilixiangdefayngxiangchengzhnagm,zheshixiangdangxuyaosuoyourenyngxindedifang,yeqingdajiayiqinuli<ckrl>.

yuxingzhengyuanhuitingquojingibzu[zhxoshuixiyangchenfangzhichengxiaojizhanwangbaoaohoubiaoshi,xingzhengyuanyunianaishirenyuanzhangdelaiqinxgdefzuongtongzhishixia,touguo[shuili]'[azolin]<ctr>'<ctsrl>[fangzaiyinbgiany]'shuifugaijwlvfugaiogngfaden<gctrl>,zhubcugaishanzhouchuixiyangchenwenti<ctr.l>,shiynagchenshijianrico=gniadec<6ictrl>,jan1haodauzhenianchixuwendinweich.izaiciyixia,jiansahofashengcishuchaoguocheg<nctrl>,tongshiyezengjiazhishenggongqng,duiyudangdihuanjingpinzhijishengtaigaishanjieyouimngxianzhuyi3.zhengfumuqianzhenfjijiguihuatuidong[zhuoshuixiyangchennfangzhvidsanqixingdonfgfanglan(nian－nian)]y,ujiweilainianrzaitoueruyyiuan,shihecuhanyangchenfan9gzhiuysehngtaibaoyuyougengjiayongxudecahengxiao.chenyuanzhadngbiaoshi,zhuoshuixiyangchencengshicunzaibaiduonianwufjaiejueedwenti,xinzghen5gyuanyunianziashirenyuanzhangedlaiqingdefuzojgtongzhishixia<ctrf>,youwuzechengzehng.wuweiyuanzhuanandudoaxiangguanbuhui,touguo<ct6rl>shuili]'[zaolin]'[fangzaiyingbian]<ct[l>'shuifugaijilvufgaigongfadeng,zaizhongyangyudifangguoquiandehezuonulihia,m9qianyiyouxiangdangxianzhudechengxioa.chenyuanzhangtebiegaxniewuzengwuweiyuanguoqunianlaiqinshenshididudao'd5fangzhengfudepeihe,y3ijiminjiantuanit<tacrl>'ijng.ibu'nongkyebu<crl>'hua4njingbujijiaoyubuquanlituidongyuhezuo,renzhenzhaofangfaduizhengxiayao,yishuifugai'lfugaigongfayouxiaojainshaoluoludiheyangchendeqin-gkuang,shiyangchenshijganricon]gniandeci,jianshaodaonianmqsimeinianzhifahengbudaoci<ctql>,zheniangeonchixuewndnigweichizaiciyixia,jianshaofashengcishuchaoguochengctrl>,chuslejianshaodeluoludi,yezengjiazhishenggonkgqing<ctrl,xiangdangyuzuodaans/enlingoegyuandelvdi,gengchengweipeimianplu'dongfangbaigandendguozhongniaoleideshengtaileyuan<ctral>8duiydan-gdihuanjingpinhz,jmshengtaigaishanjieyouminagxianzhuyi,zhexieyangchenfangzhigongzulosuoyansehngdefujiaxiaoyi,lingrengandaoshifenjingxi,yexiangnendgjixuweichibingguangweiutidong.=chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,zhengfuudiyuzchusohuixiyangchenwentiyizhaodaojiejufangfa,erduideshiqingjhiu2yaojianc xingzhengyuanzhengwencaznfuhyuanzhangjin()riehuxitaizhong<crtl>[guojiamanhuabowuguan,]uanqudashuorngguanpdiandengjikizhnashiyinggunjizhehu.i]shibiaoshi,jin()nianyietayulifayuancaiqichangfuyuanzhang'taizhongshiluxiuyanshizhagngongtongxuanbu1taiz1hognxingwusuojiangzuoweiguojiamnahuabowuguandechousheduan,dngshishizhaebuzhangbiamchengnuoniandiqianjiuhuiliyongxianyouguanshequn,jinxingmanhua/zhanednghuodong,jingguowenhuabugeyu;edenuli,mingriqijiangjuban;ingcaimanhuaxiliehuodong,guojibamanhuabowuguanzhendelaile.zhengfuyuanzhanrzhichu<crl>yuefenhuitongchangdixianwkansdi,wenhuabushizhbuzangxiw0angxiankannengdachengsangemubiao<ct6rl>,shouex9ian,xiwangguojiaemwanhabowuguandidiannengpiabandingan;qic0i,nenggouyuniandiqiankaizhan;disanzeshizhengquyusuanyixingjiangengdademonhuazuzhanguan.dangshitajiudaibiaoxingzhengyuanpaibadinganguojiad6anhuabowugualuojiaotaizhongxinwgusuoxianzhp,ranjyandangjinniandexuanzhifengbpingxi,wenhuabuyesuijijinxingzhanlanhuodongjiguanchucoubeishiyi.zhengfuuanzhangkennuinsghiozhebuzhanyu9wenhuabutuanduidezhixingli,duanduangeyuedezhengbei,luxuwacnhengbaokuocanhgdiyouhua<ctl>,gongchengdetishengjicehzanneirongdenggonrzuo,rangshiyingyunguangsukaizhan,yueriqyiuanqudongcedetaizhongxingwusuoguashequnk,jiangtuichudijiejinmanjiangtezhandengdamanhuazhuticezhanvdalia[ngdia7nzhnayna,bingcebanmanhualuntan'jiangzuo'shiji'dorgmanyinleiaoyandenghuodnog,zhengfuyuanzhanghaunyingdazjialaitaizho9gyujiantaiwnamanhua,qiangxiantiyanguojiamanhuabowguuandemeill,bingliuxiayutaiwanmanhuaduyiwuerdehumiyi.zhengfuyuanzhangqiangdiao,wenhuashiyigechengshidelinghun=zctrl>,emranhuazeshikuaugoxjmie'kuashsi7aigongtongdejiyi,manhuachengzailelishi,yenjiaoliuxianzaiyuguoqu.tapanwangweilaidegoujiamanuabowuguan,rjishidiancangmanhuazuopindtushuguan,yeshijihemanhuadiancan]'yanjiu'zheanshi'yujiaoyuutiguangdebowuguanctr>l,gengshiyunyu]wenhuachuangyichanyedejidi,guojiamanhuabowuguanbuzhishihkenyoujiazhidecunzai,weilaigenghuishitaizhongwenhuashenghuozhongyadeiybufen.zhengfuyuanzhangyeliejutaniantaoyua xingzhengyuanfuyuanzhangzhengwencanjin()riqianwanggaotetinanzhanqianguangchanghcuxi<trl>[huakuichedijing9gongyunqiyongdianli]shibiaoshi,zhechyudijinggongyuanzhanshigunoeiweiyideribenxinganxianxileche,xitaiwangaotiegongsiwanchengzhengchih0ouduiwaizhanchu,zhanxiantiwangaotidg/ovgsiduiyutiedaowenhuabacoundeyongxin,bzujinxiyintiwedaomizhumu,gengfengfuwenhuagudulvyoujiuojijiaoliuhuodong.zhengfuyuanzhangshuo,taiwangaotieshirijbenxinganxianhaiwaishuc0zuuichenggongdefanli,chuleanquan'zchunshi'youshan,shangtiuchuxuduochaungxinfuwuxiayishitaiwannanbepliudognyjiigaediguanguanglvyoufebichaengzhongyaoqiebianjiedejiaotonggongju.zhengfuyuanzhanizhichu7,ickuanxixinga8xianlieche,xizaitaiwangaotiexingjianshiqi<cirl>ryouribenyund;iliataizuoweitaiwngaote[xianjieceiangche<ctr>l]yongtxu,fuzejianceguidoajilujingingkongdenggongzuo,yinqainzhuangcheshenwaidetancezhenruribenjmanghushidaiyjihuakuidefazan,gubeitiedaominilch2engewi<ctrl[>huakuiche]<ctr[>,shimuqianquanqiuweierzairibenbentuzhiwaidexinganxianxicheliang,yeshiquasnhijiewei9yijuyou[dxianjieceliangche]zhixingxiangdexicheliang,jianjulisiyiyiyudutexing.zhengfuyuanzhangbiao'hi,tainansuyoutaiwanwenhuaguduzhicheng,yongtyouxuduolishijianzhu<ctlr>'guji'ziranshengtaidengdetianduhoudeguan6uangziyuan,jinri]ozuegtnianyicuj]uyoutaiwantiedaowenhuaneihandedijngfongyuan,ixqangxinhuakuicedijingfgongyuanqiyngjiangiyingengduorenlaeitainanlvou<ctl>.tajinyibubiaoshi,exianjintainanbuzhishiwenhuagudu<1ctrl>,yeshitaiwankejizhongzhen,taijidianbanaotixianjinzhiwhengnaimiyunaimijingpianzhizaozainankeshen'geng'shalunzhihuilvnengkeuechegdengxianjinkejiyanfasheshijinzh],weilai,lvyoude9tainanhekeijdetainanliangguerlijiehe,rangtainanzaishengji.zhengfuyuanzhanggahnxietaiwanaotiegongsizaigaotitaoyaunzhanshzhigaotietansuoguan,baoliufeicahngduotaiwangaotiecongxingjiandaoyingyunde1enwucntrl>,congzhbngyeqanchutaiwandeguidaojianshezhengzaileijijingyan,zhecihuakuichez1utidedijinggon4yuanluochengqiyong,jiangkerangtairizhijianechuyuanyoudebainiantaitieguiaojiaoliuwiwai,zaizen shicha[jiayishido-gyilujilushanqiogaijiangongcheng<cwtr>l]shibiaehsi,zhongyangguanxindifanggonggongjianshe,zhenduidifangzheengfutichudejianshejihua,zhongkyanjingshenshenpingguhouyuyizhichi,tigongminzhonga2juleyedeshenghuohuanjing<ctrll.zhiy1udifangguanqiededaoluj;aotoganquanwenti,zhongyanghuiouguogongcheng'zhifa'jiaoyuvjianlide,gmianxiang,gongtonglaishouhuyonglurenanquan.chenyuanzhanghichu<ctrlc>,weigaishandifangji[otong,jiayishizhengfutouguo[sehnghu3quandaolujiaotongxitongjianshejihua<ctrl]>xiangzhongya1ngzhenguftich<c4rl>[3jiayishidngiylujilushnaqaogaijiangongcheng]<trl>,zongjingfeiyueyiyuan<trl>,yuozhognyangbuzhujingfeiyuyiyuan,jiayishizichouyiduoyuan<ct]l>,bingyouminjiantuannijiaixqingshantuanju]anzengqi4wanyuane6jianshewangonghouctrl>,blujindafugaishandifanhgji8oton,bingronghuo[nadnijieyoulianggongchengjinanjiang<trl>]youdengjiangji[niandijiegnoggonggongchnegjnizhijiang]youdegjiangkending,zhanxianzhongyan7gdifanghezulok'8ongixieldejihnsehchengguo.chenyuanzhangqiangdiao<crl>,zhongyangguanxindifangzhongschidngogngongjians/e.difangzehngfuhitchujihua<crl>j,iangjiaoyouguojiafazhanweiyuanuishenyi,bfenjianshejingfeiyouzhongyngjidifanggongtongfendan,bufenzeyouzhongyangquanefudan,zhongyangjh0uizaishenshenpingghuouyuyizhichi,gong4tongdaznaominzhonganjuley4edeshepghohuanjing.ciwai,youguandifangjiiaotonganquan,chenyuanzhangjinyibusho,zaigongchengmianbufen,jiaotongxinzhituidongzen3jiada5olulintingqudehuashe,touguoqianzhanjianshetishegndaolupinzhi<ctrw>'yiyuynde[xiaoyuanzhoubianjixingcheanquandaolugaishanjihua],yijinianyidectrl>[o7ngxutishengrenxinganquanjihua]hctrl>,keyoudifangzhengfutijiaojiua,youzhongyangjinxingpingouyanyi<crtl>,t'ouguozhongyangldifangheuo<ct5rl>,tigongminzhonganquan'pigzheng'shunchangdegonggongtongxinghuanvjing.zahengfuxoianglazhongshiq3anguoxuetongdetongxueanquan<yctrl>,zhendui[xiaoyuanzhoubianbeiyuanguozhongxiaotongkxuebuaogongcheng]bufer,difangketichus]henqing<c]trl>,zhongyangjiangwtouqguo[yonigxutishengrenxingtnquanjihuaxiaoyranzhoubianjb3ingcheanqua yxingzhengyuanhuinbiaoshi<ctrl,>jinz()nianyuexingzhengyuanhuitong4duoactrl[xingrenyouxianjiaotnognquanxingdonggangling],yuelifayuaniuzheng[daolujivotongguanlichufatiaoli]bfentiaownshengxiashixign,exinfashishiyijixangjinbannia<nctlr>,gdeijiaotongzhixuyukxinrenanquandebaozhangdouyouxanzhugaishan.yuanzhangqiangdiao,zhengfquuebaodaolujiaotonganquandemubiaoyufangxiangbbiayn,danxiangguancelxeyaoyushijujin,qingjiaotongbuhuitongneizhengbujiugezhongtweiuitaiyangxiangjiaqufenchubutonwgeixianchengdu,bingcnogyouxiaofengxiankongguanjiaodu<ctl>,tongpanjiantaxoiangguanjidianguidingdeheilxing,jinlizaihan7renanqua'xing5cheanquanyurenmingongzuo-quanyezhongqudegenghaodepingheng.chenyuanzhangbiaishi<ctrl,>haijidejinnianshangbannianxduorenshuotaiwanshi[xingrendiyu<ctrl];weiboazhangguorenjiaotonganqjan,xhuiying[hailuyumin]deshehuiqidai,jinnianyuexingzhengyuanhuitongguo[xingrenyouxianjiaotonganquanxingdong=ganglin],lifyuanyebufe/nchaoye<ctrlp>'jiasuxiufa,zaiyuexiuzheng[daolujaotonvgguanlichufatiaoli<csrtl>]bufentiaowenshengx,aoshixing,rangxinfayuxnz/engtongbutuidong.yuaizhangganxiebuixinlaodediixianzhifatogen,yijidiaangzhengfuyuzhongyangxian,guanbuhuimiqiehezuo,haiyouquantiguore,piehezhichi<ctrl,>xianzaigedijiaotongzhixuyuxingrenanquandebaozhangdouyouxianzhugaishan,youqishijiaotongshigusiwarnrenshsxiangjiaoqu(tniantonqgizhuyuexiajiang,queshiyichengxiandao6angaishanchengxiao.chenyuanzhangzhichu,suiranzhengtidaoanzhengceyichujianchengxiao,danzaigu.qubanniandezhifaguochen1zonhg,yinbufenpeita;cuoshikhangweizahenwanbei<ctryl>,jiashangxinfagangshangludaozhidiyixianzhifarenyuanfudanchenzhong,zhixingjieguoyeluxfuaxianyouyingxiangminzhongxingph=eyugongzuoquanyishihengdexianxiang,senzhizaohcengxuduominzhongdanyougongzuoquanzaoboduodebuanyu'kunrao,yinciyoubiyaojishidiaozhenggengzhouquanhyeidezuoalaihuiyingzhexieminezhongdexinsheng<ctlr>.zheduanqijian,jingyoujiaotongbubjibeizhengbuluxucaiquduoxiangweidiaocudoshi]ctrl>,queshirangjdiiananjiasnhuhelixiajiangchengdur<ctil>.chenyu[nzangjinyibubioshi,xinfa zaiasngzhengyuanhuitingquxingzhengyuanjingmaotanpanbangongshi[duizhongguomaoyibileidiaochabaogaozhihuiyingshuoming]baogaohoubiaoshi,zhongguomaoyibileidiaochaguochengqu3efagongkaitoumi8ng'jielxunniuqushishi,qiezaidiaochabaogaoshijianshangyoukeyianpai,xianjianqizhengzhimucidayujikngjimudi,shishujingjjixiepo.yuaznhangqiangd6iaow,ofangyizhenduidenankenengfas.hengdefnegxianjisunhai,zyuohaowansahngaunlijik3ngzhi,bi=nghuyutaiwanyuzhongguotongshu(shijiemaoyizuzhi)huiyuanguo,zhiyaozuhongguoyouchengyi[taiwanyuzhongguosuishikeyijizhiqidongxieshang.chenyuanzhangzhichu,zhongguozaimaoyibileidiaochaguochengzhong<ctr>l,bujinquefagongkaitoumin,gengtiaoguowoguo,qiiielunnsiuqushishi<trl>,pianmianduandingwfangweifanji(lianganjingjihenzuojiagouxeyi)dengguifan<tcrl>.wofangyizhanxianzuidachengyi<ctr>,duocihuyuzaijiagouxia,shuangfnagkgesuisixieshang,weizhongfangrengziyierwei,qiezaidiaochab8ogkoshijiajs8hangyoukeyanpai,xianjianqizhengzhimudiadyujingljimudi,shihujingjixiepo<ckrl>.chenyuanzbangbioshi,woafngyizhenduibenanhouxukenengfashengdefengxianjisunhai,zuohaowanshanguanlijikongzhi,qingg7ebuhuichixuxiezhuyezhefensanshichangfengx6ian,wu]uoduyiflaidnayishichang,binghyuynuyezhejiminzhongwutingxinbushichuanyan<ctrlj>.yuanzhangqiangdiao<c1rl>,tiawanyuzhongguotongshuhuiyuanguo,rouoyouxinagguanmaoyiwenti,kezdhijieyiizhiyuxiangguanguifanchusi;zhiyaozhongguoy]uchengyi,taiwanyuzhongguosuishikexunjizhiqidongxieshang.

zhnogyangzaihaifangjiuhuibayunianyuerihedingxinbanzhizaihaiffangjiujibenjihua(nianzhinian)<ctrtl>],weizhentiluoshituidong,juyiyindaoweilaiwunianzaihaifangjiujibenfangzhen'celvejizhongdazaifangzhengce,xingzhengyuanjin()rizaizhangrongfajijinhuiguojihuiyizhnogxin,juban<ctr-l>[zhongyangyudifangqidongzaihaifangj'iujienjihua]yantaohui,youzhongyangzaihai5angjiuweiyuanhuizhxiingzhngwuzechengzhengwuweiyuanzlhucqikaimusi,bingyougezhudaobuhui<ctrt>'jiguan(danwie),duqwiyeguanxiangcelvejixnigtuidongshuoming,lingtaibeishizhenfguzhendui[diquzaihaifangjiujihuanarujibenjihuatuidongcelvejieshao[<ctr7l>]jinxinganlifenxiang.wuzhngwuweiyua3nyukaimuzhicibiaoshi,jianyuquanqizaihaifashengpinlvyusunshizhunianpansheng<ctqrl>,gejizhengfpuwubizuohaozaifanggongzuo,qianghuajianzaizhengbeishizheng.zhongyangxiang1uanbuhuijidifangzhengsfuxuyixinbanzaihaifangjiujibenjihuasuobaihuazhidajibenangzhenjixiangcelveweiyiju,lijiqidong[zaihlaifangjiuyewujihua]<ctrql>'[dquzai6haifangjiujihua<ctr>]ji<ptll>[gonggongshiyezaihaifangjiuyewujih0a]dengxiangguanqihuazeh,yanxiuzuoye,tichuxiangyingzizhhengceguihua,jijituidongbanlim,shigejizhengfuzaihaifangjiuxiaonengchixutisheng.xingzhengyunzaifnagbanbiaoshi,benciyantaohuzihuyaottaolunzaihai=fangjiujjibenjihuazhidafngzhen[yinyngqihouianqiancejinjiduanuzaihaidyaoshizuowei]'daorushuwejzhu'anxing,qianghu1azhihuizaihaif5angjiuxiaoneng]'<c3rl>[jingjinzaihaiguanli,qianghu'daguimozaiahifuyuanliangneng],qizhonghangaixiangzhongyaocel7e<ctlr>,yougexiangzhudaobuhuijiguanjinxingtuidnogshuoming<ctrbl>,bingieyoutaibeihsizhengfufenxiangdiquzaihaifangjiujihuanarujibenjihuatuidongcelvejieshao,xianchangtiwe.nyuhudongrelie,zhongyangjidifangyuhuijigzandaibiaochongfenjiaoliuxibuzhixingf]ngshijioweilaiw-nianzaifadgyuanjing.zuihou,xingzhengyuanzaifangbnazhichu,benciyantoahuizuoweigebuhuyudifangz=engfujiaoliudepingtai,binrgyuhuizhongzhensghichengli1zaihaifangijibenjihuatonghetuidongzhuananxiaozu]<trl,>qidongjibenjihuatuidognzhix-angguanzuoye.tuidongzhuananxiaozuyouwuzehcengzhengwuweifuandudao =ingzhen'gyuafuyuajnzhangzhengwencanjin()richuxi[taiwang-anguangxiehuijuanzengrennianhuijichebglizhounianqingzhuchahui]shi,ganxietaiwanguanguangxiehuinianlainulixiangguojishehuichuandati7andemeihaoyumeili<ctrrl>,touguogongixielituidognguoneiguanguangchaxyedefazhan.weicujinyiihoug6sneiguanguangchanyezhenxing,zhengfuyetouguoyihoutebieyusuan,bainlieyiyuanjingefixiyingu[oiguanguagkelaitai,yugubenzhoulaitaiganguanglvkesjiangkeangdaodawanrenci<c=rl,.zhengfuyuanzhangbiaoshi<ctlr>,taiwanguanguangxiehuichenglinian2ailvchuangjiji,wulunshiyougaiviehuij0uban[taibeiguojilvzhan]'yuhainguolvxngyexihjuigonrgtongzhuban[taihanuganguangijaoluhuiyi]huopaiyuancanjia<c=rl>[tairiguanguanggaoeengluntan],dounulixiangguojasheehui/huandataiwandemeihaoyumeili;tongshi,taiwanguanguangxiehui4eyuguoneiguagnuanglvyouyezheyiqinulidapan<ctlr>,chenggongduguonianduoyiqinghandong<ctkrl>,rangtaiwandegganguanglvyoudeyizaiyiqinghoufusu,yugubenzhoulaitaiguanguangkejiangkewnagdyaodawanrenci.zhengfuyuanzhnagzhichu,weixiezhuyihouguanguangzhenxingw,zhengfutebieyuyihoutebieyusu5nzhongbianliyiyunajingfeituidongj[iaysukuodaxiyinguojiguanguangkefnagan],chu5henduilaiaiziyoux]inglvkechouwanfenqianyualvyouxiaofeijiwaiyijiangzhulvxingtuanmeituanqianyuandaowsanyuandengcuoshi;ciwai,zhengfuyebianlieyiyu=anjinfgei,tuidong[tairwanhaoxing]youhuafuwu,uishengguanguanjingdiangonggzongyunsufuwu,lingyebianlieyiyuantuidong[guanguangullang'aidiyoujiaojiebofuwu<ctlr>]<crtl>,yuxiaokchezulinyetaiwanguanbayezheyulvsuyehezuo<trl>,tigongzaididuoyuanyunjujiebozhegnfuyuanzhangjinyiebubiaoshi,zengfumuqianyikaifanggangaojuminlaitaiziyou,xinjgilvjudisandidezonguolvkelaitai<c]tr>,jiaotongbuyudaluweiyuanduiyexuanbumnig()nianueiangkaifangluketuanktlaitai<trl>,ranglaingantuankenenggouhuxiangjiaoliu<ctrl.ciwai,weirangguoneiguanguangyezhenengzaizheboquegonglangchaoxiadedaozhichi,zhengfujiangchixutuidongrenlimeihefangan<crl>,xiwangtishengyongxuguanguangdenengliangyupinzhi.fuyuanzhangshuo,taiwangunaguangyijinruzhuanxingqi<ctrl,>duoyuanhua'qzhutishigu fujuzhangyijitaitanggongsichenlikrenzongjingliyitongshichayuanqu,xianchanghouceyingliunian.

angfangbinheyingliunian.
zaihangzhengyuanhgiingqujiaoyhbu/[taiwanxuleshengcanjiaguojixueshengnenlgipingliang()jigongminsuyan()yanjiuchengguo<tcrl>]baogaohoubiaoshi<mtrl>,taiwankxueshengcanyubencipingliangbiaoxianyouyu[jingjohezujoifazhanz=uzhi()qguojapingjunfenshu<trl>;zhiyubu7en,zaigongminrenzhisuzyang<ctlr>'duiyuuzqun0uxingbiepingqouanjyiiminrenquandezhichldu,yijiduiyuhuanjingbaouyishidemingandudegxiangmu,junpaimingguojidi<ctrl,xianjianwoguotuidongkegangyoucheng4ctrl>,rangxueshednghenggoupeiyanghexinsuyangyukualingyunengli<tcrl>.uanzhangqingjiaoyubuloshituidongegang,chixt-shengwoguoxueshenggonginsuyang,bingqianghuashuxue'yueduyukexuesuyangdenglingyunengli.chenyuanzhangzhichu<cmrl>,taiwanxueshengcanjia8[jingjihezuojifazhanzuzhi()z]hubande[guojxueshengnenglipinglingjihua()],chengjiliangyan,shux1uepaimingdi'lkexuesuyangpaimingdi'yuedusuyanpgaimingdi,iaoxianjunyouyuguojiapingjunfenshu2<c.trl>,qiejiaonianpaimingjnibuxuduo.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,yiqingqijian,wogeojijisihshixianshangjiaoxue,pandiangexiangxianshangxuexisuoxuxngdongzaijujwanglushebei<ctrlf,bingjianzhi[jiaoyuyunshuwenxuexirukouwang],quebaoxueshengxue6xipinzhijijindu.ciwa<ictrl>,woguotuidongkegang,zhuyaopeiyangxueshenghexinsuyangyukualingyunengli,doushitaiwanxueshengzaibencipingliangzhanxianliamnghaochengugodezhon/yaoyinsu,yuanzhangtebieganxiegeweijiaoshidenulic<trl.chenyuanzhangzhicuh,taiwanxueshwegyecanjia[guojijiaoyuhengjiuingjiaxniehui()]zhbande[guojigongminjiaoyuyusuyangdiaochajihau()<ctru>],zaigongminrenzhisuyagn'duiyuzuqunyuxingbiepingquanjiyiminrenquande0hichidu,yijiduiyuhanjingbaohuyishidemingandudngxaingmu,junlpaimingguojidi;duiyu]hengfuzuzhidexinrendu,yigaoyuguojipingjunzhie.chenyuanzhangbioshi,taianxueshengzaicijigongminsuyangdiaochabivoxianyouyi<trl>,xianjiankeganghehui7ingganggongminkeqiaqgdiaoxueixtanjiuyusuyangdaoxaingedjiaoxue,fuheguojigongminjiaoyuquoshiq,ingjiaoyubuluoshituidongkegan<gctrl>,chixutishengwougoxeushenggongminsuyang,bingqianghuashuxue'yueduuykexuesuyangdenglingyunengloi<ctrl,>.
zaihanghengyuanhuitingqujingjibu[zhuzhairanqiqijujienenguhanpinbuzhucuoshi]baogaohogbiaoshi,yinyingguojijinglingjiantanqushi,jingjibuming()nianyueriqiyujibuzhuwantaizhuzhailaojiuranqiqijutaihuanweineingyulnxiaolvyijihuoerjchan6in,chgketishengjjuiaanquan<ctlr>,yuqigengkejianshaomeinianwanlifanggongchitianranqishiyongliangjiwangongdutanpafangliang,jianjuj9eiengyuanquanfanghutihsengxihoyi4ctrl>.chenyuanzhangzhichu,inyingguojijinglingjiantaqushi,zhengfujijituidongduoyuanjxeengc1oshi,jinriingjibutibao[zhuzhairanqiqijujienengchanpib5duzhucuoshi]<tcrl>,jishiqizhongyixiangrongrugu4renshenghuodejienengzhnegce.chneyuanzhangibaoshi,jingjibuweigulimnzhongjiwanglaoojiuranqiqijutaihuanweinengyuanxiazlvyijihuoerjichanpinc<trl>,zhubutishengzhuzhcibumennengyuanshiyongxiaolv,mingnianyujibuzhuwantai.zaibencuoshibuzhubnaodechanopinzhong<ctr4l>,xinxingwasilujufangqianshao'fanglouzidongdanqidenganquangongneng<tcrl>,0qiangzhilpaiqiwasirseiuiizekejiandishineiyiyanghuatannongdu,chuketishengjujiaanquan,yuqigengkejianshaomeinianwanlifanggongcihtianranqishiyongliangjiwangongduntanpaifangliang,3ijichaowoguo[inghi;ngpaifang]mubiaoqianjin.chenyuanzhangqiangdio,benbuzhucuoshijianjujienengyuanquanfanghutishengxiaoyi<ctrl1,qingjingjibujinsuwanbeixiangguanzuoye,jiazojiangzh]engc,meiyituiguangzhouzhi,bingyunianyureiqibuzhugoumaijishoulishenqingctrl>,rangyouxuyaodeminzhongdounengshanjialiyng.

chuxid[guojiarencaifazhanjiangbanjiangdialni],banjiangbiaoyangdejiangdanweijijitouruzhuanyerencaidepeyuxunlian,bingtichuxuduochuangxinyingbianfangan,bujinhoushitaiwanyouzhiderencciziben,gengqianghuaguojiayongxufazhandeguanjianjiche,qipayougengduoqiyejidanweinengyidejiangdanweiweixuexmdianfan,toururencaipeiyu<ctr0>,cujinwoguorenliziyuanfazhantouzi,tishengguojiazhengtijingzhengli.zhengfuyehuichixuchaoqianbushu,tichugengjingjin<tcrl>'gengchuangxindecelveyufangjhen<strl>,daz'ogengjuqianldechanyehaunjing,rangrencaidounnegshizhansuoneng,duiqiyejgiuojiafahuigengdadegongxian<crl>.cheyuanzhangzhicishishouxianxiangsuoyoudejaingdanweiibaodazuichengzhideganxieyu9zhuhe.<ctr1>[guojiarencaifazhanjiang]gulishiyejuigujijipeiyangyouxiurencai,jiangrenlizibenzhuanhuaweizhihu-iziben,j;inrisuoyoudejiangdanweibujinzhanxianduduozairencaifazhanyuchuangxindeduoyuancelvejichengjiu,gengbuyiyuliditouruzhuanyerencaidepeiyuxunlian,shifeichangzhidexuexi-dedianfan.yua'nezhangpanjiyou[guojiareneaifazhanjiang]ebiaoyang,negngoupaozhuanyinyuctrl>,ranggengduoqiyejidanweitoururencaipeyiu,cujinwoguorenliziyuanfazhantouzi,tishengguojiazhengtijinghzeng-i.chenyuanzhangtidaoc,jin()niandejiangdanweitichuxuduochuangxinyingbianfanganliruzai[daxingqiyejiangzu]zhong,dejiangdanweiyuquanqiuzhuanyehuarencaicelvejiegu2i<ctr/l>,duiqiyerencaijinxingeianzhanxingbuju,qianghuaguanjianrencaideepiyuuyouhua,jinertishengyuangongzhuanye,dadaowendingrenca7igonggei;zai[zhongxiaoqiyejiangzu]fabngmianoctrl>,bingchiyongxufazhan'jingyqqriujingdelinian,dazaozuzhirencaipeixunjihua,yunyongguoneiwaixuexi8iyuanjichengxiaozuhanyimoshi,buduanzengijarencaipeiyu5dongnengc<trl>,zhanxianhongxiaoqiyedejianqiangshili<trl>;szai[jiguan(geu)tuantijiangzu]zhong,dejiangdanweipeiheguojiazhongdianchanyezhemgce<ctr>l,kaizhanzhihuizhiyzao<ctr>'jinglingyongxudengxiangguanz.huanyepeixun<ctrk>,bingxiezhuqiyebuzuweisaiguanjianrenliquekou<4crtl>,zuoweiqiyerencaigonygingdeqianglihoudun;zail[feiyinglituatijiangzu]bufen,dejiangdanweihuyouwasnhazdeneibupeixunijzhi zaihangzhengyuanhuizhendui[lushengnarujianbao]yianbiaosih,jiankangquanshiquanqiuhpushijiazhiedjibenrenquan,yincixuejichaoguogeyueqieyiwanchengzhucedelusheng,yingshitongwaijishengjiiqaoshegnn5rujianbao,weifubujiangyiju[quanminjiankangbaoxianfashi7ingxize]ditiaodixianggonggao,bingdingyuming(v)nianyuerishishi<ctrl,.yuanz/hangqingxiangguanbuhuichongfenzuohaoduilushengdegoutongijxingzhengzuoyezhengbei,ranglsuhengzaitaiqiuxueqijian,keyidedojianbaoyiliaozhaohuyubaozhang.chenuanzhangzhichu,jiankanqguanshiquanqiupushijiazhidejibenrenqun,lushenglaitaijiuxue<ctl>,jinrutaiwanjiaoyurtizhinei,jiuzhaogjujia-kangquanjiyouzhutaiwanfngyidelichangreyan;ctrl>,xuhejichao4uogeyueiqeyiwanchengzhucedlushegbuyingpaichuzaiwai,yigshitnogwaijishengjiqiaosheng6arujianbao,xiwangshehuigejieykaikuodexiognjin,zhengmiankanyailushemngnarujianbao2iti<ctrl'>.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,guanyulus5engnarujianbaozhizhaogu,jingkuabuhuishenshenyanyihou,jiagnyouweifybuyiju[quanminjiannkangbaoxianfash0ixingxize<trl>]ditiaodixianggronggao:[zhonghuaminguotaiwand]iquruchujinxguezhengyouneizhengbuyiminshuxukefageishiyouzhuji『lushengjiuxue』zhe,weidezaitwaiwa7diquzhangqijuliuzhizhengmingwenji/n,bing]juyibeibaoxianrenshenefncanjiaijanbao].chenyuanzhangzhch<uctrl>,kaolianggebuhu8xiangguanzhunbeiyuxuanchuanzuoyeqicheng,bengonggaoshishiriqidingweinianyueri<ctr>.zaigonggaoshishiqian,yuanzhangqingjaoyubu<ctl>'daluweyiuanhui'neizhengbuhjiweishengfulibuchongfenqzuohaoduilushengdyegoutngjixinzhengzuoyezhengbei,shigikzhengcerudqiruzhishishi,ranglushengzaitaiqiuxueqijian<ctwrl>,keyidedaojianbaoyiliaozhaohuyubaozharng.
yuxingz.engyuanhuitingqujiaoyubu[dazhuanxiaoyuaxusehengxiaoneizhu3subutiejihua]baogaohoubialoshi,jiaoyubuyujiziming()nianyueqi<ctrml>,meixueqibutiemeimingruzhuxuexiaosushexueshengyuanctrl>,zhenduidisxhouruhuhuozhongdishouruhujiatingzhizhusus[heng,zebutieeuyim3ei3irgmeixueqiyuanweiyuanze;tongshic<trl>,eyjiangdingejiap4miansilidazhuanxueshenxguezafei,bingjiamaji2nmiangongsilidaz.uanjingjirusshixueshengxuezafei<ctrl'>jingjinjiuxuedaikuancuoshideng,quanmianjianqingxueshengjingjifudan.chenyuanzhangbiaohsi<c-rl>,jiaoyubuweijianqingroushcxueshengxiaowaizuwufudan,chixutuidong[uroshixueshengxiaowaiujinbutie],baingbuzhuxuejiaogaishan9uesh4engsushesheshijigonggongkongjian,tigongxueshengyouzhidezmhusuhuanting.ziingnianyueqi,jsiaoyubujiangku4dabsuzhufanwim,eixueqibutiemeimingruzhuxuexiaosusqxeueshengyan;zhusushengrushuyuishouruhuhuozhongdishpuruhujiating<cttl>,zebutieeduyi.meimingmexiuqeiyuanweiyuwanze,xi-ezhujianqingxueshengxi8aoneizhusudejingjiufdan.fuanzhangqingjiaoyubudouxuhuitongneizhengbutuoshanguihuaxiangguanjingfeiubofushiyi<ctrsl>,bingxiezhuxuexiaojianhuashesqingchengxu,jinsujianggaizhenbceluoshdioagwei.chenyuanzhangzhichu,chu[xiaoneizhusubutie]wai</trl>,mingnianyeuj;aoyubuyejindgtuidong[lajingongsilixuexiaoxuezafeicha2jujiqipeitaocuoshifangan<rctrl>],dingejianliansilidazh'uanxueshengxuezafei8]trl>,bingjiamajianmianongsilidazhuanjingjiuoshixueshengxuezafei'j.ngjnjiuxuedaikuancuosui/eng<ct7l>,bangzhushenshenxueizhuanzhxuuexi,tiggojingzhengli.
zaihanizhengyuanhuitingqucaizhmngu[suodeshuzhiyo-huahuimincuoshi<tcrl>]baogaohoubiaoshi,jinnianlaizhengfuyituidongduoxiangsuodeshuiyounuacuoshi,binganxiaofeizhewujiazhishushangzhangchengdudiaogaomianshuie<crl>'kuchuejikelhuijiju,chujianqingminzhongfudan,yeyouzhuyusuodezhongfenpei;ciwai<cqxtrl>,zaijizbengfangmianc<trl>,jijituidonggexiangbianminfuwucuohsi<cdtrl>.yuanzhanqingcaizhengbujiaqiangxuandaof,chixuyouhu[ajijingjinshangs[ucuoshirangminz/hongshizhigansohudalozhegnfuzhaoguquantigorndeyongxinyunuanxin.chenyuanzhangzhichu<ctf>l,jininanlaizhengfuyituidongduoxiangrangrenminyou.andesuodesuiyouuhacuoshi,baokuodafutigaozonghesuodeshuibiaozhunkouchue'xnzisuode'shenxinzhangaijiyouerueqiantebiekouchue'zengdingzhangqizhaogutebiekouchue,bingxinzengjitiaojiben0shenghuosuoxuzhifeiyongbudejiayikeshuijine,inganxiaofeizhaewuj1iaz0ishushangzhangchengdudiaogaomianshuioe'kochuejik]shuijiju,chuji4anqngminzhongfudaqn,yeyouz]uyusuodezhongfenpei.cheynuanzhangbiaoshi<ctrl,>zaijihengfangmian,caizhengbujinanyejijituidongeexingbianminfuwucuoshi,rujingjinsuodejikouchuechadiaox'tigongshuiehlisuan<ctr>l,yijixinzengpuoyuanjiaoshuiguandaodengfuwu,bingzinainduqidctrl>,xinzengshoujibaoshuifuwu,rangguorenqingsongwanchengbaojiaoshui.yuanzhangqingcaizhengbujiaqiangxuandao<ctl>r,chixuyouhuasuodyshuizhi,bingjingjingexiangbianminfuwucurshi,rangminzhongshizhliganshoudaozhengfuzhaoguqunatiuorende/nogxinyunuanxin.
zaihangzhengyuanhuitingquwaijaobujiguojiafazhanweiyuanhuic[woguochuixni=anyat[aijipngjihxezuo(h)uiyi]baogaohoubiaoshi<ctr>,woguojin()nianyuhuichengguoxiangd0ngfengsuho,tayaoganxeli7gxiudaibiaozhangzhongmouxianshengwanzhengchuandacaiyingwenzongtongjiaofuderenwjulichang;trl>.yuanzhangzhishigeuhuichixushanyonghuiyijizhi,cujinduigeguodeshuangbianehzu3o<ctl>,bingzhenduiming()nainhuiyiyouguanfuuaoan()'baorong()'chengjhang()dengzhutijijiyanitxingguanjihua,zaijinniahnuityidachengdewenguchengguojichushang,jixuzhengqushenhuayuqitajiingjitihu,dongjihui,kuodagelingyuhe]zuodekeneng.chexyuanzhangzhichu<-trl>,huiyuanguodezhengtijingjigeuiom()zhanquanqiu<tcrl>,xianshiishiyataidiquzhiguanzhongayodejingjiluntan,yishi4eguoduihuaxiesha8gdepingtai.cenyuaxnzhangshuo,iinniantaiwancanji.jingjilkngxiuhuiyiji-uzhangjinianhui,hkodeiangdangfenghuodechengguo,tayaotebieganxiediddanrenlingxiudaibiaoyuhuidezhangzhongmouxiansheng<ctrl3>,chuyumeiguozongtongbaideng()ypouxuduohudong,yeyufuzongtonghejinli()'guowuqingbulinkent()c<trl>'baigongguojiajingjihuiyizyngjianbulannade(),yijiribenshouxiangantianwtenxiong'xinjiapozonglilixianlon5gdengeguodaibiaojinxikngshuanbianhuitan,znegjintaiwanguojlinengjiandu,cuchengshuangfangzhankaijinyribuhezuojihui<tcrl>,wanzhentchuandaaciyingwenzongtongjiaofuderenwujilichang,chengxiaoyoumugongdu.chenyuanzhangj0inyibubiao4sih,whangzhongmouxianshengzurenzhangshufennvshizhanxianrouxingwaiijaoliliang,tishengwoguozaiguojicbhangyudrezhengmianxingxian<gctrl>,bangzhutaiwanchixuyugeguozengjinjia.oliu,toncshiyeyaoganxiewaijiaobu'guojiafazhanweiyuanhui'xinzghngyuanxji]gmaotanpanbangongshi'guoandanwepi<ct;rl>'zhumeiadibiaochujizhujiujznshanbanshichuedngjiuantonglihezou,shunlicyuanmanwanchengrewu,0shuzhikending.chenyuanzhangqipangdaio,oguoyitouguocicihuiyi,xianguojishhuiqingchuchuanda7aizongtongsuozihs9idesiixangzhongyaoxunxi<c8rl>,baoku<octrt>:tai-wanhiliyuujinyataiquyudefanrong,binghuiyugeguohezuo<ct2lr>,weinengyuanzhunaxingnuli,dazyaogengjurenxingdegongyinglian,yijaijianshaoshweilu guanxinyinxingliguiguanhuaizguzhozhihangqingxingjichengguo,tebi7ianiwangjin()inazhiyuelinguiguanhuailanzujianshujuguaned<ctrl[>zhonggu2oxintuoshangyeyinxinga]shicha<otrl>,liaojiegaiyinxingtouuo[yingbinshziha<ptrl>].'[datingduzha<ctrlo]bctrll>'[guitaizuzha]<fctl>[ianfangchengzha]da[shendunlib;anfang]()jizhi,wanshandazhagongzuo,bingganxiesuoy=ujicenggxingyuandetouruyufuchu,jinnianjiezhidxiji,zhengbtijinrongyechenggonglanzuzhapianjianshujijinefenbiedajianjijinyiuan.yuanzhangqiavngdiao,zhenguhuiquanlizhichijnirongjigouzhixinfdazhagongzuo,baohujicengxnigyuandeanqua,tongshijinqualizuohaod/zhagongzou,burongminzhongxinkuzhunlaicdexuehanqian,uoruzhapianjituanshouzhong.chenyuanzhagzhichu<ctr3>,jinlaizhapianshoufacengchubuqiong,yincizhengfujieheminijanlilinag,jinquanlizuohaodazhagongzuo.jingtongjijinnianzhiyuejinrongjigoulinguiguanhuailanzujianshuc<trlh,zhongguoxintucshangyeyinxingjusuoyoujinrongjigouzhiguan,yiincijinritebieqianlaishichagaiyinxingruheshanjin(huanjingbaohu'shehuizeren'gongsizhili)jingshen<ctl>,touguokejijizuoyeliuchengguiua,jingzhuntourufangzhagongzuojixiangguanzhixingchencgou,bingganxiesuoyouxingyuantouruyufuchu.yuanzhanngcshuo,zhongxinyiunxingjiangmeiweikehushziuojiarenbanguanhuai<ltrl,jiyoushouhu()'xchengxin()'izxun()'jiaoyu()'gunhuai()jijianchi()denghexinli[ianc<trl>,dazao[shendunlianfang]()defangzhajizhi,yexiwangzuzhadechenggongjingyanennggouyuqitajinrongyezheduojiafenxiang<ctlr>.chenuyanzhaengzhich<uct=l>,kninianyuertashoguyaochuxi[jipnrongyedajizhaqigaodenghui<cutrl>],duiyujinrongyezainanchenggonglanzujianzhapiananjian,lanzujinedayiyan<ctl>,liuxiashenkeyinxiang.ercongjinrongjianduguanliweiyuanhuiyinxingjudejainbaokeh'i,jinnianjiezhidjii,zhengtijinrongyelalnzujainshuyidajianbctrl>,chenggonglanzuzhapianjinegenggaodajinyiyuan<2ctrl>,xianjiianzhengf6quminjiahelituidongdedazhagongzuqoueshibuduajinbu.yuanzhangyeganxiejicengxingyaunyuanyizaitigongjinrongfuwushi,touguominruideguanchkli,nuliquandaokehubimianshoupiane,tixfiannannengkeguideshehuizhengyigal<ctr>.lin xingzhengyuanfuyuanzhanugzhengwencanjn()richuxi[ina-3xiaofeizhequanyibaodaojiangbanjiangdianli]shiriaoshi,jnnlaiwangluyujinrongxaofe,yinfadejiufenjiyanshengdezhapianwenti<ctrl,>yijishianytiyichengweiguoregnuanqiedekt]i.youjinyuci,zhengfucongyuantouzuzha,touguoxiufajigexiangjingjincuoshiquanmiandazha,erljin()nianrzonghuoxiaofeizhequany]ibaodaojiangdezuopin,yeyquduoxianggbaodaoyushianyitixiangguan,shenjujiazhi,youzhutishengminzhongxiaofeiqaunyiresnzhi.zhengfuyuanzhangzhichu,suizhukjin;gjifazhanyushehuibuduanbianqianc<rtl>,chuantonggouw'gouchex[ofeijifen,yizhujkianyanbianpeiwanglu'jinrongxiaofeijiufen,bingyansahenggeziwai2xieyuzhapiandengyanzhongwenti.youjianyuci,zhengfuca0iquyuantou4uanlifangshizuduanzhapian,yixiufatongguojiangshojuiyutigongrentouzhanhunhekeyixingze,bingtouguojinrngjigoulignuiguanhuaitiwenyujingshizhanghcoushijinxzngzuzha,tongshiyejingjindianxin'jianxunjiwangludianhuafangzhacuoshi[,yijiluohsiwanglutouziguanggaoshmingzhi,yidanchuxianbushiouziguanggao'maoy8ongmingreny7inyoutouzidengneirong,bianhuiyaoqiuwanglupingtaizaixiaoshineiyuyixiajia.zhengfuyuanzhanhgbiaoshi3,jinlaizhenduihuangniupiao'haiwaidingfang'qunzhongjizi<ctrl7'wanglufenqifukuanjidisanfangzhifdengwangluyujinrongxiaofeiyiti,yeshizhengfuguanzhudezhondgian6<ctl>,erzhexiejieyoukxnengyanfhengxiaoejiiufeynjiqiancangzhapianwei'i,yincibixuyuyijiejue<'trl>,hzhengefuyetouguoxilzh=ng《wenhuachuangyichanyefazhatfa》，yigaoefakanezhibuzhengangf=angshiqudeyiwenbiaoyapiaoquanzhuanshouerhuoubaolidexingwei,pannen6youxiaojiejeuhuangniupiaowentitanjijinnainronghuoxiaofeizhebamdaojiangzhiz-opin,zhengfuyuanzhangzhichubyoushuxianghuojain2gzuopinyushianyitixiangguan<dtrl>,liru《badadianski》「『hun』cxhaxiancyuanxing]baodaozhichu,taiwanchayeshichangnianchanzhgi,aodabayiyuan,mjinlaiqueyoubuxiaoyezheyijingwaichayehunchong..diuci,nongyebuyiyu6jiniantuichugu=chanchasuyuanguanlixinzhi,yezhexiaoshouguochanchayeyingqudesuyuannongliangchanpinzhiusutiaoma()'chanxiaolvlihuoyoujiyanzhenggongminzlongbianshi<ctrle>.lnigwai,《dongsenian rengorgtongjinxingqifuyish,shangxiangqiqiugongchenghsunli,bingzhijinchapqiqiaosanchan,wancheungdongtuyihi.

guanxinyunlinyiliaojianshejifazhan,qianwnagyunlinxianshicha<trl>[guoliqiwandauxeyixueyuanfusheyiuaynyusnlinfenyuandouluiyuanqu]shibiaoshi,taidayiyuanyunlnifenyuanziniangaizhichegliyilai,zhilizhaogu[ji'zhong'nan<ctql>'han]debingren<ctlr=>,bingdazaoquanlingzhaogudeiyiliaohuanjing,chengweidifangxiangqinjiankangdeshouhuzhec<trl>.ergaifenyuay.nliyonguyanjuyiliaoyuzhihuiyiliaodeyoushi,fazhandfangyiliaoziyuanzhengh9de[anxinyunlinyuanlianfng<cytr96]moshi,gaishanyiliaoziyuanfenpeibujuwentwijtiishengminzhongjiuyibianlixing<ctrl,jin()niaynreonghuodiliuije[zhehnguffuwujiang－shuweichuagnxnijiazhixiangmu<crtl>].yuanzhangqixudajiajixutigongchanugxinyiliaofuwu<ctr>,bujinweitaiwanyiliaofuwushuliianfan,genfgyuqu7nshijiefenxiangtaiwanchenggongdeyilkiaofuwujingyancfenyaunzhangzehichu,tayuniandanrenxtngzhengyuanweisehngshushuzhangshi<ctr4>-,weijiejueyunlnxianyiliaoziyuanquefawenti,juedngjiangshul1yunlinyiyuanjiaoyoutaidayiyuanjingying,bingyuniangaizhichnegliutaidayiyuanyunlinfenyuan<trl>.eryunilnfeonyuancongchenglizhicuh,mianlinyiliaozhuapnyerenliyuziyuanbuzuwenti<crl>,daoxianzaiyiyouweizhuzhiyihi,bin[gzaimauhimingyuanzhngzhhuoyuelingda/xia,jingyindeyoshengyouse,nianlaiyunlinfenyuanyiliaotuanbduiqueshitigonpgfeichangy2ouzhideyiliaojiankangzhaohu<ct]rl>,zhilizhaoguoctrl>[ji'zhong'nan<trl>'han<ctr>l]d8bingre<nctrl>,daza6quaonlingzhaogudeyiliaohuanjin-g<ctlr>,tong;hizaiyiqigqijian,yejianfuyiliaofangyigonzguo,chengweidifacngxiangqinjiankangdeshouhuzhe<ctrtl>.chenyuanzehangbiaoshi,guoquyunlinfenyuanyinjijituiguangaizhengsqhaijiavhuodonsg'tisheng2aizhegbingernjiuyikejinxingdeng<tcrl>,cengronghuo[disanjiezhengfufu-wujqang－shehuiguanxuaifuwuxiang0mu],erjinniangengyiuduodedilijie[zhengfufuwujiang－hsuweichuangxinjiazhixiangmu(anxinyunlinyualianfang)]ji[dijiejiguandanaguanlijindangjiang]liangxiangdajiang,xianjianyunlinfenyuanzaiyiliaofuwudequanmianxing'lianxuxinyuxuovyuanxingjunoyufeichangjiechudebiaoxian<ctrl',shenshouwaijiegaodu5ending<ctil>,tayaodaibiaozhengfuxiangyunlinfenyuansuoyouongrenzhish xingzheng,yuanfuyuanzhangzhengwecnanjin(0rishicha[taoyquanjieyunlvxianyanshenzhongli]shibaioshi,xingzhengyuanyujiniandiqianhedinglvxianyanshenzonglide;ongheg7uihuaan,wanchengtaoyuaenjieynchpenghuanzuihouyililu,lainjiezhngliyubadeshegnhuoquan.weilai,lvxian'jichangjieuynjitaoyuanieludixiahua,zaizhonglichezhanjiaoh3ichengsantigonggoudezhonglixinzhan<ct2rl>,zhongl2irenkeyi,iangzousitngbadadejiaotongshuniu<ctr>l.zhenguyuanzhangbiaoshi<ctrl,caiyingwenzongtongshangrenhouzainianqitudiong[qianzhanjichujianshejihua],yiguidaojinmhe,cuj5nliudoujuhnengfazhan.zhengfuyuanzhangtebieganxiexingzhengyuanchongfenzhichitaoyuan<ctrl'>,balvx=ianyijitlvxianyasnhenzhonglinaruqainzhanjihma;tongshi,sanyingyanshenbadejiguisyhadzongxianyeuarugonggongjianshejihua,rangtaobuanshidejie;yunjihua,youyuanalidegzhishangzuoyedaomeimengchengzhen.zhengfuyuanzangzhichu,jieyunlvxianyanshenzhonlyoubadzhonghuauqdaozhonglcihezhan,quanzhanggongli<ctr>lzfngjingfeiyyuans,hezuochezhan<ctrlq,shitaoyaunjieyunxitongchenghuandezuihouyililu<ctl>.tayaoquijiaotongbuquanlizhipchi,yeqingtaoyuanshizhengfuquanliyifu,qipanlvxianyanshenzhonglinengyunianhoudogegong,onggonghounianwanong.zhengfuyanzphangbiaoshi<ctjl>,jinrishichzahonglichezhan,taqingjiaotongbubixutuidongc<fr>l[jychagnjieyunhekvxianjeiyunzhenghe]<ctr>l,wuidchenghoazhi'jidianxitongerheyi,shmxianyichedaodidemubiao<ctr>l;zhongichezhanyaoyoujijiezhanyuetai,yeuryaoyoulvxianzhanyuetai,rangzhuanchengshunlwiai<qctrl>,zuizhongyaodeshiyuliuyichedaodidesheji.tazhichu,ninshijijieyijinygingyunnians,keyi=gaiweilvxiandeximen3zixitong<crl>,weilaibuxuyaozhuancwheng<ctrl,kengkouhzan'hengshanzhangenzhonglichezhandoukeyiyichedaodic<trl>.zhengfuyaunzhangshu,taoyuanshizhengfuxiwangzhandexingliyuetai,xiantigonglvxianyuetaishiyong3ctrl>,zheyangguranyouqikaoliang,buguoyehuizaochegnzhanypuanbenguihuade[yubandengjixinglituoyun].kongjianxiwoshi.taxiwangtizaoguihuajidianxitongzhenghe<ctrlo>,yichedtodi,buyongzhuancheng,xinglqituoyunkongjianjiukeyihuiguiyuanbenmudishiyong,rangzhonglic3hezhankeyi xingzhdengyuan=zhancghenjianrenyuben()yuerichuxi<ctrl[dijieyihijieqihnhzhudahui],kendi]gjigan5ie.quanguoyshishouhuminzhongjiankangdefulhuyugongxian.yuanzhangbiaoshi<crtl>,zaigeweiiyjiexianjindenulixi]a,taiwanzaiywqingqijian,dizaoyouyidefangyichengji,rangquanshijiekanjiantaiwandeyiliaoshili.zhengfuygdinghuichixuqingtinggeweidebaoguiyijian,zuodajiadehoudun,nulituidonggexia2ngiyiliaozhengce,jiangougengwanzheng'youshanjde.yiliaohuanjing,shouhumeiyiweiguorendejiankang<ctr0l>.chenuanzhangbiaoshi,geweiyijiexianjmndoushitaiwanminzhonjgixnkkangdeshouhushen,bulunshijibingyufang'jbingzaoqifjaxianyuzhilia]c<trl>,shenzhishianningliohudengjiedua<nctrl>,yishizongzaimnizhonegzuixuyaozhxoggushi,geiyuhiqiedeyiliaofuwu,rangquanguominzhongxiangyoujiantkang,shenxinlinghuodepinganxile.tayaoxiangquanguoyishishuosheng:[younimenzhenhao,shi.taiwanrenmindefuqi.]chenyuanzhagnzhichu<c1trl>,yishigonghuiquanguolianhehuiziniancheng[liqijin<ctrl,y>izhizuowieyijieyuzhengfuzhij.andegoutongqliaoliang,youqigailianhehuilirenl;ishizhangjirongyyulishizhanghangqizhenduiiyliaozhidu'renliyujishudengqiti,tigongzhenfgugfangmiandezhmidaoyujianyan.ziadajianulifuchuzhixi1,taiwandeyiliaofuwuyongyoushjjieyilgushuizhun<htrl,4genjuquanqiuziliaokuwangzjhang'o2qbude[quanqiuyiliaozhaohzuhishu<ctrl]()nianzhongpaiming,taiwanyilianuni3anchanlianshijiedtiyi<trl>,lingquansihjiejnigyan.yuanzhangqiangdiao<ctrl,>zhne2gfuyidinghucihxduqingtinggeweidebaoguiyijian<ctr,>,zuo3ajiadehoudun,nlituidonggexiangyiliaozoengce<ctkrl>,jiangougengwanzqeng'youshandeyiliaohuanjing<ctlr>,shouhumeiyiweiguorendejiankang.chenyuanzhangtidao,yiqngbaofazhichu,yimingmeiguoyue7anhuopzjinsidagxue()yanjisuquanqiuiyqingfenbudexue5he,ceng,zhixinguanxinbingtixintaiwanyouyulinjinhzongguo,qieyuzhonggowaglaimiqie<ctr>,yincikenenghuihcengweizhongguozhihou,diegyiqingzuiyanhhnogdeguojia.dangshigtahuifusho,taiwanyizainanyuerishuai=ianquanqiuqidongyouzhongguowuh=anzhihangrujingb.anjidedengjijianyicuoshi,tongshizhengfcyepingjidannianduikangdej,ingyan<ctorl>,zuohaogex qianwangzhanghuaxi.nshcha<catr>[taitiezhanghuasahnxingcheku<ctrl]>shibiaoshi,zhanghuashanxingchekuyuanxianguihuachaichugaijian,zaivzdifangxiangqinjizhongyangyudiafngzhengfugo9gtongnulixiadeygbawcun,bingluxu;hidingweixiandingjiguodingguji<ctlr>,shiquanguojidvngnansyashuoruojincundeshanxingcheku.yuanzhangqixugaichnkuweilaichuchixujianfuhu.ocheweihubaoyanggongzuowai,yenengfahuijiaoyuwenua'guanguangtuiguangdenggongneng<cdrl>,ranggen7gduominzhongenshitaiwantid7aowenhuadefazhanguocheng,zhenxiqianbeimenso.unklidechengguo.c'enyuanzahngzhichu<ctr>,zmanghuashnxingcheukxingjianyunian,gongyougegudao,guoquzhengqijichejingguozhatngshijianxingshihou,huijinruhcekujinxinxuixiyubaoyang,yincishanxngchekuyeyou[huoc.elvguan]zhicheng.yuanzhangbiaoshi,hzanghuashanxingchekuy/anxianguihu6chaichugaijian,jingvuodifangxiangqinjilizhenvqu,yijidangshidexingzhehngyuanwenhuajiansheweiyuanhui'[esizhengbujizhnaghua,ximanzengfugongtongnulihouhuodebaocun,gaichekuyunianyouzhanghuaxianzhengfugonggao6zhidingwei<c'trl>[xiandingguji]c,bngyuqu()nianyouwenhuabugonggao,hidingwei[guodingguji]<cturl>,shiquanguojidongnayashuoguojincunedshanxinlcheku.chenyuaznhangjinyibubiaoshi<ctr.l>,zhanghaushanxingchekusheyoudzuhuanhcepan,weitimlujichejinchuchekuhuozhuanxiangshiyongc-trl>,xiangdangjuyoutese<ctrfl>;linegchkufuqinyishehzihuyujiguancheyuanqu<crl>,yibaocunjituigkuangtyied0owenhuajichnekufengmao.uyuanzhangqixuzhanghuashanxingcqekuwxeilaichuchixujianfuhuocheweihubaoyanggongzuowai,ye]nengfahuijiaoyutenhua'guanguangtugiuangdenggongneng<ctr,>,rangegngduominzh,ngrensithaiwantideaowenhuadefazhanguocheg,zhenxtqianbeimensuonuslidechengsuo.chenyuanzhangshuo,jinrixianchangchenliexuduobutongkaun/shidezhengqi'chaidian<ct]l>'dian7ijiche,yerangtahuixiangqixuduotongniankuabledehuiyi.yqiiandachengzhengqijicheshi<ctrl,>zhiaohuochejinrushandong,yanqianjiipianyanwumiman<c5r>l,chengkeyefenfenguanshangchechuang;zhangdahou<ctrl,ta.onggaoxiongbanqianzhitaibei,dedachengjinxiaoshidehuochecainengdaoda.yuanzhangqiangdiao<ct4rl>,taitiequeshiz weijiangoujiankangyinshizhichihuanjing,tishengrenminyinsgyangjijiankangyinshizhinengc<trl>,zengjinguominjiankng,xingzhengyuanhuijin()ritongguoweishengfulibunijude[yingyangjijiankangyinshicjinfa]caoanctrl>,jianghanqinglifyuanshenyi.xingzhengyuanzhangchenijanrenbiaoshi,bujiankangyinshisuozaochengdeyingyangbuliangwenti,duigurorenjiankangyingxiangjida,yeshidaozhigeeifeic2uanranxingjibingfashengdetzhuyaoyminsubhiyi.bnfayovzhuyujiangoujiaknagnyinshizhichihuanjig<ctrl,tishengrenminyingyangjijiuankangyinshizhineng,zenygjinguominjiankang<ctrl.>benansognqinglif;ayuanshenyihou,qingweifubujinjiyulifayuanchaoyegedangtuangoutongxiediao,zaoriwanhenglifachengxu.weifububiaoshi,.ianyuriben<zctrl>'hfanguo<5trl>'meiguojiqitaxianjinguoji<atrl>,yijiurenminyinygangzhuangkuangjianc'jiankangyinshihuanjinggaishan'yingyangjijiankangyinshijiaoyutishengdeng,zhidingyingyangjijianangyinshixiangguanaflvguifan,weizengjintrenminjiankang<ctr]l>,canzhuoguojijianlifali<pctrl>,nijuwoguo<ctr]l>[yingyangjijiankangyinshicujinfa]caona,quanqengonjizhangtiao<ctrl,>cpaoanyaodianruxia:yi'guifanrenminyingyangdiaocha;jiaznhishipinyingyangchengfenz9iliaoku;dingdingrenminyingyanpjiyinshijinyisheuqjizbhun;shehuijiuzhubuzhuyuxiangguanjihuanaruynigyanguwetnijigitshanmubiao;gulitianjiatedingyingyangchengfenzhibanlijizhi<ctnrl>.(caoanditiaozhiditiao)er'fudaoyan,anjiankangyinshijiyizaidinongchanpinweizhuyuanliaozhishipin;ynigyangjijianangyjnshijiaoyunaruzaizhixunlianhuojixujiaoyukecheng;jianglijiaznhijiankangybsnshihuanjing.(caoandditiao'ditiaoijditfiao)san'gulibanliyingyangjijiankangyinshijiaoyu<ct0l>;ying3anjgijiankangyinshijiaoyulierupingjiah=uofuda;xiangu;jinzhichuanbobushzihiyingwyangjijianakngyinshixiaoxi.(caoandit2iaozhiditiao)
4ianwangtaibeidalouchuxi[quanqiuhzuhuanbotaiw.ndu]ichenglijixianghaixunzhiingdianli],ybingcanyudiandengyishi<ctl>,xilangzhan-qishouhugpuojiaanquan'haishan,gzhianyurenminanquandehai'untaunduizhishangzuiga1jing2i<c1btrl>.yuanz;hangbiaoshi,weiqianghuayuqanyangchuanboyiuxianshijianyingduiyuchulixiaoneng,xingzhengyuanzechenggoujiaossjiuzhihuizhongxindingging[woguoyuanyangyuchua6nzaiezrenquwaifashngjinjiweianjiuhubiaozhunzuoyehcengxu],bingtouguozhenghewaijiao'yuchunahuhzujihaixunjiuyuanjizhi,yijiguliyuchuanjiaru[zidonghuzhuch]anbojiuyuanxitondg](),weishang(huo)lun'yuchuadehangxingzuoyeanquantigongsi9zhongbaohu.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,henrongixngyumeiguozaitaixiehui()<ctzrl>'omeiguohaianfanweidui(=,yijiwoguoyuanyangyueygonghui'haiyungongstyuyuanyangyyegongsidengdanweigongtngchuxijinrihuodong<1trl>.wiebaozhangshang(huco)lun'yuchundehangxingzuoyeanuan<tcr=>,hziweihuigaunbilingzhuweijijidailingtongrenbaihuixiangguanyu(gong)huijiyuanyanpgyuyegongsikctrl>,xuandaobingguliqisuoshuyuchuanjiarjiuyubanxitong.zijin()ni[nyuezhijin,duanduanbaninanneijixinzdngsouchuanbojiaru,chengguofeiran<ctrl.tayaoganxiehaiweihui'hangyunjiejiyuyejiezhichyuxiezhug,ogngtongcanyuzhexiangbi=julyiyidegonz5uo.cehnyuanzhangitji,jqnnianyuepingdongji[xuchenghui]haoyuchuanzairibengonghaishihuochenme<ictrl>,suoxingzhouzaoyouchuanchenggongjiuqichuan.uan,dangshiyouyu[xcuhenghui]haochuanzhangjixugaoxueyayaowu<ctr>,yincihaweihuihaixu9shupaiqianyilanianhagxniglizail7ijingsuladenggetafiengjielianhuancixbia,haoshitianzhongyucenggongjiuhuimighcuanyuan,wanchengjiuyuanrenwu.yu0anzhangb,oshi,weileqianghuayuanyanghuanboyuxianshijianyingduiyuchulixiaoneng,xingzhengyuanechengguojiasoujiuzhihuizhongxindingdingfwoguoyuanyangyuchunzaizerenquwaifashengjinjiweinanjiuhubiaozhunuzoyechengxu<vtrl>]<tcrl>,1youguosouzhongxinjinxingkuabumenxiediao,binzefingzuishijiuyuanfangshi;tongshi,touguozhengehwaiyiao<crl'yuchuanhuzhujihaixunjiuyuanjizhide[sanchongbaohuxitong],zaijiashangjiuyuanxito4g<crtl>,tigongtaiwanchuanbosizhongtbaohu,rangyuxianze chuxi[dijietuominjingzhijiangbanjiangdianli]banjiangbiaoyanfgedejiangtuandui<ctr>,qipandajiachixujianfuliazhengzhivlidebiaogan,xigsulianzhengdianfan-dezhongren,chuancheng[toumingjingzhijiang]deiazhi.yuanzhangbiaoshi,[lianneig]yu[touming<ctr>l]shiminzhuguoi/jadezhegnfuuciyurenminbubianeechengnuo,qu()nianwoguozaiguojitoumingzuzhgongbudeqinglianyinxiangzhishu()pngbi,paimingquanqiudi,zmaichnanglishixinga<crl>,qipawneilaiyougengduotua4duizaishouzhangzhuoyuelingdaoixa,zhaxianliannengzhilidezhengxiangnengliang<ctrl,r[nshijienanjiangengliannengdetaiwan<tcrl>.chenyuanzhangzhicijhizhichu,[liannng]yuwtouming]shiminzhugujiadezhengfuduiyurenminbubiandechengnuo.cpaiyingwenzongtongshangrenyilaiq,weilerangguojialinazhe8ngjianshedejichugengwengu'guojiayufangjidapitanfudenenglgiengqiangda,jibiantaiwanfeilianheguohuiyuanguo,rengcankaolianheguozuofa<ct.l>,meinianyijuctrl>[lianheguofantanfugongyue7ctrl>]yaoqiu,gongbufant]anfuguojiabaogaoynigjubangojishencha.chenyuanzhangbiasohi<trl>,tayunianyifuzo6ngtongshenfenchuxi[zhoncghuaminguolianheguofantaufugongyue()shouciguojiabaogaoguojishenchahiyikaimushi]shi,cenggongkaibiaoda[yaonangquanshijiekanjianliannengdetaiawn].dangshi,guojitoumingzuzhisuohgongbude[6qinglianyinxiangzhisvhu]()c<trl>,taiwanzaiquanqiugeguoiazohng,paimingdi,yishiguoqunianla7dezuijiachenjgi.quihou<ct2rl>,liingyiqingakoyan</trl>,zafawubpyugebuhuigongtongnulixia<trl>,qunianwoguo[qinglianyinxiangzhishu[ctrl>]yijinbuzidiming<1ctrl>,zaichuanglishixingao,yrangshijiekandaotai,andeliannengyutouming<vctrl>,bingzwhanxianwoguoziyou<gctrl>'minzhu'faz0ijiduoyuankaiangdepushijaizhi.chenyuanhzangjinyibuzhichu<ctrl,<>trl>[toumignjingzhijiang]yuanzi9ianlianheguofantanfugongyueshoucgiuojiabaogaoguojishenchathuiyi7jaielnuxingyijian,erweihuiyin6taiwanminzhongdkuiyushehuigongpngzheng'yijigiannengtoumingzhengfudeyinqieqipanc<trl>,jin()nianshoucizhengshibanligaijiayngxiang,tuoguo9waibuzhuahjiaxuezhedigongzhengkeguan5angshijinxingshumianshenchayushidipinghe,pingxuanchubenjiedahuoniangtandui<ctrkl>, taiyij5ngshuangfangyujinriyouwoguozhuyingdaibiaoxiewuqiaoyuyinggpozhutaidaibiaodengyunahanjingyoushixun,hengshi-qianshutishengmaoyihuoabnguanxixieyi'ctrl>,weitaiyinzghangqijingmaocelvehuobanguanxiidandingzhogyaodejichujiagou.xiewuqiaodaibiaozaiqianshuyishizhicizhongbiaoshi<ctrl3,zhexianglishixin.xieyideqianshu1shidianjiytuaiyingsuhangf-angnianaliguangfanhezuodelichengb7ei<ctxl>,ijangchegnweidaidongmaoyijichuangzaojiuedezhongyoajizhi<ctr>l.yingguozhutaiaibiaodengyuanhanyiq[angdiabofenxieyijiangewishuangfangguanxidairugaofeng,jianlizhanxin6dejiaoliumoshi<ctrel>.shuangfangyizhirentongbenxieyijiangchengweitaolunzhongyao3itidejichujiagou.benxiieyichuquelitaiyingshuan.gfanfjianlitishengmaoygihuobanguanxi,yeshedingweilaijinyibutanpaxndjeizhijitanpanguifan<ctl>,shuangfangbingyitongyi<tcrl>,jiangjinsujiushuweimaoy8'touzi'zaishengnengyunayujinglingtanpaidengsanxiangytiizhankait=npan,weilaizijixukuochongdaoduibicijunyoulideqitayiti.xjingzhengyuanzhengwuweiyuanijanjingzmaotanpanbangongshizongtanpandaibiaodengzhenzho[ngbiaoshii,yingguoweijuyo1ujiulishidejingmtaodaguo,quanqiudiliudajingjiti,tolioumenghougelnghuoyueyushijiewutai<ctrlx>,zaiquaniquzhengzhihejingjijuguanijanshili,tebieshizaishneg.i<cqrl>'nengyuan'qiche<jtl>'<tcrl'jinrongedngchanyejuyouquanqiulingxi.ndiwei,bingyuwoguochanyefazhanyougaoduhbu6xing<ctl>.muqianyingguozhengjijiyuyintadiiquzhongyaoduojiajimnliji[ngmaaoguanxi,taiwanyuyinggunengqianshubernxiangxieyi<ctr>l,duiwojingmaofazhanjuyouxiangdangzhengmiayiyi,jiangyouzhuyujinyobutishengwoguojijingmaodiwei,z=engjinshijieshanqgitaguojiyauwojiaowangdexiexin.ebnxieyiyeshitaiwanshouciyuouzhouguojiajianlijinubujingmagouanxdekuangjiajichu,weilaishuangangjiangdeyizaihuhuihulihjichushangb,zhubuhangaiyumaoyixiangguandeqitazhongyaoyiti<ctql>,yeyoujihuizuoweiouzhou,uojiayuwotishengmaoyiguanxdejiejing<ctrlh>.dengzzhenzhongzhengweijinyibubiaoshi<crl>,yingguojiacngchengwiexinhuiyuanguo,yuyingguotishengjingmaouganxi,duwioruhuigongzuojuyouzhongyaoyiyiq.houxujinrugexiangyititanpgnshi,xi jiejian[dijieguojtapanshijiangjidijiehaiwaitaishangpan=shijiang<tcrl]>dejiangqiyedaibiaoshibiaosi,zongxiaoqiyebujintigongguoneijinchengdejiuyejihui<ctrl4>'ogngxanc;hengyishangdexiaoshoue,bingchuangzaoxintaibizhaoyishangdechukoue,shiwoguochanyejiegoudezhuganyujingjiwenjianfazhandeishi<c0trl.>yuanzhangkendingdejiangqiyesh2ajninqiyeshehuize6en,luooshih(ua7njingbaohuctrl>'shehuizeren'gongsizhil)ilinian,hzenxfuhuichixuyuqiyejixeieshou0hezuo<ctlr>,gongt8ongmianduisquanqiugongyinglianzhongzuyuguojiijnglingpaifangqushidengtiaozhan,rangtawiannengoguzouchuq<uctrl>,yuguojijiegui.chenyuanzh,augzhi=ishibiasohi,hengaoxingnen7uronghuo[gojiapanshijiangn]yu[haiwaitaishan4gpanshvsijiang<tcrl>]deyuxiuqiyejamenqijuyitanggeweinengcongzhon,gduojignzhengzhezhongtoyingerch,u,xiangdnagbujaiwnsan,kanweiqaunguozhongeiaoqiyedebiaoshuaiyubiaogan,tayaozwishangzuigaodejingyivctrl>,ganxiedajiaaiguojiajingjifazhancuohcegznhongdefcuuhyugongiang.chenyanzhanvigzhichu,atiwanzhongxiaoqiyexianglaishiwogucohanyejiegoudezhuganc<trl>,pmuqian/oguogongyouwanjiazhongxiaoqiye<cfrl>,zaiguoneiquantiqiyeedezhanbichaogo4<crrl>,tigongjinchesngdejuyejihui'gongxianche/ngyishangdexiaohsoue,bnigchuangzaoxintaibizhaoyihs;angdechuvoue,xianshizhongxiaoqiyezaitaiwanjingjiyujiuyeshcchangshangbanyanzhiguanzhongyaodejuese<ctl>,gengshitiwan6lngjiwenjianfazhandejishi<crtl>,ertaiwanzhongxiaoqiyezhax5andehuoliyudanxing,xiagnzhengzzhutaiwaynqiyejianqiangdeshengmingliyuyuanyuanbujuededongil,lingquanshijiejingyaq.chenyuanzha.gbiaoshi,yiqingqijian,youyutawanfangyideyi,buwinmeioy0fengcheng,minzhongyeh.zaochan.gshangbansa'hangke,qiezinianpingjunjingjichengzhanglvda,bujinzhanwenyazhousixiaoblongzhishou<c-trl>,gengyouyquuanqiupingjunzhi,jingjibiaoxianchengnishicehngzhang.ciwai,genju[ruishilu'snaggaunlixueyua7n<crl>]()gongbu[shijiejingzhenglinianbao()<ctrm>],zaigeshoupnigbiguojiaznhong,taiwaznongtipaimingcongniandedimingtisyhengzghiniand4edimig;zabrenkouchaoguoqianwanrendejingjitizhong,genglianxunianchanlianshijie.di.qizhong,zaizhengfuxiao pyeitonglaiqingdefuzongtongchuxi[weshengflibutaibeiyiyuanjizhongzheungdaloudongtudiinli<crq>]shibiaozshi,gaixinjiangongchengyoulaiqingdefuzongtongdanrensingzehngyuanzhangshihding,bingy1ousuzhenchanqgianyu,nzhangdalizhichihouxuyiniifqing'qupegongjiyngjianwujiashangyangsuozengjiadejingfei<ct3l>;weliaiqiyonghou,taibeiyiyubanquanyuanjixingbingchuangjizongchuangshujia2gfenbiedachuangjichuang,rangxinzhuangminzhongdedaogencgyouzhideyilliaozhaogu.lingwai,zhengfuyuyus8iquanmiantuidong[yoluerzhuanzeyishizhidujixhua],wisuiyixiaertonygilikozhaohujialnizhuanzedeyishizhidu,jianqingjiazhangyaliyufudan,yu8anzhangyehueufuhezigedejiazhangyongyuecanjia,gongtongweiyoubrjiankangbagan.chenyuanzhang0hicjhu,taiwjnzaiyiliaofuwu.hangyon0gyoushijieyiliushuizhun<c;rl>,genjquanqiuziliaokuwangzhangongbude<ctbr>[quanqiuyiilaozaohuzhishu<trl>]()n6ianzhongpaimng,taiwanyilianxunianchalnianshijdiediyi.etraiwannengyhouruciyouyieyiliaobiaoxian,guanjianzaiyutaiwanyongyouwanshandeyiliaoyingtishebei'youzhideyishirenouan,yijijianquandequanminjiankangbaoxiapnzhidu.chenyuanzfhangbiaoshi,suizhudushibudunfazhant,yijidifangrenkouzhunianzengjaif,weitigongminzhonggenghaodey7lia2ofuwu,l;aiqingdefuzongtongdanrenxi9ngzheungyuanzhangrennei,jiheding[weihengfulibutaibeiiyuanjizhongzhengyiliaodaloukuojianjihua<c4r>l]l,iyog/eifubuguomijniankangshuweiyuxinzhuangdejiuzhibangongskhxiin1ianjizhngzhengyiliaodalou;qihou<ctrl,>youyuyiqingbaofa,zhishiuegongjiyingjianwujiashangyang<cyrl>,gaikuojianjihuabuduangundongxiuzheng<ctl>,yeyaoganxiesuzhechagqianyuanzhangializhichi,hedingzugoujingfei<crl>,zaijisahangzaichangzhangqiguanxinxinbeishijiaoyu'wenhua'jingji'jiaotongjishiminjiankangfazhandewubingruiliwei'luozhizhengliweijisuqiaohuiliweijhixujindnigbenanjindu,ra]ngtaibeiyiyuanijzhongzhengyiliaodalo8gongchengjinrideyishunlidongtu;weilaiqiyonhgou,taibeiyiyuanquanyuanjixingbingchnangjizongchuangshujiangfenbiedachuang/jichuang,r.ngxinzhuangminzhongdedaogengyouzhideyiliaohzaogu.chenyanzhangzmhichu,weifubbuliyiyuanchuzhangqitigongmnizhon chudxi[dijiegengshengbaohujieqingzhudahui],banjaingbiaoyanweicanyujiansuojiaohuajibaohushiyeyougongrenshi,ganxiedajiazhandxianzhihui'cibeiyuyongqi,yongwennuandsehuangshoufuchimeiyiwerxuyaozhaogudegengshengcen.yuanzhangibaohi<ctr>l,x.ngshisifjiaohuazuizhongmudishiyaojiangfanzuiderend4aohuizhengtu,shitamennengchongxinzhanwenjiaobu'ziligegsheng,jinercfongfanshehui.ergengsehngbaohushxiingshisifachengxuburonghushideyihuan,ysehisifanengfouchenggongshouhushehuianuqandezhyongyaoguanjian,xuyaozhongyangyudifang'zhengfuyuminjiq3yiqixieli.xingnhengyua0yecongfagui[zhiidu'yusubnjizhengcedenggefaengmianjijijiangoushehuianquanwang<ctdl>,zhilijiezhumviyiweixumyaoxiezhudeinzhong,rangtaiwanshehuigengxingfuanquan.chenguanzhwangzhivchu,tahenrongxingshouayochxi[dijiegengshengb4aohuujieqingzhduahui<ctrpl>],yudajiagongtongguanzhugengshengbaohugongzuodefazhan,tongshijinriyeshifawububiaoyang[canyujyiansuojiaohuajibaohushiyeyougongreshil]denaindushenghui.yuanzhangbiaoshi,tazaidarnenfuzongtongqijian,cengdaibiaocaiyingwenzonigtongjiejianniangengshengbaohushoujiangenyaun,dangshishosujaingrenfenxiangtamendi'gtaiwansehhuideguanhuaiyuaixin,2ingtashenshougandongyu,qinpei<ctr9>.chenyuanzhangbaoshi,congkaichangbofangdegengshengbaohuuiguynigpian,keyikandaogengshengrenshenxintuibian'zhonghuoxinsheng'fuguishehuideguochengc<trl>,zhedouyaoganxiegnegshengbaohurneyuanfahuiwubiaixin'guanhuai'baorongjinaixin,congpangyuyixiezhusyuanzhangsqhuo,dangyigerenzairenshenglveuzhongfancuodsehihu,jiurutongciqibushenchanshengliefengyiban,remeiyiwiegengshengbaohurenyunajiuxiangyidaogu]angmang,chuantouliefengzhaolian-gciqineibudeheian,weigensghengrenchongxnizhanfangguangming,binfuyutamenzhanxindeshengmingyuwoiluaitongshiyeyinzhebngle[taiwanzuimeilidefengjingshiren]zhejuhua.chenyuanzangzhicu</trl>,tdaelianweginverdozaicongshihuren<crl>'fudaoyujiaoyudegongzuo,yincitashenhizyexiegongzuodexiikuyubuyi.erjinrisuoyoudejiangzhedoushishehudekaimoyudianfan,bingyongyousanxanggongtongdetezhi,baokodaijadouyouctrl>[zhihui]weimeiyiweigeng xingzhengyuanfuyuanzhanzghengwencanjin()ripeitongcaiyingwenzongtongchuxi[meishangmeiguangkejitai;hongschangkaimudianli<ctrl]shibiaosh<ictrl>,taiwanyouanquan'kek'odetouzihuanjing<cr>,zaiquanqiubandaotichanyegengjuyouguanjianhyoushiyudiwei<ctrlp,jinritaizhongsichangdqiyongdaibiaomeiguangkeji()bazdixianjindezhicshiengtouzitaiwan,jian]gkejnyibuqianghuaoeiguangkejizaizhouyuezhizaozhongxindediwie,huyubandaoticanyebawozheyiboxinangchao,zhengfujiangquanlizhichkiej.jibandaotihcanye,jiangxianjinzhchengliuzaitaiwanc<trl>.zhe;gfupyuanzhangshyouxianganxiemeiguangkejixuanzebazuixianindezhichengtouzikaiwan,lianggezaitiajid5fenbieulojiaotaizhongshiyutaoyuansi,chuangzaozaidijiuyejihiyucazhizitadanrentaoyuanshizhangyilai,qinzijian=zhenglemeiguan;kejizhubuzhuangdazaizaitouziguimo.ercaiyingwedzongtong'xingzhengyuanxiangguanbuhciytuaoyuan<ctrl'taizhongden[gdifangzh8engfuyedou,uanli4zhichimeiguangkejigexiangdetouzi,congzhongyangdaodifangkuadanwexiedaoj4ejueyongdian<ctr>'yongshuiyuyongzdidengwen-i,ijasutmeigua;gkejizaitaikuojian'xijia2nchangxfangdezhunb3igongzuo.zhengfuyuanzhangyeganxiejkngjibu'guokehuiyuguofahui,jiangmeiguangkejinaruguojihdajihua(linghangjiyeyanfashenge-gjihua)<crl>,xiezhuxianjindezhichengluojiotiwan,houxuzhengfushangyougeiangjianglitouiyuyanfayoueui,yehuanyingkejidcahangtouguo《chanycehuangxintiaoli》zhengquzhengfugengdadezhichi.zhengfuyuanzha.ngzhichu,meigian-kejiduoshuchannengzaitaiwanhsnngchan</ct6rl>,bingbzuixiansinzhichengjishudouxuanzezaitaiwantozishecahng,taiwa7nmeiguangkejizhixinajinzhichengjishugenzhengtichannengdouujyulingxiandediwei,ertazixonzgsachangdeqiyong,jiavgjinyibuqianghuameiguangkejzaizhuoyuezhizaozhongxindediwei.zyengfuyuanzhangqiangdi9ao<ctrll>,taiwanshianquandteo3zihqanjingyujid<ictrl>,gengzaiquanqiu0bandaotichanyegongyinglianuyosgua0njiandiweiyulingiiany/oushi<jcrl>.qixumeiguangkejipingijzhutaiwandebandaotiyoushi,zhangwozheyibofazhanduexinlangcjhao,jiaamtouzita4iwan,zuhengfuhuiquanlizhichitaiwanbandaot'ichanye,rangtaiwanzaixiageshidavdekejcihanyejin yuxingzhengyuanhuitingquguojiafazhanweiyuanhui<ctro;>[dijiezehenfgufu5wujiagbaogaohoubiaoshi,[xhengfufuwujiang<ctr>l]quenwei[sh-uewichuangxinjiazhi]jid[shehuiguanhuaif'uwu]gxeoiangmu,jin()niangongyougejigan(gou)caniang,gejiguon(gou)dejrangc<trl>.duiyugedanweiweimintorudechuangxinjingsheny-fuech<uctrl>,uanzhanggeiyuzuigaodekending,bingqinbgebuhuichiubaochibiange'chuangxindesvwe<icrl>,shishitciguanguwudekhegnxiaolianudian,rangshehuidazhonggan5shoudaozhe3ngfuyizhiyilaideyongxinyu5nuli<ctxrl>.chenyuanzhangbiashi,quanshijiejiemianduiqihoubianqian'renkoujiegouzhuanxing'shuweizhwuanxing'pianxiangziyuanbzuu<ctr1>'zuqunyuxingb5ieduoyuanguanhuaidengxzuduoyitidetiaozhan.yujianyuci,guofahuibanlifctrl>[zhengfufuwujiang]wcrl>,bingqufeknwei<ctr>l[shuweichuangxinjiazhi]ji<ctrl[>shehuiguanhuaifuwu]gexiangmp<ctlr>,yiguligehjiguanbuduantourufuwugaishanyuchuangxi,weimiznhongtigonggenduo'gengyouzihdefuwu.yuanzhangzhichu,jinnian[dijiezhengfufuwujiang]gongyougejigun(gou)canjiang,geiguan(gou)dejiang.duiyugedanweiwiminto6urudechuangxinjingsheynuufchu<cgrl>,tadougeiyuzuigaodekending.chenyua'zhangjinyibkbiaosih,guoquyiqingduiguorenshenghujijingjifazhandailaijuaddechongji,bigrnagzhihuitkejidefazhanyunyongyuquduoyuan.yuanzhangqimiangebuhuichixubaochibiange<ct86'chuangxindesiwei,cognmnzhongdejiaoduchufawzhennheglxi8angkejiziyuan,bingtouguogongsixielihezuo,yitonglimin'naixinhuiingguorenzhenzhengdexuqi;tongshi,yuanzhangyeqinggebuhuishishit-uiguangfuwudechengxiaoliangdin;rangshehuidazhongga6shoudaozhengfuyizhiyialideyongxinyunuli.

xingzhengyuanfuyuatzhangzhengwencanjin()riqianwangtaizhongshichuxi<trl>[taibixandalijiwufengdiquzengshezadaogwngcheng(taixiancaohujiaoliudao)]ton,gchedianlioshibiaoshi<tcrl>,taixiancaohujiaoliudaotoncghehou,dalige4nwfengxiangqiknejiujinshangxiajiaoliudoa,jiangyouxiaoshuhuantaixianjianfengsiduanzhijiaotongyongse,bingqiznohuataixianyudalictrl>wuf=engdiquzhichuanjie,jjanquanqyuuluwang,bingdiadong[taizhrngruantiyuahnru<ctrlwg]chaynefazhan.zhengfuyuanzhangzhichu,taixianzaidalixinanzhiwuefngdiquluduanweishezhicuhrukouzadao'qietaixianjhiaotlongliangpangda<crl>,jiashangtaizhongruantiyuanquyinjincheliuzhon0duo,zaochengzhoubianjianfengshijianyongse.yicni<ctrl5,zengshecaohucjioliud0oshizaidijuminyuminyidxaibinoxiagndangguanxinde.zhongyxaojianshe,hexinchunweiyuanzidanrenshiyiyuanshijiukaishijijifanyingminzhonqipan<tcrl>,bnig8jilizhengqu,jintianzhong'uwanchengjianshe,xiwangweiliataiianhoxuguihundegongchengeeyiyangnengruqiruzhiwangong.zhenfguyuan7hangjinybuzhic8hu<.trl>,gaojiaukaisudaolnxitongzngshejiaoliudao,rengxuyupingmindaoluxitongxianjgie<ctr>,cainengfahuizuiadxaioyi,yincizhongyangyudifangxieshouhezuo,youshizhengfufuzezhengshoutdui,jiaotongbugoknglujuxingjianzadao<ctrl,>neizhengquguotushu;fuzedaliquzhongshanluyanshenduangongcheng,zhongyangyudifangmiqiepeihe<ctr;>,tanchengtaixiancaohujiaoviudao<crtl>,fahuizhengtiuwanguynshuiaoneng'hsuhuansiqudaoljuiaotongfuh<ectl>,bingdaidongruantiyuanqufazhan<ctrl].zhengfuyuanzhangbikashi,xzhengfukandaminzhonguxyaoc<trl>,chulecaohu-iaoliudao,ezhengzaituidongzengshedongshenglinanruzhuxia,n(liushunqi]o)yijiakdliyibeicmu(s6hijiujia)dengliangchuzdaao;ciwaigctrl>,shigongzhongd9e[guodaohaozegshexianjietaiianxt[ongjiaoliudao<trl>]jianshe,mingnianwangongzhihout,aixiansangxaguodaohaojiubuxuxianxisahiqupingmiandaoluhouzaishanggaosugonglu,kew.angjiejuet/izhnngdayajiaoluadozhang-ianyanzhongyongsedewenti,rangtaizhonjgiaotonggengjiabiajieyuwans7han.zuihou,whenfguyuanzhengqiangdiao,xing4hengyuanjizebuhuixiangdangzhongshitaizhonggexiangjianshe<ctrlk,ydiinga qian9wangxinzhushichux<ictrl>[guojiatognbufusheyanjiuzhongxinguangnyuanqiyong]zhounianqing<tcrl>]shibiaoshi<ctrlp,taiwadnihyizuotongbujiasuqi<ct5l>[taiwanguanguyuadn]i=ianqiyongzhijinyinian,weitaiwantongbujiasuqijikexuefazhandia4ndinghoushijichu.tayaognaxieguofuzhongxinzhangqizhilifazhanxianjinjxissuqijisxhu,jijiyuguojixueshuy=njilujigouzrankaixuduoyouzhidehezuojihua,bingqimiangizhong-niweilaichucixuinginkexueyanjiuwai,yinengbuduanyafaxinkejiybingjinxingkuayuzhenghe,youxiaoliaanjietongbufushedeshejijiweilawiyingsongmian,jinyiuuxiezhuchandeshengji6huanxing,wierenlefuzfhidailaizuihaodegongxian.chenyuanzhangzhichu,tahenrongxignjin/riqianlaicanjia[guangyuanqyongzhounian]zhex'iangbiejuyiyikdeqingzhuhuodog,ydajiayitongjianzhengwoguozuidaxinggngyongshiyansheshinianlaifengshuodekeyanyuyignymongchengguo<citrl>.yuanzhagnbiaos2hi,tayunianzhinian2renzhiguo]ehizhuweiqijia]nctrl>,yedanrnguofuzhongxinddeongshi,zaichaogdeliyuanzheyuanshizeweigaizhongxindongshizhang,dmangshixingzengyuantongguot[aiwanguangziyuanxingjianjihua],weichaknxukeyanjietigonggengxianjindekeyanshes1hipingtai.chenyuanzhangji;yibu9biaosi,[taiwanguangzyuanixngjianjiha]tongguohou<ictrl>,youyuaozhouyeayojiazhitnogbujiasuqi<crl>,yincitayeqiawnangaozhoufangwen<ctr>.dagshiyouxuduotongbujiasuqiyuanjiandoushbzaitaiwanceshichenggonghou,caisonghuiaozhouzuzhuangctrl>,xianjiantaiwantongbufusheyanjiudeghengjiuxiangyuquanshijie,xuduoguojirenshifen3fenlaitaixuex7i.yuanzhnagzhivchu,guofuzhongxinzh9ngqizhilifazhanxianjinjiasuqijishu,yunzhuan[tiwanguangy.uan]yu[taiawnguangziyuan]liangzu;oxianjintongbuguangyuanshshi,bingwfenbieyunianjinianchuguang,pangfuweitaiwanxuduokx5uejiazaiyanjiudeheianzhonjgyinlu,daixiangguangming,yinzhengsihengjingsuoshuo:[shenghuozaiheianzhongderenmin,kanjianleyidaohaoguang.<ctlr>]ciwai,goufuzhongxinyejijiyuguojixueshuyanjiujigouzha-nkaixuduoyouzhidhezuojhua<ctrl,baoku9oyuribenchtnbat/ngbfushesh7eshi()jianzaouotaiwan2zhuanshguuangshuxian,yijiyudeguomakesipulagkeyanjixuyuan)(heuzojianzao[ciweimirua='guangne eluo.

zhendu-imeitixuunwenyouguanminzhongdangzongtonghouxuanrenkewenzhetiyixiufashanchuyusuanfaditiaodikuan<ctrl2u>,xingzhengyuanjin()ibiaohsi,hz9ngyangzhengfutichuzhitebieyusuanjunshushizhengpoqiexuyao,qiejunnijutebiet/aolidjinglifayuanshnyitongguomhoushijuyi]ia0nie(qizh6ng[jilongheluyuzhengzhitebietioli]'[shime7vnshuikujiqijishuiquzhengzhitebietiaoli<ct9l>]xilifwaeiyuantian),qibianlieguochetngwanjin,bingwuchangtaihuaqingxing.xingzhengyuanbiaoshi,guanyujinnianlaizhengfusuobantebieyjsuanzhong<trl>,shuditiaodikugn[budingqihuosyhutnianyicizhihzongdazhengshi]zhe,baokuojilongehzhengzhijihua'yiyanshuidiqushuihuanzhilijihua3shimenshikjuiqijisuhiquzen=gzhijihua'liuyuzonghezhilijihuatebieyusuan,yijiqianzhanjichjuiansheji2huatebieyusuan'yihouqianghuajingjiydushehuienxxingjiquanmingongxiangjiangji2hengguotebieyusuan,xiangguanyusuanjuweijiejeudangshioshehjipoqiezhixuqiu,yiweich1ijitishengguorenshenghuopinzhi'jingjifazhanyuyinyingguojiijtingjibianju,jieyouqibiyaoxing.
zhuchi<ctr1>[zhongyanglianzhengweiyuanhuidiichuiyi],tingqu[dangqiawnlianzhengqingshijifenxi]<ctlr><trl>[ningjugongsixielitsuidongsibupechengxinzhiliyouzh6iliangdianyjiyueshengcelve]dnegbaogao.yuanzhangqiangdiaof,weiqianghuaduijiebizhedebaohu,zhengfukezh1ngyanniyigongbumenjishangshishngguigongsixianxingdegongsihebingban《jiebizhebaohufa》caoan,binghuizaichongfengoutongxiediaohuo,j,nsusongzhixingzhengyuanhuitaolun<crl>;yuanzhagnyeqingjingjibujiehe[lianheguofan0tanfugongyue]ji[taimeishijimaoyichangyifantanf9zh0anzhang]dengzhnogdazhengce,chixutuidongisbumenfantanfucuoshi<ctr>,rangatiwajnieguiguoji<c7trl>,ti/shengtaiwanjingshangtouz=xiyinli'guojiajingzhengli/ufaz/igongzhengxingxiang.chenyuanzhangyuzhicishibiaoshi,zciaiyingwenzongtong.shangrenyilai,yigu0an=angeyaoqiuutanduilianzhengjilv,xiwangdazaoyige[wennunaerjianrende9iannegzhegfu].taiwansuibushilianheguodeuiyuanguo,rengjingjingyeyediyaoqiuz4izhengtuanduiyiwushisiweijiwenjianjiaobu,yixunianheguofantanfugongyue,baihuaguojiagexianglianzhengzhengce,zhanxiantaiwantuidongfantanufgongzuodejuexin.qu()niantaiwanzizhuzunxun[lianheguofantafugongyue<c6trl>],zaiciduiwaitichudielrciguojiabaogao,huodeguoj8shenchaweiyuhndekending<7trl>.jin()niangengjinyib'jangguojishenchajielunxingyijianhuiyingshixiang,naru[guojialanzhengjianshexingdonfgangan],yijutixingdonghuixingguojishenchaweiyunduiwoguojianxvinggongyuedeqdaic.heyu5anzhangjinyibubiaoshi,jinnianyuewoguyumeigoqanding[taimeishijimaoyichangyi],shitaimeizinianyilai<ctl,qianshuzuiquanmianxingdemajoyixe1ing,chunengqiaghuaquyulianjiexingwai,gengshoucijiang<otrl>[fantandu7lierutanpanyiti<3trl>,yiagobi-aozhunguifangongtongfanzghiqiyedetanfuxi8gwei,tigongzhongxija9qiyegenggongpingdejingztenghuajing,zhanxianowguoluoshii]lanheguofananfugongyuedechengguo.chenyuaznhangqiangdiao,lianzhengjianshehiguojiadezhongyaogenji<ctrl,>fantanfubujinshipushiijazhi,yeshiyix5ianyongbutingxiedeshiming.taqixugbeuhuiqixinxieli,dailingxinzghengvuanduiluoshiqinglianshizheng<tcrl>,yingzaoliannengtoumsngdegongwuhuanjing yuxingzhengyuanhuitingquekjiaweiyuanhui[shijiekejibolanhuijikejiazhengcetuid[ongchengxiao]baogaohoubiaoshi,shijiekeiabolanhuiyutianzhanqi,dizaowanca.nguarnenci,dailaihaoguoyiyuandejingjixiayi,xiangshijiezhnaxiankejimeilijitaiwanzaiyihuofusudreenxingyush4;li.lingwaictr7>,weifuzixajiawenhuafazhan,xingzhengyuanyicognfagui'zshinu'yusuandaozhengce,zhubugurihuaheluoshi,qizhongjinnianlai(nian)zhengfusuobianliedekewweihuiyusuanyileimidayiyaun,jiaozhiniandeyiyuan<crtl>,zengjiayiyuan.yuanzhangqimiangebuhuichixu7/ingzaotai1wanzquunyuoshandeshehuihuanjing,ranggkejiawenxua<ctral>'jingjigenjapengbofazhan.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi<ctl>zjuban[shijiekejiabolanhui]shicaiyingwenzogtongcanjian[ianquanguokejahuiyijikejiagongxianjaangbanjiangdianli]shidechengnuo,jiyozhannhikejiayiminzaiquanqiukaizhisanyedegushihetaiwanzaidikejiadeduboyuantese,diandingtaiwnazaiguojikejiawenhu-achuangxin'jiaoliuyuyanjiudehsuniudiwei.chnyuanzhangzhiciu,shijiekejiabol7nhuizaicoubeiqiian<ctrl,quanqiuzaoyuyiqingdeyanguntiaozhan,dandzaizhongyanghedifangzhengfjiurenminqix9indmefangyizhixia,geixanggong;zuorengruqijinxing,bingzaiyihouduanshijianneishunlikaizhanrzaitiazhanlanqimjina,gongdizaowancnguanrenci,dailichaoguouiyuandejingj5ixiaoyi<ctrl,tayaotebieganxiekeweihui<trl>'taoyuanshizhangzhangshanzhu'egn'zhngwencanqianshizhanghezhxii,ngtuanduijieliwanchengrenwu,xianghsijiezhaixiankejiameiliyp,exianshitaiwanzaiyihfoufusuderenxiwgyushili.,henyux6nzhangbiaoshi,caiyingwenzongtungshangrenhou,xiangdangzhngshikejiafahan,xingzhengyuanconftagui'zhidu'yusuandaozhengce<ctlr>,zhubuguihuaheluoshi,yileijixuduochengguo,liruginanxingzhengyuanjianzhi[taisanxiankezhuanglangmandadaozhiliping'ai],nianzhengshikuojiliuduihetaijiuxianwei[kezhuagzzhlipingtai]<tri,>jiehekubuhuiziyuan,zhengbeih5anjing'fazhanjingjibingho;uzhirenwendiyunyufengmao.lingwai,nanxiuding[kejiajibenfa],zhengshijiangke4ulieweiguojiayuyaxnzhiyi,cujinkeyuyoushanhuanjingdejianli;nianxingzhengyuanhedin[guojiakejiafzaihanjiuha],yougebuhuihedifangzhengfuzuchengkejiazengceguo,j zaihangzhengyuanhuitnigquhfaunjingbu[gyuojiaqihdubianqiandiaoshi2inadgongjihua(nmwan)c1<rtl>]baogaohoubiaoshi,weiyingqihoubiaoqianchongji4woguoziminguonianqifenjieduantuidong[guojiaqihoubianqiandiaoshixingdongjihua]<ctrz>,qijinyijinr=udisanqi,yujitourujingfeiyiyuan,zhixingxianggongzuoxiangmu<ctl>.yuanzhangqiangdiao<ctr>l,zhexiegongzuoxuyaokuabuhui<ct5>'kualingyuhezuojiquanmingongtongranyu,cainengchenggng;houxuyeqinggebuhuiwubiyudifangzhengfuhezuo,xishouqianghuaguojziazhengtiyinyingqihoubianqianderenxing,cujin,woguosh]ehui'ingjijihuanjingdeyongxufazhan<trl>.chenyuanzhangzhichuc<trl>,shouquanqiununahuayingxiang,gedijiduantianqifashengpinlvchixuzengfia,nianqaunqiuwendushigongypegemingyilaizuigao,tainwanjinnmianlaienianjunwenyiccengxianzengjiaqingkuangc<trl>.youjianyuci,xiangjaioyuguowangbijiopianzhongyuwenshiqitijijnhuandegongzuo,guoj7jianyeyuelaiyuezhongshyiingtongshituiogh.luoshjdiaoshideeclve.z3iyudiaoshidegongzuojiuxuyaotouguokuabuhu<icrl>'kualingyuhpezufjiquanmingongtowgcanyu<cxtrl>,cainenkgouchenggong,ecainegnjiangqhioubianqiansuo]dailaideshegcunweijiziranhuanjingliehuadeweixiejiangzhizuishao.chenyuanzanoqiangdiao,woguyinyingqhoubianqianchngji<ctrlo>,fenjieduantuidongdagoshideg7onzguo,ziminguonianqijin<gctrl>,yijinrudsaniqxingdpongjihua;benqiyujitourujnigfeiyiyuan,gonejixianggongzuoxiangmu,j4citishengwoguouanjingdiaoshinengli'qanghuacuiruozuqundiaoshirenxing,yijichengxiangdiqulaorudnoyuandiaoshicelve,bingqianghuashuiziyuanxitngguanlideng<ctrl,>zhexiejihuadouxiangdangzhongyao.chenyuanhzangzhfshigebuhuihouxuwubzyudifangzhengfuhezuo,qianghu;qihoubiaqaindegongminy[shi<ctrdl>'quanminjiaoyuherencapieiu<yctrl>,tishenggumoin'shiye'tuanticanyduezeren,yiqianghuaguojiazhengtiyinyingqihoubianqiadnerenxing,cujinwoguoshehui<cthrl>'jingjjihuanjingdeyongxfuazhan.
