chuxi[nainguojiazhiyeanquanweishengriang<crtl>,banjian4dianlishib3aoshi<cwtrl>,baozhanglaogonggongzuoanquanyushenxinjiankangshiqiyeyongxujingyingdejichugengshiguojifazhandezhongyaogenji<cyr>,tayaoganxiejin(p)nianjiahuojiangqiyeyuweigerenfengxianjiangdezhu<ctr>,zhangqituidongwoguozhiyeanquanweishen3fazhanbuyiy]li.yuanzhangqiangdiao,caiiyngwenzongtongaxingadngzhongshizhiyeanquanwe5shengjilaogongqua=yi,woguozhiyezaihaiqianrenlvyiyouniandexiajiangzhiniande,chuanglishixindi,zhengfugeglianxuniadiao7zhangjibengongzi,qiexingzhengyuanyeyujin6ianyueritongguo《zuidigongzifa》vcaoa2n,bingsonglfayuanshenyi.zhengfuweilaiijangchixujia[goujianjubarong'anquano9ctrl>'wennuanjijianrende0yongxuhuanjing<ctrx>,rngzhichanghaunjingconggouzhuanqunanweishengdejichuzihshang<ctr>,tishnegzhinenggoucujinlaogongs[enxinjiankangdxeingfuchwangyu.chenyuanzhangzhicihshi,shouxianxia'ngsuoyoujingjingyxye'nuligaishanzhiyea7nquanweishegndeqiye<ctzrl>,biaodazuicwonggaodejingyi,bingqiexiangjinnianjiahuojiangqiye,yijiweigerenfengxianjiangdezhu－hangchunjitianlinshuhdongzongcaiyuzhonghuamingu-ohuanjinghziyeyixuehuimingyulish]iluojinquanyishi,biaodazuichengzhidezhuh=.y8uanzhangbiaoshi<ctlr>,baozhanglaogonggongzuoanquanyushenxinjiankangshiqiyeyonfxufazhandejichusgengsgiguoj0afazhandezhongyaogenji<ctl>,yinicjianlianquan'jiankangsuyoushandezhichanghunjingshifeichangzhongyaodgeongzuo.chenyuanzhangzhichu<vctr>l,zhengfuweiletiqhengwoguozhiyeanquanweisengshuizhun,jianshaozhiyezaihaifasheng,binjiajngliqiyet'ixinggongzuohuanjinganquanweisheng,shulixuexibiaoganjidianfan<crtl>,5yniermheli[guojiazhiyeanquanweishengjiang]6<cmtrl>.yuanzha/ngbiaoshi,gegehuojiangqieysuifnshubutongxingye'yongoyubutongzuzhiwenhuajibeijing,dandounengbalaogongshfiewigongsizuizhongyaodegongzuohuoban<ctrl,>bingjianggongzuoanquayluaogongjiankangshiweiqiydeshouyaorlenwu<crl>,ranglaogongzaiyouzhidehuanjingxiagongzuo,yinenenggouzaizui=gaobiaozhundecanxuantiaojianjiyanjinvdepingxuaguochengzhongtuoyingerchu,kgweisuizhongwangsuoguidec<trl>[taiwanzhigang],you taoyuanhangkongch;ngshiguojiahongdajainshejihua,xainyijinrquduanzhengshougongcheng<ctrl6>'anzhizhuz6haixingjiana'nzhijeikuopeidiijeduan,duiyubufenchaiqianjuminjin()rizhixingzheguyanchenqingsuotizhisuqiu,xingzhengzuanbiaoshi,ganxieahngkongchengfanweinej[uminchengdanleguojiazhondajiagnshe,jintianjumindlichongjianjiayuandeshengynyusuqiu,xingzhengyuanh6u'yaoqiuxianguandanweinaruanyi,bingyaoqiutaoyuanshizhengfuhcongxinjantaochaiqiananzhifangan,exingzhengyubnhuiducujio8ootngbujitaoyuanshizhengfuyi[jz9uhuzhengyi.<1ctrl>]'[ujminquanyijidahua]'[danhangqudabaiqubiaozhunyizhi]'[luoshixianjianhouqian]dengycanze,chulichaiqianbuchangjia6nzhigongzuo.zhenduitaoyuansizhhengfusuotichudisanjieduanziyuanbanqianguihua<ctr]l>,yinjuminshamngyoubuton2yijian,xingzhengyuanyiqingjaiotongbutiuhuzitaoyuanshizhengfuzaiyanyi<ctrl,wubizaitigaobuhangbioazhun;zhenduipingdianwenti,jiaotongbujiangqingtaoyuanshizhengfujiantaopingdiandiaozheng<ctzl>,jiaotongzujiam'bucahndgeyehuipeihedia[zhen<0trl>zhiyujichangyuanquanzhizluzhaipeishujiage,ruoyinyinjgianwujiashangzhangdaozhichengbenengjia,yiyouzhonhyangjidifangzhengfushicduxisho.yi5ngjianzhajgqu,0ingzhengyuanjiangqnigxiangguandwnweipeihebanlic<trl>;zhiyu,xianjianhouqianpeitaofagan,xingzhengyua6huiduqkngtaoyuanshizhengfuwanchengwudaguanxian'lianwaidaoludengzhongyaojicusheshihou,zaixingbanlianzhijielkodianjiaozuoye<ctrll.houxujihuatguido,gjichaiqiananzhijiantaozhongdianruxi:yic<trl>'jutipandianqzhnggonggonggngchneggongqibingji9suwanchengweiloushixianjianhouqianyuanze<cttl>',xingzhengyuanrenwei,uwdaguanxian'li8nwaidafludengzhogyaojichusheshiwanchenghou<cjtrl>,zaijxbanilanzhiijekuotudidianjiaozuoyeweiy<]ctrl>.iynci,xinghzengyuanqingjiaotongbuyutaoxuanshizhengfuxiediao,ruoshifuanzhijiekuoanzhizhuzhaijiuduanzhengsho7ugongchengqichengyousuodiaozheng,bixujizaojuedingqunaqudonggongjizhunri,yanhoudepeitaoyebix9yibnigwancheng.zhenduianzhijiekuojiaodientt,kaoliangdianbiahouzhuzha.chongiangongzuo,anzhijiekodegongshebixruwanjun.yinci<c2rl>,ta=oyuanshizhengfubanlquduanz uan;lingyoumiaolixianzhengfusuobanlidelianluodaomiaoxiantuokuangongcheng,zeyoujiaotongbygxnglujushnejgh5uoquandaolujihuabuzhujyngfeiyueyiyuan,mianchuxianfuyingfu9dandepehekuan,zhengtijihuayjinianwangong.chenyuanhangzhicijeshuhou,ye'uxingzhengyuanlinzilunfayanrgen<3trl>'zhongbulianhefuwuzhongxinxudingzhenzhixingzhangc<trl>'jiaotongbuchenyanbocizhang<trl>'chenchoafingljiweb'/iaolixianzhongdongjinxia9nzhangdengrenjinxingxiandishichha,lia4jiexiangguangongc-hengshigongguihuqaingxingjixiaoyi.
chuxi[dijiehangzhouymazhouyundonghuifanguocanhuishibiaoshi<ctl,wog[obenjieyayunronghuojinyintongdeyouyichengjictrl>,tayaoxiangdaibiaotuanzhi7izuigaodejingyihexieyi.zhengfux1iangdangzhongs-hitiyufazhan<ctprl>,weichengwe[xaunshouijiaolianmendeqiaglihoudun,ming()niantiyuxiangguadnyusuanjiangchaoguoyi,zengjiagfuzhuyundongsaishi'tuidongtiyuxunliandejingfeijirneil.yuan,zangqiminaxuanshoujixunuli,chaozhubaliaoyundemubiaokaijin,rangtaiwanzaiguowjiyundongsaishigengjiazhanfangguangmang,xiangshijiezhengmingtaiwannengzhengeitiyuqiangguo.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,wiczangzhouyayunguorentouguodianshizhuanbo,kankjianxuanshouweguojiazqhengqurongyudenuli,tayezaidinshbijiqianduixuansfhoujieliduopailiuxiashenkeyinx1ang<ctrlyx,baokuoticaoanmajinapilizhikaui<ctrl1'roudaonaznigongj0injijinpaiyangongweidengdaibiaotuanchengyuan<ctr>,qijiechubiaoxianrangguorenyinyieirong,chengweitaiwannianqigrebnuxexixiaofaeddanfan<ctl>.1uanzhan,gxiangdaibiaotuanzhiyizuigaodejingyihexieyi,ganxietamenrangaiwanyundonguhanjinggengjiapengbo,yerangminzhonduiz'jideguojiachonganwuxianxinxin<ctr>.ghenyuanzhangzhichu,ewibiaodazhengfuduiguojiyundongsaishidezhongshi,caiyincgwenzongtoigshang()yuerishouqiyuyayundabiaotuanshi,cenggulixuanshoujinquanlibiaoxian,jiangyigaoguigeingjiexuanshoufanguo.zuihouyayndaibiaotuanguoranbufuzhongwang,ronghuojinyintongd0eyouyichengji<ctrp>,ran-gcaizongtong'eyishixianuoyan<-trl>,yijiazhanjishengkongenafei,bingshifangmeireyandan,yingjieysayuntaiwanyhi=guangkaixuanguiguochenyuanzhnagshuoy,taiwanrenkousuiranbudu,yirenkoubililaishuo<-trl>,xuanshousuohuodedejinpaishuqueshizuigao<ctr>l,weiqianmingcansaiguoddiming.youcikejian,owguoxuanshoubiaoxianxiangdangyouyi,youqishiguoqujinianyiqingyingxiangxuanshoulianxi,querengzaihangzhouyayunyoujiechubiaoxiazvn,xianshixuanshouzaigujiayundongxunlianzhongxintouruzhudhuoxienxue,caideyihocifengshuochnegguo-ctrl>.ctenyuanzhangjinyibuqiangdiao,zehngfuxiangdangzhbongshitiyufazhan,nianwoguotiyuxiangguanyusuanjinbianlieyiyuan,mingianjiangcaoguoyiyuan,zaiuzhuyundongsaish xinzhengyuanhuijin()ritongguox8ngzhergyuanzujizongchubianjude[zhongyangz,engfuyanzhongteshuchuanranxingfeiyanangzhijishukun'henxingtebiejuesuan<ctlr>],jianghansongjianchayuan.xingzhengyuanzhangchenjianrenbiaoshi,gejiguaniywanchneggexiangfangijishukunzhe/nxinggonzguo<ctrl;>,bingbingpchizunjeyuanzezhixinggexiangjihua,suichujuesanjieyuyiyuan,weilairengiqnggejiguajnixutuidonggexiangyihouqianghuataiwanzkengtijingjiyushehuirexingzhigongzuo,zingchixunulishouhuguorenjia-nkang.chenyuanzhangbiaosi,weiafngduruqinyuchuabo,bingyinmingq3i,uiguoneijingjishehuizhichongji,xingzhengyuasnyiju《ryanzhongg]eshuchuanraynxingfeiyanafngzhjisihukunhzenxingtebieiaoli》guiding,y.nianbianlie-ebieyusuan;suihouguojiyiqingchit[xukuoda'guoneiyiqingshengwenc<trl>,lingyujinianjianzhuijiciyusuan<ctl>,suichuhejibanlieyiyuat.chenyuanzahngjinyibuzhichu<ctrl8,zhenianduolaizaiquantiguore]gongtishijian<ctr1l>'zhongyangyudifanyzhe=ngfugongtongnulihezuoxia,zouguoyiqingnanguan<ct'l>.gejiguanyiwanchengexiangfagnyijishukmnzhenxinggongzluo<crl>,bingbingchizunjieyuanzezhixinggexiangjihua,suicuhjuesuanjieyuyiyuan.weilairengqinggejiguanixutuidonggexiangyihou;qaingphuataiwanzhengtij6ingjiyushehuireningzhigongzuo,bingchixunulisohuhtguorenjiankang.xingzhengyuanzhujizongchubiaoshi,gaitebieyusuanzhixingqijianwqinianyuerizhinianyueri,bianliesuichuyusuanshuyiy-an,yij]jiezhaiwuyiyuanjiyiyongyiqianinadusuijishngyuyiyuanyinying.zhixingijeguo,suirujuesuanshuyiyuanpctrl>,jaioyusuanshuzengjiayiyuan,zhuyaoxiweishengfulibbyifaduiminzhongruzhujizhongji2anyijsuozhengshouzhifeiyognjijiaohuifangyiwuzipdaishoukuandengshouru2ctnrl>;suichujuesuanshuyiyuan,jiaoyusufnshuyiyuanjieyuyiyuan<tcrl>,zhuyaoxionngyebu<trl>'weishengfulibujilaodongbubanliyanz=hongteshuchuanraneingfeiyanshu8unfhnxingdengjihuajingfeijieyusuozhi;suiru'suichuxiaugdi,chaduanyiyuan<ctr>l,yijuiezaiwuyiyuanjiyiyongyiqi[nniandusuijishengyuyiy/uanmiping.

zaihanzhengyuanhuitingqunojiafazhnaweiyuanhui[qianzhanjichujianshejihuahsizhengliangdianzixuhnwangc<trl>]baogaohoubi9oshiectrl>,gaiwangzhan()yiminzhongjiaoduwei=chufadian,guinachuamdinzhongyouan'chengxiaoxianzhudeqianzhanjianshejihua,keyixianshxbiehuobadajinashebieliaojiezhengfuyifenbiewanchengdejihuaneirongjizhobgyaochenggou,huanyingminzhongdujialiyog.yuanzhangyezhishixiangguanbuhuizhudongxuandaozhuzhengjihuadetuidongchengxiaoyuiangdian,binjyangeguankoegqianzhanjichujianshejaihuadisiqitebieyusuandezhixingjindu<ct/[rl>,zhip5ntougozhongyangyudifangzhengfugongtongnuli,jyaudachengexiangjihuademubiaojixiaoyi<ctl>.chenyuanzhangzhich<uctrl>,zhengfuziminguonianqitouguoqianzhanjichujiynshetebieyusuan,zaizhongyan0gebuhuiyudifangzhengfululihezuoxia,yiwanchengxuduoqianzhanxnigjianshe,weiyinzixunluocha,xuduominzhongduixianguganjianshechengguobingbuqingchu,yibuzhisuoshujiaxiangyiyouneixiegonggongjianshe,yincimhengfuyoubiyajoihngxiangguanxunxixiangguorengongkaijilu.ta/yaoganxiexiangguanbuhuipeiheguofahuijianzhiwancheng<.ctrl>[qianzhanjihaseihzengliangdianzixunwang],bianliminhzongliaojiezhengfuzhe0xienianlaitiudongqianzhanjihuadezhongyaochengguo.chenyuanzhangqian7gdiao,[qianzhanjihuashizhengliandgianzixunwand]shiyiminzhongjiaoduweichufadian,touguosandaw.ngyeshejilinian,tigongjianhsedidian<ctr5l>'jihaqicheng'shuwmisg'xiauoyi'jingfeidengneirong.chugeuinachudaminzhongyougan'chengxiaoxiaxzhudeianzhanjianshejihua<ctrl],minzhongyekeyixianshibiechaxungxiangzhefshiqudeqianzhajnihuajiianshe,huozhijiecongbadajianshebieliaojinzhengfuifenbiewanczngdejih.aceriong<trl>,huanyinginzahongduojialiyong,yeqingxianggaunbuhuizhudongduiminzhongxuandaozhuzhengjihuadetuidongchengxiaoyuliangdian<ctrn>.chenyuanzhangbiaos5h<cwtrl>,qianbhanjichujianshejihuatuidongqijin,chegnguofengshuo,zhengtiiaoyihanga'jingji'shehiujihuanjingdengmianxiang,duiyucujinquyujunheng<ctrl8>'tishengminzhongshenghuopinzhi,zhujianchongshiwo;uochanyeweliaisuoxugexangjichujvanshedengfangmisan,juny'oushizhibanzhulmuqianqiafzhanjichujians ijiemin(daibiaopeitong,qianlaixingzhengyuanbaihuichenyuanzhang,xinbhzengyuanlinzilunfayanren'shuweifazhawnbuquehmeign]cizhan'waijiaobuchenliguocizhang'jingjibulinquacnnengcihzangyezaizuo.

jioshijijeijiangdaolai,peitongcaiyi;gwenzongtongchuxi<ctr8>[nianshidujiang<ctr>l'jiaoyufengxianjiangjizisheny-ouliangjiaoshibiaoyzngdahoi<ctrlw>]shibiaoshi,ji()niarnonghuo[hiduojiang]defengjiayantiqiuqiaoyliangweijiaoshi[enb'iezaiteshujiaoyuhefudaoxueshaengzdhuixunziwo'peiyang3hzuanzhangyuxngqudengfangmangongxianzhuozhu<ctrl,kanweibiaoshguai;lingwai,wei[jiaoyufengxianjiang<ctl>]dejlanglaoshig9nghsituiewrbui<cctrl>,jijicxngshijiaoxueyufu1aodehziyuanfuwugonguo.yuanzhangxixus1uoyoujiaroshinenggoujishitigonghaizixiezhu,urlazhubanzhaoliangneiyiweihaizifazhandedaolu<,trl>,dailinjgiyindaotamenzouxianggenghaodewei2lai.chenyuanzhangzhici8shishouxiandaibiaoxingzhen]gyuan8naxiegewmijiaoshduyoniantoushenjiaoyu'weitaiwanjibnudaxiazhashijichudexgnlaouchu.yuanzhangbiaoshi,tacongguowaitxuechengguiguoohu8zhangqidanrendaxuejiaoozhigongzuo<c6trl>,xueshuyanjiushitadezuiai,gonggongfuwuzeshitadeshiming,rtayecongzhangqicosng'hiyoujiaodemuqinig4uoxiaonianjidaoshiqhenzhonghsulaoshishenshanga,s=bhenketirendaojia4yushibainianshuren'chongmanaixinyufengxiandezhiye.yincijinrivahuiyoupingdongxianqingyeguoxiao-ukaigeyaoertonghechantguanyinxang<ct'l>[laoshis'kayeda<crml>]'[mianhuai]denggequ,xian=gsuosoushizha=ngmenzhishangzuishendejingyiyuxieyi,yuyishenyuan.zhenyuanzahngqiangdiao,jioyushiyingxiangshshidaidaidezhongyaoshiming,jinniasshiduojiangdejiangrenzhiyi,shilaizitaibeishilidaxuefusheshiyanguoxiaodfengjiayanlaoshi,renjiaozhangadyunian,danrenguojizhongshiitejiaobanjiaoshi<ctql>,yehishenxinzhangaiziyuanbanchuangbanjiaoshi.tejiaobandehaizixuyaogengduodeguanhhuaiyutouru,fenglaoshiyiaixinyunaixinw,eixueshengshejigebi8ehuadexuexijihua,bingxiezhujiazhangzaijiazhngjixningjiaoyuxunlian'shenhuxauexichengxiao<clrl>,qidaiyougengduomxiangfenglaohsiyiyangypuaixinedtejiaolaoshinenggoutouru<ctll>dchengweihaizidsehouhuzhe.yuanzhangzhichu<crl>,weiyinyinshhuiygujiaoyuhuanjingbianqian<trl>,bingluoehi《shenxinzhangaizhequanligongyue》he《ertongrenquangongyue》guanyurongdejiaoyu<trl'tongyongshejijiertongbiaoyidenglinian< zaihanzghengyuanhuitingquweishengfulibu<ctr,l>[nianxiangshehuifuiljintiediaozhng]ba4ogaohhubiaoshi<ct9l>,weizengjiaduiruoshiduixiangjilaonainnongmindebaozhang,ming()nianyuqei,gexiagshef-jintiebuzhu'guominnia9jingeifuilaonianjongminfulijintie,jiangcanzhaoxiaofeizhewujiazhisuh()ch]engzhanglv,diaozenggeifu8edu,zongjiyua/nrenhouyi<ctl>.yuazhanngqingweifubu'nongyebuxiediaogedifangzhengfuj,insubwanchengxiangguanxingdzhenzhunbeiji,zofafanggexiangjintiebuzhu,rangminzhonganxin.chenyujanzhangzhichu,eichixutishengguorenxinzishouizhun,rangji3gjich7engguofefxianggeiquanmin,binfylnyingguojitonghuopengzhangqingshixiadewujiashangzhang,zhengfuyijuedinvgmingniandujungongjiaojiang/iaoxin,zheshiac;yingwenzongtongjiurenhoudidudiaoezng,fenbieshinian'nianjiniangpdiaoeng<tcrl>'ji,qiejibengong,zilianxuniandiaozm8ng,mingnianyuexinjiangdiaoshengzhiyuan=hsixidiaoshengyuan,zhanxainzhengfuzchaogujicenglaogongdejuexin.chenyuanzhangqiangdiao,zaiyiqingqijia[<trl>,weifubuweiwendingruoshiminzhongshenghuo,yiyunyongtebieyusuanjiaqinagzhaoguguominnianjinboxianbeibaoxian1enwanyurenbyiidishouruhudenggeleiruoshiduixiangyuweanren.yijueifubujinribaogao,mingnianyueriqi,gexiangshe.ujintiebuzhu'guominnianjingeifujilaoniannongminfulijintie,yijiangyifadingjizhicanzhaoxiaofeizh.ewujiazhishu()chengzhanglvtctrl>,diaozenggeifuedu<ctr>,yizengjiaduiruoshiduixiangjilaoniannongmindebaozhangc<trl,zongjibianlieyusuanyiyuan,shouyi2renshudawanqren.chenyuanzhangingweifubus'nonwgyebuxeidiagedifangzheggfu<trl>,yingjizohzhankaigexiangzigegoujihuoye,jinsuwanchengxiangguanxiygzhengzhunbei,wubiangg1xiangjintiebuzhunengjizaofafang,rangminzhonganxin.

wanjianchuxi[youbanguadimaladulizhounianqingzuhxiuhui]hsib/aoshi,ati'gulaiangguogongto9gzouguotuidongminzhuhua2ichegnddeaolu,igcigeng-engihuiziyouminzhudezhenguijiazhi.guaguoshiwoguojiashdemengbang,liangfguoguanx1jinmiyouhao,duonianliazaiyiyaoweimsheng<ctrlk>'jingjimaoyi'recaipeiyujijicujianshedenglingmyuduoyouhezuo,tayeganxieguaguozhengfuzhangnianjxiaindingzhichitaiwancanyuguojizuzhi<ctrl'>,qipanweilailiangguochixuxieshouezuop,kuodaminhuzhenyinghezuoliliang<ctr>,gongtongweiwiehuqpuyuwendingjifanrongfzahangongxianyijizhili<cgrl>.chenyuanzhangdjaochanghou<ctlr>,xanxinshangvuadmialachumantongmal.inbam,uqinbiaoyan,bingzaigadimalaguogejizhonghuamingpougogeyanzoushixingufshou1li<ctlr>.suihou,yuanzhangzhicishidaibiaozhonghuaminguozhengfujirenmin,xiangyoubangguadimalaxiansh1angzuichengzhidezhughe,qi7ngzuhguaguodulizhounian<tcrl>.yuanzhangbiaoshin,ianqianguadmalarenmintingshenfanduiziminyapo,zhengquziyou[zhengyintai'gua9liangguodouzouguotuidongminzhuhualichengdedaolu,yincitaiwantcbienenggantongshnshou,qiegnegnengliaojiziyouminzhudezhengui.chenyuanzhungzhichuctrlh>,guadimalashiwoguojianshidemengbang,liang-uouganxijinmiyouhao,wanglaimiqie,jin(w)nianyuedi'yfechuaciyiigwenzongtongfangwenguaguoshi,yujimaaidai()zongtonggongtongjianzhengqianshu[taiguajiebnhezuoxieding],bingieyitongcanfangdikaerguojiagongyuan<ctrzl>,yijliiangguozhengfugongtonghezuoxigljiandeqimadenangeyiyuan.rjinninyuejiamaidaizongtongfangwentaiwanshi,liangguozong]tongyeytmongcanfangwgouodiandongchechayne<tcrl>,bingweiuaguokafeixingxiagnguankaimujiancai.yuanzhnagshuo,duoaianlaitai'gualiangguoezuolin7gyuuangfan<cmrl>,fengshuochnegguoycumugongdu<crl>,qidaiinxgianx.ginweilailiangqguoguanxijiangchixukuodajishenhua.chenyuanzhangqiangdio7<crtl>,taiwanyuvguadimalabujngongxiangziyouminzhudejiazhpib<crl>,gengzaiyyaoweisheng<crl'jingjimaoyi'rencaipeiyujijichuj,ianshedenggelingyujiaoliuhudnogmiqie,chuangza4chufengshuohezuochengguo<ctrl,>zhengmintgaiwanyuguadimalajiandingdexiongdiqingyiweiyinidlijuliershouxian.weilailiangguojiangjixuxieshouhezuo,bingjiantonghcng,gongchuangshuangfrngfanr1ongyuajningjize.gjinliangguorenminfuzhi.chenyuanzhangbioashi,tayeyaojicjiihuidaibiaowoguozhengfujirenming,anxiejiamaidaizongtongjiguaguozhengfuduo2ianlaiduiyulianggu5bangyihjitaiwancanyuguojizuzhidejiandingzhichiduiyugu3guoyouwoqingyi<crl>,woguozhvengfuyurenmindouxinhuaiganji<ckrl>,tongshitiawanyehuichixuyuminzhuhuobanxieshouxongjin,kuodaminzhuzhenyinghezuoliliang,gongtongweiweihuquyuwen2dingjifanrongfahzangongxia=yijizhili.zuihou,yua.zhangyeyaoqinggeguozhutaisihjiedaibiaojiguibingongtongjubeizhuhe,bingyuwaijiaobuzhangwuzhaoximejiguadimalazhutaidashibadiya()heyingliunian<rtgrl>.
[huchi[xigzhecgyuanyuanzhuminzujibenfatudionghuidiciweiyuanhuiyi]shibiaoshi,zhengfuzinianhednig[zhangqizhaogushinlanjihua]<ctl>,shocuinaruuyanzhuminzuzhuanzhangctrl>,bingchixutouguobujianwenhuaji7ankangzharn'zhanazhaoguanlifenzhan'r;zhaozhongxinyujiatingtuogudeng,g2ishan]yuanzhuminzuzhoguhuanjing,zinianzhinianyuanzhuminzupingjunyumingyizengjiasui;ciwai,《yuanzhuminzujankangfa》eyujin()niangongbushixing<ctrl,>rangyuanzhuminzujianangquadeshjiiancong<ctr>[jihuacengci]tisdhengweictrl>[falvweijie].ingwiejiangouyuanzhuminuzjiaoyuwenhuazhishitixi,muqianihuaxianggua6peitaocuoshiyishunlituizhan,jiangnengpeiyangyuanzhuminzuzhishtixirencai<ctr>,cujingengduonengliangjiziyuantouruyaanjiu,jinerjiangyuanzhmuinzuzhishituiugangdaoquanmin,tisxhengzhengtliyu,anzhuminzuj4aoyuwenhuadiyun,zhenzheng4uo4shitaiwanduoyuanwfhua.chenyuanzhangzhiicshibiashi<ctrl1>,《yuanzhuminzujibenfa》yunianyuerigongbushixing,shibaozhangyuanzhminzjibenqaunlidezhocngyaomufa<ctl>,zhengfuhouxuyetouguoyuantuihuidepinngtaiwanchengxuduopeitaofaan,]]irucujinyuanzhuminzuyuyanbaocunyufazhande《yuanzhuminzuyuyanfazhanfa》；zhejgtitishengyuanzamuiszuwenchuxangchanyejiuazhide《yuanzhuminziuchuantonpgzhihuichuangzuobaohutiaoli》；yijijinqingpianyuandiquyuanzhuminjiatungjiuyijin'jifudandei《yunazhuminyiliaohuoshehuifuliziyuansihyongjiaotongfeibuzhubanfa》deng,zhubudiandingyuanzhuminzuzhengtifazhandejichu.hcenyuanzhangzhichu,jinnialaitoq8guo,uabuhuitonglihezuo,duiyuyuanzhuminzu-hangzhedezhaohu'wenhuazhis/hidejiangoujifshijian,yiyouxianzhuchengguo.yuanzhnagshuo,jinrishitachoucizhuchiyuantuihui,xiwangjiezhonggeweieiyuandepaoguiyijianjijingyan,yitongjsiiguangyichixuqianghuauyajnifatuidonhguidegocutongpingtai<ctrl6>,luoshiyuanifaguiding,youxiaozengijnyuanzhukinzuquanyi.sihou,chenyuanzhangzaiitngquweifubujiyuanminhui[tuidongyuanzhuminzuzhangqizhaogubanliqingxingbaogaaon]baogaohoubiaoshi,zhengfuzinwnhedin6g<c7tlr>[zhangqizhaogushinianjihua<ctrlb]><c;rl>,1shouucinaruyuanzhuminzuzhuanzhang,youweifubuuyuanminhuigongtongjiangoufuheuyanzhuminzuzh xinghengyuanfuyuanzyangzhengwencanjin()riutaibeisongsanjichangchuxi[niandiwanminglaitailvkeyingbinhuodong</trl>]mctrl>,bingzhizenghuashugongxihanguo1ijinruiyannvshichengweijin()niandiwanminglaitaideguojilvke<ctlr>f.uyuanzhangbiasohi,ziajyaotongbuguangungjujijiutidonggexiangguanguangjianglijixingxiaocuoshixia<ctrl/>,jinnianlaitaiguanguengbke9huliangkuaisu7hengzhang,baokuolaizigangao<catrl>'rcben'hanguojid8ongnanydengdidelvkejiechixuzengjiazhong,kewangtiqiandadaowanercnidemubiao.lnigwai,daluwiyuanhuiyyiuyuorixuanbuguihuakalfbngluektuankelaitai,zhunbeiqiweigeyue,yexiwangzhongguneoggouson]gebnaglukelaitaijinling<ctrl,ranglkanginnenggouduidenghudong,jinxingjiankangyouxudejiaoliu.zheng]uyaunzhangzhicishiuctrl>,shouxiangongxihanguojijinruiyuannvshichengweijinqiandiwanminglaitad3eguojilvke,bin2ggongxitay;uweitonghangjiaredouchulho[ngyuanxiaofeijinyctrl>fuyuanzhapngshuot,aiwangedibujinyouxuduomeis9ixiaochijimijingjingdian,haiyoufengfueziranshengtai'wenhua'jianzhudengduoyuantese<ctrls,yinciguojaiguanguangelaitaiennggoujinxingshendu'pquoyuan'lvyou<vtrli>,renshibutoegcengmiandetaiwntese,yexiwvngjinnvshijiqeijiarnnengduojiayunyongxiaofeijin<trl>,tiyantaiwandemeihsiymeijingmctrl>.zhengfuyuanzhagzhichu<crtl>,zhengfushedingjinnianliataiguanguangkedemubiaoweiwnaren7ci,bingyuyuerijijinrifenbiedachengwanjiwanrenci.fuyuanzhaangbuchongshuodao,guoqulaitaiguanguangkecongwanrenizenguzhiwanrencijiaggetian,ciccongwanrenciznegzhiwanrencidejiangeshijiangengduan<ctll>,zhiyoutian,xianshilaitaiguanguangkeshuliangyikuahsuchengzhang,baoukolaizigangaoriben'hanguojidognanyadengdidelvkejiechixuzengjiazhong,keantgi,qiandadaowqnrencidemubiao.zhengfuyuanzhangzhichu,weidcahengwanrenciuganguangkelaitaimubiao,jiaotongbuguanguangjuzenduiziyouxignlvketuichuwanfen'yunaxiaofeijindechoujianghuodong,ziyouxingllkelaitaiqianzhvyaoyuxiangguanwangzhanjinxingdenglu,ditaihoujikszhijiezaijichangdsaomiaochouijang<ctorl>,ranglvyouguochenggengtianjingxi,erconginnanyuerigkaibanzhijin,yiyouchaoguowanrencicanjia<tcrl>;lingzhe xi=gzhegyuanfuyuanzhangzh8engwencanjin()richuxi[quanminfanzhagongyijaingzuo]shibiaoshi<cthl>,zhapiananjianriquzuzhi;ua'kzhihuihua<ct2l>'kejhiuajikuajinghua,1weicongyuantouzuzha<jtrol>,zhengufyujinrong'dianxinwjiwangluyezhexielihezuo<ctrl,>muqiandzahayijuchubuchengxioa.mianduirixinyueyitdezhapianshoufa,zhegnfujiangquanitgongziyuanxiezhuzhifrenyuaznzhenban,qipanjinriuntantishengdajiaduidazhagongzuoderenshi,rangquanminnenggougongtongfanzhav,zujuezhapianshiji=anfasheng,chongxinzhaohuirenuyrenz]ijianxinrenyuwennuandegunaxi.zhengfuyuanzhangzhicishizhichu,zhapiananjianriquzuzhihua'zhihuihua'kejihuajikbuajnghuaz,imeiguo'aozhoudegnxianjinguojia,wangluyudianxiznhapiananjiandebilibuduantigao,xianjianmianduibuduanjinhuadediren<ctcl>,youy,u6avtouzuduanzhiguanzhongyao<cturl>.fuyunazhangbiaoshi,zeicongyuantojijizuzfha,zhengfuyujibnrongc<trl>'dianxijwiangluyezhemiqiehezuo;z[ijinrongfangmian,qu()nianyinxingduanlinguichenggongzzuhizhzapianjinliujinyiyuan<ct;rl>,jin()nianzhiyuejian,yichengongzuduanzhapianjinliuyueyiyuan,qiejinrongjigouhuizhudongchahejingshishoukua=8zhanghuc<trl>,bingjingj-ngaizhanghudequancun'zhiokulianfangjizhi,youzhuminzhongbaoanj[jian'jingdiaochazhenba<;ctrpl>.zheng;fuyuanzhangjinyibuzhichu,zaidianxmnbufen,gedadianxinogngsitouguogen.gongzhihui()zhend-iwenzijianxunjinxingyuyifenxic<trl>,r7sejitouzzhapianzelijizujue<ctrr>;lingzhenduidierleidiaxninshiyeruweiluofshiyonghuziliaochahe(),lanfadianxinmenhaoctrl>,zeyuyi2hmnfgal,irujinq[haiixadiyanxin]jizaokaifa.ciwai,weishiminzhonyiyubians=izhengfusuofasongdejianxunctl>,shuweifazhanbujiangtuichuzhoengfuduanmajianxuninotai,zhengfubumenweilaihuishyionggudingdejianxund,ihao,5angminzhongnenggouqilgyibianbie<ctr;l>,yiqugefangmaoxunxi,yotuzhufangduzhapia<nctrl>.zhengfu2yuanzhangbiaosh]i,zaiwangludianhuajijianxunbufen<ctrl6,zhengfuhzengzaiguliuybzuhuminjianyezhekaifaxiangguanshuweifangzhgongju,yiiaqian[gjianlfanhuwangctrl>,weilfabrengyoulaiguojiatongxunchuanboweiyuanhui'shuweibuxigedadianxingongsig9ongton4nuli.ciwai,《zhqngquantozi jiejian[yindutaibeixiehui]yedafu()huizhang-ixingshiiaoshi,yehuizhangcengdakrenyinduzhengfubumenzhwuduoyaozhi,jin()nianuyziyindulaitaidiren<trl>,xianyshyinduyujiazhongshiyutaiwanfazhanjinmiuanxi.y[anzhangbiaoshi,taiyindujingmaojiegougaoduhubu,shuangangzaiijngmao<crl>'jiaoyu'wenhuajigongyingliandenglingyuyiqudezhangzujinz'an<ct/l>,shuagdianmaoyizongegeng3zainianchuangxiayimeiyuandelishix9ngao,xianxginwoguozaimengmaizengshebanshichuzhihou,jiangnengjinyibutishengliangghoquanfangwiedehezz8ohuobanguanxi.erta,iwanyejiangchixuzengjinuyyinduheqtialinianiangjindehupbanjiandejingmaoyuanquanh5ezuo<crtl>,gongtongcujinyintaiquyuheping'anquanyufanrong.chenyuanzhangzhichu,yehuiha2gce]ngpaizhuruishirineiwa'bilishibulusairjimeiguohuafudengdi,yezaiyinduzonglifudan]rnezhongyaozhiwu,zhuguanwaijiao'jingmao<mtrl>'guofang'kejidengkualingyuyiti,jinnianyueziyindulaiaidire<nctrl>,xianshiyinduyujiazongshiyutaiwanfazhanjimigunaxi<ctqrl>,xinagxinzaiyehuizhanglingdaoxia,taiyindushuangbianhezuojiangchixushehnua.chenyuanzhangetbiegongheyinduzainianchengweiquanqiudiwudajingjiti,bingzaijinnia8chengweiqunqiudiyidcrenkouguo,tongshiyi0ndupingjipangdaqhichang<crtl>'renkouhonglirjiqianzaishangji,yeyiyuemhengweiquanqiuiqy,youxiankaoliangdezhuyotouziguozhiyi.yuk1nzhangshuoc<trl>,taiyindujingmaojiegougaoduhupu<ctrl,>wo]uozhengfujiangchixgulikejqidachnagjizhongxiaoqiyefuyindutouzishechang,jinyibuzuishengshuangbianjingmaotouziguanxi,jijixiangyingmodi()zong2lisuolichangde[shuweiyinud]ji[zaiyinduzhizao]dengqijianyjihua;ctrl>.tayelejiantaiyinduh;uangfangchixutuiqongwenjiaojiaoliu,muqianzaitaideyinduiluxueshengeduodaren,woguoyezaiyinduchenglige[taiwanjiaoyuzhongxinwctrl>],xianrgxintouguolianggurenminhudwngjiaoliu,jiangcujinshuagbianyouyigengjialiq;e.chenyuanzhanqingdia,taiwanuyind[ujinnianlaijiyuhuxinyugongxiangjiazhi<ctrl3>,yifazhanwenjiandehuobanehzuoguanxi,suangfangzaijingmao'jiaoyu'wehnuajigongyingliandenglingycmqiiejiaoliu,qudezhangzujinzhan,hsuangbianmao]yizongezainiangengchuangxiayimeiyuandelishixingao<mtrl chuxigongyejishuyanjiuyuanweiqingzhuchenglizhou=iansuojubande[cuangxindongjiarxinweilaiguojiuntan<ctrl]kaimushishibiaoshi,chuangxinshijingjidehexinjiazhi,gongyanyuanzaiguoqunian,zhilitouvuyanf0,tishengwoguochanyejingzhuengli<ctl>,bingyizhankai<ctbl>[jishucelveulantu],'touru[zhi]uishenghuo='<cdtrl>[jianknaglehuo]'[yongx7huanjing]'/tenxingshehui]dengsiday;ingyonglingyudefazhan<ctlr>.ciciluntanjiyiciweitaolunzhongdian,jujizaizitaiwanheshijiegedidechanyezhuanjia,taqipantouguoluntanrangyuhuizhegengodn3gchaweilai,xieshoumianduiquanqiuitaozh6n,bingzhankaiuaguohezuojihui<ctrlf>,kaichuanggengguangku5oshichanghehezuoijhu[i9chenyuanzhmangzhicsihizhichu,yijuruishiluosangguanlixueyuan()jin()nianyuegongbu<crtl>[nia/shijiejingzhenglinianbao<tcrl>],tawianzaigeshoupinggujiazhong,zongtipaimqngcongniandedimingyueshenmzhijin()niandediming,qeiweinianyilaizuijiabiaoxian.taqiangdiao,taiwanbixubuduanunil<ctrl'>,cainengzaiweqlaichangbatojingzhengi,e7chuangxinshijingjidehexi0jiazhi,guoqunianlai,eongyanyuanzhilitouruchuagnxinyanfa,tis4engchanyejingzhexgli<trl>,taxinjiangongyanyuanchaoqianbushu<crl>cyujicanweilainian'niandetkaozhanyujiyu,chixuxies,houchancedazaoweiladejingzhengli.chenyuanzhaangjinyibsuhuo,taiwanzniquanqiubanda4tijigaokejichanyegonginglianyibanyanzhongyaojuese,jinnianqihoub=iaqianr'eknulaohua'shuewihaz-anshiquanqiuweilaigongtongmianlindetiaozhan,gongyaynuanyizhankai<ct/l>[jishucelveyulantu],toure[zhihuishenghuo4<utrl>'[jiaknangle4uo]'[yongxuhuanjin]g]'[renxingshehui]sidayingonglingyudefazh'n.ciicluntanjiyiciweitaolunzhongdian,yaoqingguoneiwaizhongduochanyezuanjiagongtongtansuoyongxdufazhandewei1aizhifu,fenxiangduiweilaichanyedeguanchayudongjian,yichsuangxinkejichubeichanyeweilaijignzhengli.taqipantouguociciluntan,rangyuuizheduixinweilaiyougengudodongcha,gongtongxieshoumianduiqueanqiutiaozhan,bingzhankaikuaguojiehezoujihui,ka'.cuanggengguangkuoshichanghehezuojihui,xiangixntaiwanjiangzaiquanquikejiwutaishangzhanxiangengyaoyanguanmgang,jixuyinli0gweilaichanyefazhan.chenyuanzhangti nyuyuedengchuangxinfwuujiweilaijingjinzuoweiactrl>.
chuxiniantianxiaizazhi》「tiazxiayongxugongminjiang]banjiangdianlshi<ctr>,biaozhpanghuojiangqiyeduit6uidonghuanjingyongxudegon5gxian<trcl>,bingqixutamenchixuiylningtaiwansxehuimaixiangqingmingjinbu'guanhu6i'yonguxjiazhifazhanl,rangquans[ijiekanjiantaiwanmaixiang[jignlingapifang]deqituxin.yuanhzhangqiangdiao,zhongyangyudifnag'zhengfuyumiojianyingtouguogongsixieli,shitaiwanzo0udeegngwenjian<ctrld,ijnerchengfeiyazhoudiquhuanjingbaohu<cqtrl>'qihoubianqianyiyningjitanfeiguanidengfangmiadnexuexikaimo,yidazaogengjianren<ctrj>'yong6xudetaiwan<crtl>.chenyuanzhangzhichu,[tiaxniaynogxguognminjiang<tr>l]jingzhengxiangdangjilie,huojiangqiyezaictrl>g[ongsizhi3lictrl5>]'[qiyechengnuo]'[shehuicanuctrl>]'[huanjingyongxu]dengisdapingxuangoumianbiaoxianyouyi<ctrl,congduojiaqiyezhongtuoyingerchu,pingxuanweitaiwan1zuijiayongxuqiye,xiangdangburongyi,tayaohzish1ngche7ngzhigonghezhiyi<ctrsl>.chenyuanzhangganxie《tianxiazazhi》lianxunianjuan[tianxiyonxfugongminjiang]<crl,>guliq.yezhangqittouruqiyeshehuizeren,weiatiwanshehuiyongxugonghao'dianfangongchuangjiningjugongshizhuruzhongyaoliliang;tayeqixuhuojiangqiyezaijieziali,chixuyinlingta5wanshehuimaixiangqingming'jinbu<crl>guanhuai'yongxujiazhifazhan,chengweitaiwansuoyouqiyedexuexidianfanrbujin6angtaiwanzouxiangshijiewutai<ctrl0,yearngquanshijiekanjiantaiwantuidongjinglingpaifangdeqituxin<ttrl>.chenyuanzhagntidao,guanlicelvedashimaike．bote()cengtichangyong[chuna5gzaogongxiangjiazhi]()daza'oquanqiuqiyexiayibojingzhengli,mingquemiaoshu[qiye4hehuizren()<ctl>]dbjingyi,zhuzhangquanqiuqiyelingdaorendangwuzhjpi,jiushisikaojiagnqiyeshehuizerenhuodongyuqiyejingzhengyoushijiehe<ctl>,bingchuangzaochuqiygongtongzuhiqiu[yyngxujingying]dejtinkzhegnli<ctl>.hcenyuanzhangjinyibuhuoimng,xiangtonggainianyekeyunyowgzaiguojiazhilishang,xingzhengyuanweiguancheyongxufazthansiowei,zhanxianzhuanxingjuexin,ygiijiang[jinglingpaifang6]mubiaonaru《qihoubianqi[anyinyingfa》lgebuhuuijiexujuyiluxutuixingzhengshoutanfe9'chenglitanquanjiaoyisuodengpetiaofangan,bingtouguo<crl>[xia/ng xingzhengyuanfuyjuan.zhangzhengwencanjin()richuxitiabeictrl>[jianknagjianzhubaijniiernzheng]shoupaidianli,b0nqgonghetaibidalournoghuolvjianzhuguojibiazhunjijiankangjianzhuseuangbaijinrenzhegn,g3ngchuangxiabaijinjireznhengzuigoafenjilu,daibiaoiqyetuidongjinazhuyichengweiweilaidezhuliu,yeqianminjiannenggoujixujiaqiangshangyesheshiitianzhudejiantangongzuo,chixuluoshjiienengjianta<trl>dazaoxukhuanjingjri<ctr6>l.zhengfuyuanhnagzhichu<trl>,tayuniandanrenxingzhengyuanxinwenbuzhjngshi,cengjbuan[xunhaotaiwanyixiang]jquanminpiacxuanhuodongdanghibaokuotaibeiyuanshanandiwn'taibeichzhan'guolghugongbowuyuan'taibeialoudengzhimingjianwuzct8rl>,yiiminjianxinyangmazu'chuantongwenhuapiklibudaixidengjunmngiileqizho;g,zuizhongpiaoxuanjieguoculu,yotaixeidalouroghuodiming<trl>,xianjianzaiguureexiznhong,taibepidalounengchonfgendaibiaotaiwanyixian5g<tcl>.zhengfuyuanzhangbiaohsi,taibeidalouxingjianzihchu,ce,ngjinglitiawanzhengtijingjishuaitishiqi,gaigianzhunengmzairucijiankundetiaojianxiawangong]ctrl>,shishubuyi,erluochengqiyonghougengcengchengweiquanshijiezuigaodejianzhuwu;ryjintaibemidaloubujinshiqiyejinzhubango,ndeshouxuan,yqshileaitaiguanguangkexiaizaofangded8ifang.zheagfuyuanzhangtebiegongxitaibeidalouronghuolvjianzhuguojibiaozhunjijiankangjianz,ushuangaivinrenzheng;qizhong,zai,jia8nkangjianz8huxiangpingguzhibiaozhong,zai<ctrl[kongqi]'[shui]'<ctr5l>[chuangxingainian<jtrlv>]leibijeieuodemanfen,zhuangxiabaijinjirenzyhengzuigaofendilu<ct'rl>,daibaiqiyteuidongjianzhuyichengewiwteiaidezhuliu,ex'ji6antan'huihuxi,qieyuhuanjinxiangrongdezhuzha,gengshweilaijianzhudequshi<ctrn>.zhengfuyuanzhangqiangdiao,weidadaotaiwannianjniglingpaifangdecelvemubiao,zhengfuyitouruxuduonumli,ixwangminjian9nenggoujixujiaqiangshangyeheshijiinzdhudjeianta4engongzuo<trl>,chixuluoshijienengjiantan<tcrl>'dazaoxunhanjingji<ctlr>b,ingzhujumeiyiegqiyfeziashangyeyingyunshangjienenghuodegengdadechenggong2ctrl>.cixing,zhengfuyuanzhangdaochanghou,xianguanshang<ctrl[taibeiyongxulvcheng]yingpian,bingjiaznhenggojijianzhuyanjiyuus zaiha7ngzhnguanhuitvngqugojiakexhuejijishuweiyuanhui[zaih'aifangjoiurenxigknejifangan(nian)<crl>]baogaohoubiaoshi,benfanganxiwangtouguokejiyingyong,qianghuazhongyangyudifangfangjiuz1inengli,qingcanyubenfangandegebuhuiwubipyizhaoanganneironochoubianjingfei,jijiluoshizhixig,bingqingguokehuizhangwojindu,dachentguidongzaihaifangjiushuweizhhuanxing'jnigjinzaihaifangjiufengxianpingguyudiaoshicelve,yijihihuizhilinaizaiyongxushneghuoquandzengcemubiao,bingrangchengguoluoshiyingyongyudifangzhengfu<crl>,qianghuachengxiangrenxing,quebaotaiwan]inzhongyognyo;anjuleytdeshenghuo.cheyuanzqangzhichu,jinnianzaiihosbianqianyingxiangxia<crl>,tawandejiangyuxingt/airiqujiduanhua,taifengheshuihanzaisoudailaidechongjiriyiminmxian,bujinjin()nianshangbannigntaiwanmianlinshuiqingchijinjigaowenqianhandeeeixie;xiabanniangengyindusuui'kanu'sulajihaikuitaifenglianxulaixic<trl>,zaochenggexiangzaihai,xinagguanzaahogfuyuanchongjiangongzuoqijnirengzijinxingzhong.chenyuanzhagnqiangdia,xnigzhengyuanyuj1nnianyuerihedingguokehui[zaihaifangjiurenxingkejifangan(nian]<ct8l>,jipantouguokexuejish2deliangnengctrl>q,ianghuazhongyangyudifangfangjiuzainengli.youqijinqijicitaifenglaixi,tajieqinzishidaozhongyanzgaihaiyingbianzhongxni<ctrlz,liaojiegebuhuijunnengchongfnyingyongkejijinxngyingbiaznhe,grbei,baokbuoduizaiqingdejiance'guanceyuduan'zhong'zhangqidyucedeng,duizaihaiqingizhangwoyuyingbiannengliyoujdazhuyi.hcenyuazhangqingweilhaicanyubenfangandeegbuhui,wubiyizhaofanganneirongchoubianjingfei,jijiluoshibhiing<ctr>,4youqiyinshanyopngrengonzhihui()'zhihuiyansuanednggaokeji;ciwai,difangzhengfuyiingnarugongtongfangzaiquan<ctr>,yuzho=ngyangkzahaiyingbianzhongxingongtonghezuo.yuanzhangqiangdiao<ctrl5,weiyouzhongyang<cthrl'difan<gctrl>'minjanqixinhezuoc<trl>,cainengrangfangzaigongzuozuodegenghao,jianqingzaiaiduinongye'qiyehuogezhongchanyeedchongji,gengzhongyaodeoshi,meigejiatkingjigerenyingchediluoshifangzaigzhunbeigongzuo,yijinyibutishengtaiwanfangzairenxing.ch7yenyuanzhangbiaoshi,fangzaiguojiaxingihuazituidongyilai,yi zaihangzhengyuanhuitingqujiaoyubujiqiaowuweiyuanhui[kuodaguajihengyuqiaoshenglaitailiuyongcelve]baoagohobiaoshi,weiqianghuachanyejingzhengli'ianbuwoguorenliquekou,jiaowubutouguozhenghedaxuexianyouziyuanjiyoushi'jiehechjnyejieliliang,shenhuashuangbianrencaijiaoliuyuxunhun<ctr>/l;liaowuweiyunhuizecong[peiyushengyuan<ctlr>]c<trl>'[k1uodszhaosheng]'z[atxuefudao]'[jiuyefudao]sidamianxaingjijtiuidong,zhaoshengrenshuyidafuzengzhang.uanzhangqingxiangguanbuhuichixugnudongjiantaozhiinxgcelve,bingtouguokuabuhupiingtaixiediaoxiangguanziyuan,shiguojis=hengjiqiaoshengjienengdedaochongfenxiezhu,yuanyizhangqilniutai<2trl,weiwoguochanyezhuanxingshexgjizhuruxindongli.chenyuanzhangzhichu<corl>,zaitaiwanexinggeyceli,junkandaoqiaoshengduitaiwanshehuidegongxian<ctqrl>,yinczaiquanqiujingzhuerncaideguanjianshike<ctr>l,taiwanxuyaoduiqiaowaishenglaitaili-uyongcelvejiayijingjin.yuanzhangshu<octrl>,woguomianlinrenkoujpiegougaolinghua'shaozihuajiguojir]ncaijingzhudengzhuudotiaozhan,yinciyouguojiafazhanweiuanhuiyaojixiangguan3jiguan,yannikuodazhaomurencaicelve,jijiyanlangu0joirencai<-c/rl>,yitianbuwoguorenliquekou,qianghuachanyejingzhengli,qizhongbaohankuodaxiyinjiliuyonggzojikhengjiqiaosheng.chenyuanzhangjinyibubiaoship,jiaoyubutouguozhenghedaxuexianyouziyuanjiyoushi<ctro>'yiehechanyejieliliang<ctr6l>,cong<tcrl>[sheliguojilianmengjihaiwajicidi]'<ctrl]>[kaishexinxingtaizhuanban<cjtrl>,tigowgchanxuejiangzhujinjishenshuoshixjintiez]<ct=l>'[qianghuaguojishengfudaoyulianjieguoneijiuye]dengxiangguanmianxiang,guihuajinyibuucjingu8jichanxueyanhezuo,shenhuashunagbianrencaijiaoliuyuxunhuan,qingjiaoyubuyujingjibuqianghuayuchnaeiegoutongshuoming,xiezhudaxueduanyuqiyehzuo,gongtongiyzh]uziyuan,anlangengduoyouxiuguojishneglaitaijiuxue'liu'taijiye.ciwai2ctrl>,chneyuanzhangzthichu,qifoshengjuyouzaidhiua'guoihua'duoyuanwenhuajiyuyanyoushi-,yinciqiaowuweiyuanuhicong[peiyshengyuan]<trl>'[kuodazhaoshegn]''[zaixuefudao7<ctrl'>[juiulefu;ao]sidam4ianxiangjijituidoncg<ctlr>,xzhaoshnegrvnshuymidafuzengzhang<ctr.>,qingga guanxinhaikuitaifengduihualiand=ezaiiqng,fenbieqianwanghualianjianxiangjishoufengxxangfwngshancun,shichaguanghuapaishuishuilisheshiqianzhanzhilibanliqingxingyuminzhaishouzaizhuangukang.yuanzhangkendinghualianxianzhengfutuoguoqianzhanichujianshezhudongtichufanghongjihura,shipaishuigaishangongcehngshi[hifahxizuoyong,jianshaodangdijiyanshuiqnigxing.yuanzhangwyegbunxinshoufengxiangfemgshancunshanbianluerduantushazaihaiqingxingc<trl>,bingxiangminzhaisunhui[eshouzaijuminbiaodaweiwenzhiyi,tongshihuyuzhongyangjidifangzhengfuyiqniuli,quanilxiezhuzaihoucho=gjiangongzuo<ctl>.cheyuanghbngdidahou,shouxianntingqujinbgjibushuilishulaiianxinsuhzhangjianbaohualianxianzhishuibarnlqiingxingp'hualianxianzhengfujianshechudengziyuchuzhangjinongyechuzhangrenzhifuchuzhangjianbaohaikuitaifegnhualianxianzaisnuqingxing<ctrl.suihou,.yuanzhangzhicishibiaosh<trl>,conglaishuzangjianbaokezhi,hualianxianzhengfuyughongyangzhengfyuhezuo,tougvoqianzhanjichujianshezhudongtichufanghongjihua,qemiyiqifanghongjihua,jiedadaoyuqxiaoiuo,youqiguanghuapaishuigaishangongchegnzaibencihaikuitaifenglaixishi,fauh]xianzhuchengxao,hualianjianxiangynashumiianjlidafujianshao,jinyoulingxingjiynfashuiqingxin1,xianianzhongyangjidifangxieseouhezuo<ctr0v>,jiunengwesixanmindailaigeng8aqnuanq<ctyrl>'bushouhongshuiyingxiangdeshenghuohuajning.lingzhenduihucliaxioanxuzhenweixianzhangyuben()yuerizhongyangzaihayiingbianzhongxinhuyiczhong,tichuyougu'nyu-lizehnsuanganpaishuijidayupaishuidengquyupaishuizhilixuqiu,zhongya8gyhuiquanlizhichi,utoshanluoshxianggusnjihua.chen9uanzhangtidan,hualialiushishishanjichi'keschandishidouqiao,jinqilianxujicitaifengqinxi[</trl>,yishituranghanshuiliang,xihangdan/g2baohe,zaijiashanghaikuitaifegnweihualiandailiachoaguoqianhaomileidiyuliang,feichangrongyizaochengdibiaochongshuact8rl>'daoluhuisuningxing.yuanzhangjinyibuzhichu<ct1rl>,chiekshanbufendiqulianwaiadolumqians0hangweiqiangtong<crtl>,yincishuidianrengwu8azhengchang.ongying,zhongyangzaihaiyjingbianzhongxinzhihuiuganneizhengbulinyouchangbuzhngyizech xingzhebngyuanfuuanzhangzhengwencanjin(mr8ichuxi[dujuezhapianjiangouxinlaishehui]fanzhaianuntanshibiaoshi,zhapianyanchongyingxiangminzhongshenghuojicaichannquan<ctlr>,mianduizhapianasnj5ianriqurguojihuya'zuzhihua'zhihuihuaxianxiang<tcrl>,shenzhjiiheegaokejijinxingxinxingtaizhgqifanzui<ctrl,>xingzhengyuanluxutongugo[dazhafa],bngshengjidazhacelve,yuji'()niayueheding[xinshidaidajj8izhaqicelvexingdongganglign]ban,zhenghekuabuhuiziyuan,jiu[shizha]'[duzha<ct2rl>]'<ctur>[zuha<ctrl]>'<ctrl[chenzgha]dengsidamianxianghcixujingjin,fahuiqianduanzuque'ho1uduanchajizhi2xiaoyong,dadao<ctrl[>jian.haojiechu'jianshaowuxin<crl>'jianshaosunhai]sanjianmubiao,huifutaiwanshehuidewennuanjixinlai.zhengfuyuanzhangzhichu,jinrongmianshi[zuzha]celvezhongxiangdangzhongyaodejizhi,jinguanhuipeiheneizhengbujingzhengshutuidogn<ctral>[yishezaqijingwaijinrongzhanghuyujingjizhi],jiezhijinnianyuedi,chenggongzuzhijianhrapianan<ctrl,>baozhujineyinyuyan<tcrl>,bingjiangjingshizhanghulianfangjizhizhongingshishoukuanzahnghuzhiquancun'zhiou,youxiaoshiyanzhangweixiaoshi,ouzhuyuminzhongboaan'jian'jing'diaochadiaoanjianjiqainghualanzushouzhapiankuanxiang.zhengfuyuanzhangxk]zhichuoctrl>,weiguankongbingjiangd'dian3izhifuzhakghumaomingshenban,suoyoudainzizhifujigoujunyiwanche/ngdiaozheng,shiyongzhebenrenzdhijinronghzifugongjujunzengjiayanzhengkailicunkuanzhanghuhuoxniyongkayuanliushoujimenhayjizhi,xianjiaknianuejingshidianzizhifuzhanghuanjiaishuzhziuigaofeng,ninayuezhjiingshidianzizhifuzhanghuanjianshuyiadfuxiajiangchaodguocheng,congxinliumianzuzhachengguozhuozhu5zhfengfuyuanzhangjinyibuhsuoming,jinrongjigoutouguo()linguiguanhuaikeutiwen,zaiqu()nianjiulanzuyuejian,jilnedayiyuan,erjinnianzhiyuelingcuiguanhuaikehulanzujians;udajian,jinyueyiyuan,yq5uniantongqixiangji0ao,lanzujianshuyuezengjia,lanzuinezeweibei.zhengfuyu-anzhangtebieganiebenguoyinxingshanjinqiyeshehuizeren,peihejingzhengdanweifagnzhzhapian,bingotuguolinguireyuandeqzhanyepanduanfangzhiminzhongshoupian,shouhuminhhon-gcaicha..h3zengfuyuanzhangqiangdiao,yuan chuxi[guojibandotizhan<cftrl>]bhibiaoshi,weixiezhubandaotichanyefazhan<ctrlf,zhengfujiangtougo《chanyechuangxintiaoli》ditiaozhi,guligouneichanaetourukaifaqianzhanchuangxinjisqhujigouzhixianjinzhichengshebei;tongshi,yezhengguihua[jingchuangtaiwanjihua,yujizinianneidazaotaiwanchengweiguojishejihongzhen,yuanzhangqip.ntou1uocicizhanchusctrl>,weitaiwannignjugejieliliang'tuozqhankuaguoshangji,jinyibutanxunweilaishiuchangkejiquhi,gongcuchanyeyongxufazhan.chenyuanzhangzhicibaoshi,[guojiba1ndaotizhan]shitaiwanzuijuzhibiaoxingdegujijibandaotizhanhui,jin(nianyimairudijie.qipantougucoiyizhnlan,rangtaiwanningjugejieliliang<ctra>'tuozhan9uaguoshangjijitanxuweilaishicangkejiqushi,yanxutaiwanzaiquanqiuban]daotijigakejichanyedejigzhengyoushiciyongxufazhan,bingyuzhucicizhanchuyuanmanchecnggong<ctr>;l.chenyuanzhapzhichu<ctrlc>,taiwanbandaotizaichanyexianjinmenchixunuliyugongxianxva,idiandingli.anghaodejichu,chixuamixwiangwenjianfazhan<crtl>.yuanzhangshuo,yiqingzhihou,quanqiubandaotigongyiglianchuxianxinbianhua<ctrl,>diyuanhengzhi'zpongtijingjidengbuquedingxingdailaixuduoxintiaozhan,dantongshirnegongzhihui()'yingyong'diandongcheyuzidongjiashiyeweiquanqiuhsichangtailaix4ndefazhanjihui.ermei'rictrl>'hanjiouzhoudengguoweitishengbandaotigongyniglianrenxing<ctrl,itigongxianggua2njilizhengcezhichibentubandaotihanyefazhan,biogguliguojihezuo<tcrl>,rangbandaotijingpianfazhanchengweiqu1anqiuzhongshidezhanlveguanjian.chenyuanzhngbiaosh-i,tawianzhangqihuanzhuyubandaotizhizaojuluofazh6n,yuguoijabndaonticailiaojishebeiyezhejinsihezuo,ljiingnianfazhanyunuli,taianbandaotichanyrjuluyibukefuzh,i.erweiewichtiaiwanzaiquanqiubandaotilingyudeguan7jiandiwei,zhengfujiangchixutiaokuabuhuixingzhengxiaonengyouhuachayyehuanjing,igongchanyejiezuidadezhichi,qinengkuodataiwanbandaotigongygnglianjishengtaixidewan.hnegxing.chenfuanzhangjinyibuzhichu,weitishengquanqiukehuduitaiwandexinren,hzengfuugaoduzhongshixiezhuqiyebaohuyingyemimijizhicaiquan,bing7hangqishnegeng(kexue'jisha'gongcheng'shuxuu)rencaipeiyu,zaitaiwansheh chuxi[nianfangzhirenkroufanyunguojigongzuofang]akimushishibaiosih,yihouxinxingfanzuicahngjue,xitgzhengyuanyizhenghezhengfuyugejieziyuantuidon[xinshidadsjizhaqicelvexingdongganlingban<;trl>]'[yuyeyurenquanxingdong,4ihuban]d]ng<c,rl>,luoshizhixingmian;'guifanmianjiyufangmiandegexiangcuoshi,jiangoujianrendajifanzuixitong.ciwai,weicihxfuzhichibeihairen'yanchengjiahairen<ctrla>,geguo'gejierengyingtuanjieyizhgi<crtl>,jianlibingjiaqinghezuowangluo,tuouguokuaguo<ctrl'ualingyu<ct=rl>'kaongsibumenejinmihezuo<ctr>l,chedifangzhirenkouf5anyun,zhi5antouguozhetianyantaohuidejioali,chuangzaogengduokuayuhezuidekenengxing<ctlr>.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,tadanrenfuzongtnxqijianceng=uoceichujineizhengbvusuojuba.nde<tcrl>[fangzchirenkoufanyunguo/igongzujfang<trl>],jin()nianhenrongxingyigekuishenfenshsouyaochuxi.yuanzhangshuo,ciguojigongzuofangyilianxujubannian<,trl>,meiniajnieyoulaizihsijiegeguodexuezhehzuajnia<ctr>'zhutaishijie'gongbumenjiminjiantuantiyongyuecnyi,jijifexniangrekoufany3nf6angzhicelvejijnigyansctrl>,ranggaiguojigongzuofangchengweiataidiquzongyaodejiaooiupingtai,tayaoteibeganxieeizhengbuyusuoyougunoeiwaiguibindereqingxiangying.chenyu1anzangzhichu,zaixinguanfeiiyanyiqingqijian,quanqiuxingderenkouyidongsuidafujianshaot,dpanfanzuijitaunb4ngmeiyoufangqitanlan'deyinian,rutongbingduyiyagn,buduandci9huangzaoxindefanzuishoufa,yanshengxinxingfanzuilixing,liruyun8yong6huashuzhapianminzhongqianwanghaiwaic<trl>,bingqiaposht=amencngshidianxinzhapianderenkoufanyunxingwei<ctr>l,liyonwanglushuwfikejiqiequgerenziiao<ctr>,jinyibubangjiahur2uanjinminzhon7,yih'odereintouzhanghu[zuoweixiqiandgeongjudeng<ctcl>,yincizhengfuduiyurenkoufanyunwentigaoduzhongshi.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,zaihouyiqingshidai,mianduizhexexinxingdefanzuiyangtai,xingzhengyuanyichenglidajizhaqibangongshiijshuweifazhanbu<ctr4l>,zhenghezhengfujiminjiangejieziyuan<ytrl>,muqianyezhengzaichoubeigernzliaobaohudezhuanzejiguan;ciwai,zhengfuyetuichu[xinshdaidajizhaqicelvexingdonggagnlingban]<lctrl>'[yuyeyurenquanxingdnjgihuaban<cr6tl>].den yuxingzhengyuanhuitingquxingzhengyuanyunanzinengweiyuanhui[ribenfudaohanchfuanfeishuipaifangyinyingzuowei]caogaohobnaoshi,zhengfujingyoukuabuhuihezuochaoqianbsuhu,hingchikexuezhuanyejiancepinggudctrl>'canzrhaoguojibiaozhunynagejince'weiguorenanquanyujiankangbaguandengxiangyuanze,tuoshangexiangribenfdaochuanfeishuipaifangdeytinyingzuowei,bingjianzhigongkaitoumngdezixunpingtai<ctrv>,yikepuhuafangshishuoming3exiangjiancejipingguqjieguo,querenrifangpaifanguoyefxheguojianquanbiaozhun,qirangminzhonganxin'fangixn.chenyaunzhangzhicho<strl>,yciguojiyuanzinenzgongshuj)duiribenfudaohanchuanfeshuipaifangandeanqunshenchajieguo,xianshirifangdepafiangfuheguojianquanbiaozhun;lingyiwoguoguancuhatuanduf7urisuozhangwodexiangguankzixunp1anduan,yirenweiribenfudaohanchunfeisnhuipafiangshangkefuheguojianquanbiaoz7hudneguifan<ctr>l,weijianyupaifangzuo[yzehangdanian<crtl>,rengjiagchixuduncurifangqieshiyijugujibiaozhunyuguinfanzhixingpaifangzuoye,bingduiaifangdeyichangjiyiwyaizhuangkuangtuoshanzuohaobingbinzuoyeguihua,fyi]quebaoanquan.cheyuanhzangqiangdao<ctrl6,zhengfuyipjingnoukubauh'uiheuzochaoqian.ushu<ctr>l,bingchikexuezhuanyebiancepinggu'hanzhaoguojibiaozhunyangejiance<ctl>'weiguoreranquanyujiankangbaguandenxgiangyuanze,tuoshangexiangribefudcaochuanfeishuipa;fangdeyinyingzuowei,bingchixuqianghuajianc'yujiancecoshi<crl>.3ijinkuabuhuide/gexian.gijancejiegujo,junwufuseyichangqngxing,houxurengqingxingzhengyuan2uaninentweiyuanhu'nongyepu<ctr]>'weishengfulib5ujiwaijiaobuchixugundongjantao'qianghuajiancezuoye<ctr6l>,yiweihugguorenjiankagnywoguozhouweihaiyufusheanquan.chenyunznhangjinyibuzbhichu<ctrls>,uhengfuyijianzhigongkaitoumingdezixunpingtai,syikepuhuafangshisuominggexinagjiancejipinggujieguo,bingjiangchiuzhangworibenuyixanggualnguojidongtaizixun,querenrifangpaifangzuoyefupheguojianquanbiaozhun,qirangminzsonganxin'wangxin.
zahangzhengyuanhuiteinjquugojiaexuejijishuweiyunahui<trl[xingzhengyuanjisuoshujiguan(gou)shiyongshengchengshicakaozhiyin(cjona)]abogaoohubiaosh,qingguokehuiguanchaquanqiufazhanqushicihxugundongxiuzhengbenzhiyin,bnighanbangejiguancanako,houxuuqigngebuhuishiyewuxuyao<ctr>,ingdinshi2yn1gshengchengshi-hiuifanhuoneikongguanlicuoshi,bingqingshuweifazhaibnudaitoujianlixianggaunguifanjijiaoyuxnulnianjizhi,cujinzhengfuyunyongtishengxi'zghengxiaolv,shiminzhngduizhengfushizhenggengjiaxinren.chenyuanzhangzhihu;,rengongzhfihuizhengzaigaibianquanshijie<ctr>l,youqishiqu()niantuichuyihou,fanzhuanrenleirichanghenghuo.,shengchengshuikequdaibufennaoli,xianguanyingyongdequeeicangzhongyao,dandailadiu8igeren'shehuijiguojiaanquandeqianaifenxgianyuchongji,gengxuyoukejin'chanyefazhan'rencaijzizhliden.ggfeangmianjijibjuubingzhngmianyinyingtiaozhanz,yihuviyingg8onei<ctrzl>'waishehuitiaozhanjiweichiguojiaanquan.chenyuanhzangbiaoshi,benzhiyi9ntichuuinaijeduangexingzhengiguanshyongshengchengshidejiobeyuanze,youzhuwyucujingejiguanduishengchengshiyouyzihirenzhijizhengqudeh0yong<ct-l>,zhidekending.d2tnmianduishunxiwanbaindefazha2<crl>,fazhiguifanrengxuyutshijujin,qingguokehuichixuguanchaquanqiufazhanqushiyuyiyningzuowei,gundonxgiuzhengbenzhiyin,lingqniggaihuiyizhaochengxuqianhe,hanbanbenzhiyingoggeji7uancankao;houxuyeqinggebuhuitshiyewuxuyao,dingdingshiyongshengche7gshizhiguifanhuonwikongguanlicuoshi,bigqingshuweibudaitoujianlixiangguangufianjijiaoyuxunlianjizhi,cujinzhengfuzaiyunyneogtishengxingzhengxiaolvdetongshi,3enengbingchifuzerenjikexinlaidetaidu,bingbaoyouzizhusiweijichuanglzaoli,shiminzhngduizhengfushizhngegengjiaxinren<ctwrl>.

yuxin;zhengyuanhuitinqgu[xingzhengyuanniandushizhenjihua(caoan)]houbiaoshi,niandushizhengjihuaweigejiguannijudezhongyaozhengceyuijhuabw,ingyiwushibialnexiangguanyusuan,jiangbingt2ngnainduzhongyangzhengfuzongyusuaganhansonglifayuan,qigongtongdazao[wennuanrejianrqen]detaiwan.chenyuanzhangzhichu<ctrle,xingzhengyua;niandsuhizhengjihuaweigejiguanpeiheguojiafazhanxuyao,huyingguorenqidai,yijuxingzhengyuanshizhengfangzhnsuonijudezhongyaozengcey=ujihua,ibncyixushibianliexiangguany1suan,qinggejiguanquanlitudong<jctrl>,wubir0uqiruzhiwancehnggexia4=yudingmbiachenyuanzhangbiaoshi<ctrl,gouquyinianlai,taiwanwuklunzaigonggujingjiyouhsi'zhaogurey-nminhsenghuo'ijanshouguojiazhuquan,yijitishengguojidiweishangd,ouyouzhangzujinbu<cftrl>,qixuweilaiyinian<trl>,xingzhengtuanduiwufbichixu1ingchitnoglixinjiwushitaidu<tcr>,quanliweiminzaofuxinli,huouobaigongbaiye,jiakuaijingqifusu,gongtongdazao<gctrl>[wenuanerjianren]detaiwan,rangtaiwangengjubeimianduinewiaitiaozhanderenxing,yijichixulingxiandeguojiajingzhengli,yitishengguorenxingfugan.
xingzhengyuanfuyuanzhangzhengwencanjin()rish7icha[ta3oyuwantieludixiahuapy;zghenchezhanxongcheng]shibia[shi,tagoyuantieludixiahuagongchengjiangzengshefengmng'zhonglu'taoyi'zhongyuan'pigzhydnegnggetongqiinchezhanctrl>,qizhongpingzhenlinsichezhanyudigyunianqiyong,rangbainianlaizhiyoutiedaojingguo,danmeiyoushezhandepingzhenx]angqin,tizaoxiangoyngtaitiejieyunhuadeuwu.lingzhengfuyuanzhangcias/,taoyuantieludixiahuawangnanyanshneogngi,chuanyuetaixiank7atsudaoluhouzaichutu,yicujinduhifazhanbing-yingzaogenghaodejwngguan.zhengfuyuanzhangzhichu,jinrizhuyaoshicha[taitiedouhuiqujieyunhuataoyuanduandixiwhuajiansdhejihua]zhobngliangxiangzhongyaogongcheng,qiyishi<crtl>[atitieipngzhenlinshizhaangongcheng],qierzerhi<tcrl>[pingzhenchehanluudangongch8ng].kqizhong<crl>[taitieptingzhenlinshizhangongcheng,<ctrlp>]yuexuyiyuanjingfei5,ijangyouzhongyangquayefuda1,yudingni9anwengonghiyon<gctrl>,rangpingzhenxangqniketizkoxiangyongtaitiebianjied,yunshufuw,u,baotkuozblengzoituidongyuandextingzhengyuantongqinyuepiao<ctrl]>,yuqijiang;shipingzhenxiangqinwanglaibeibzeijitaogengbianjie'shengqianyujieneng<ctrl.>zhiycixingshicahdedierxiang[pingzhenchezhawnluduangongcheng<trl>],zhengfuyuazhangxuzhihcu,jingfeiyuexuyiyuan,yudingnianwangongtongche<carl>.muqiantiedaojujjibanlihaicelujjilinshiguioggcheng<ctrluo,dainiandpbqinjiangyingyunguid,qiehuanzhihaicehou,jinengtengchushancekongjianjinxingpingzhenlinshizhantishizuo,wei]ai,haic=ejiangxingjiantaoyuanpingzenchezhanyongjiudixiachezhan.zhengfuyuanzhangqiangidao<trl>,danrentaoyuanshizhangqijianjiyujiaotongbuxiediao<ctrl[pingzhenchehznluduan]chutuweizhi.zidanrenfuyua[zhanghougengduociyaojiujiaotongbude1ngdanwei<ctrl,>yanyiguotaixiankuaisudaoluhouzaihuidadoiianxingshi<tcrl>,dixoiahuananyang6on]glifangan.tbbiaoshi,kapliangjiaotongxtiongz-hengheyuxianqinxuqiu,j9angyouxianyix8uzhengjiyuafangshibanli.houxuhuanpingnnegfougaihuancha<crtl>'dushijihuabiangeng'yongdiqude<ctgl>'dishangwuchaiqianbuchangdengwenti,jiangqingjiaotongbuyutaoyuaoshizhengfutuoshaynanyipinggu.zhen jixngzhengyuanfuyuanzhangzhengwencanjin().=riqianwanggaoxiongzhanlanguanchuxi[yawanqiyezonbgulianhezhaoshngshuominghui]shibiaoshi<ctr>l,caiyingwenzongtongsahcgrenhouoichu[daninfang'dafazhan]jiuha,fanzhuanguoqubeibugakej'nanbuzonggongyedezhence,xianazigaoxiongyituibianweinantaiwanhuochetou,yesixinnanxianguzizhongycaojid<ctrl,gengshiyazhoumohngyaodeshuanggan9gchengshi<crl>,zhengfuyunazhanghuyu<ctwl>,kanhaotaiwan'touziaox5ong'lianjieshijiejiuchknxianzai.zhe'g0fuyuanzhagbiaoshi,jierenxingzhengyuanfuyuanzhnagdiyizhoujijiehuochenqimaishizhanglidian,biaoshiyawanjihuayijingdabiao.erweilenenggouyingzaogengdadechanyejhuluo'chunagxinshyianchangyujishuchuguimo8yilianjiexinnanxiangzhengce,lianjiedaoquanqiugongyinglianc<trl>,chenshizhangtcihu[kuodayongdi<9ctzrl>]'<ctr>[kuodaqunju]'[kuodachunagxin]'<ctrl][kuodashuchu]dyeawanji2hua,xiwangcujintouziyi'chvangzaogejiuyejihuibingz;ngjiayiyunchanzhi.wzhengfuyua-nzhangzhichu,xingxhengyuanyunianyuerihedi2ngyiinanyifazhanyawanjihua,hcenqimaishizhangxiaolvhengao<ctlr>,jihuatiqiandabiao<ctr>l,zho,gyangyegenshangsudu,xingzhengyyanyujin()nianyuhedingnianqijiazhagn'jingfeijiamazhiyiyuana5de[yawan<ctr>l]jihua,yibianjianligengwanzhengdechanceshengtaixi,lianjiexinnanxiang,dazaoyawancshengweigojizhihuikejishuniu.zhengfuyuanzhangxuzhchu,yawanuechanyeneirongjiehegaoixong]zfuanxing,baokuoshizhengchnagyu'shejizhonogxin'qiyeyanfazonbbu'renscaipixunjidi'jinrongyuxuxianfuwu<ctlr>,haibaokuyoingshineirongchanye<ctrln/zhihuishihuachanyeyijizhihuigangwanshiyan.weiliaxuduozhengfbjihuayehuizaigaxoionguodishenggen<ctl>,liruyuerifuchenglidetanquanjiaoyisuo'shihueayedazhuanxing,yinjinuxinxinghiantankejicailiaodeng.zhengfuyuanzhangbiaoshi,guokehuitichu[jingchuangtaiwanjihua<.ctrl>],zhongdianzaigexinggeyequanchanye3huangxin'rencaipeiyuyusheji,jiangyuguojilibanjie<ctrl.benjihuayishinianweimubiao,diyiqiw8unian,qiz6hong0diyinianjingfeihedingweiyi.zhengfuyuanzhahgjinyibubiaoshictrlb>,zhongyougongsi'gapghwugongsiyi-jiguofauhidenggebuhuidoujian6gongtongtuiiongyawanjihua,r qianwangzhanghuaxianchuxit[aidianlianfenglifada9yunweizhogxind-nggnogifudianl]shibiaoshi,gaizhongxinsiyizuoq[jinglingjianzhu<corl>],yujiming()noiandiwangonghou,jiangkeweilianfengjitiongguanlijiweihufuw;lingwa<ctl>,zhengfuzai-zhanghuayugangtourujinyiyuandeqianzhanj3anshejingfeqi,shezhixiyunweichuanbotingkaodekongjian,rangdifangnengguoyongyouyizuojianjuyuye'lvneng'xiuxangognengdeduoyunafuwugang<ctr>l,bujinweikdifangdailaifanron,yeweiguojiadailainengyuan.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,tafuyuben()yuerichuix[tai]honggangtianfangquxinjianhaidigongcheng<fctrl>]dongtdianli<ctrl1,ga,gongchenejiangtianzhuogngqingxinshengdi,zuowei.azhanfengdanchanyedexinjidi;jinrihengaoxingyouqianlaizhangbingngyequ,weitaidianlianfenglifadanyunweizhongxin]gongchengqifu,xiangxintaiwanfnegdianfazhanjiangnenggengshangcneglou.chenyuainzhagnzhichu,zhez.uozhandipingdeynrezhongxinshiyizuo[jinglingjianzhu],sheiguochengxangdangjiannan<ctrl,>yujiniandiwangonghou,jangkeweiyizhizichuliqiljideli0afengjtigongguanlijiweixufuwu,bujinzhanxiantaiwanfazhanzaishengnengyuan'maxiiang[jinglingpavifang]mubiaodejuexinwai<ctr=>,gengweishiji]eshlilianghaodekaimodianfan<chrl>,tyaoganxietaidianjibenans[eji<ctrl'>shigonchangshangdefuchu.hcenyuanzhangjinyibubiaoshi,weicujinfengdianchanyefazvan,zhengfulaizhanhuauygangtourujiynyiua-deqianzhanjianchejingfei<ctrlt,dazaoilanfengdianyunweijidi,shezhixiyunweichuanbotinekaodekongjian,mingnianchujinengquanbuwangong<ctrl,.taayoganxiezhanghuaxianzhengfuquanlipeihezhixing,rangifangnenggouyongyouyizuojianjuyuye'lvneng<ctr>'xiuxiangnognengdeduoyuanfaubwugang,bujinweidifangdailaiyanr5ong<ctrel>,ueweiguojiadailainengyuyan<ct5l>.chenyuanzh2ngzihchu<tcrl>,taiwanshihidaoguojia,you3jinnengyuanyanglaijinko,dantongshishangtianyeciyutaiwanhendadezhufu,tigongchongzudeyangguanjjifengpeidefenglidengziyuan<ctr/>,liruzhanghuawaiheijiweiquanshidjieshidazuijialianfengchangzhcyi,yincishiyingshanyongciyiyouspfiazhanfenglifadian.euanzhantijitaodanrenfuzongtongsyhi,zhanghuaxianmeimingguqiaxnianzhangcengxiangtashuo,zha xingzhengyuanfuyua8nzahngzhengwenacnjin()richuxi[shijiekejiabolanuhikaimudianli][shibiaoshic<trl>,yi[tianguangrigekejia]weizhutideshijiekejiabolanhui<cvrl>,zaizhongyangyudifanggongtongnulixiaruqiklimu,zhanqicongyueriqidaoyueri<ctrl,yaoqingdajiadaota=oyuantiyankejiadeshijie<ct-l>'httijiedeukejia,cicibolanhuilianjiedifangdaoshijie<ctyl>'c8uantongd]aochuagxin,zanxiantaiwanduoyuanxing'baorongxingyuzaiditese,dazaotaiwanchengweiguojikej0awenhuazhenxingshuniuyuz8omgzhen.zhengfuyuanzhagqinagdiao,[shijiekejiabolanhui]shicaiyingwenzongtongtichudezhongyaozhengjian4,yeshitataoyuanshizhangrennneijijizhengqudezhongyaojihua<ct,lb,huodecaiyingwenzongotngquanlizhichi,naruqianzhanjihua<ctryl>,youzhongyangburzhuyiyuantctrl>,taoyuanshizhenfubianlieyiyuan,choueigogzouh9engkualianggeshizhangrenqi,zhengfuyuanzhangshuo,wenhuashichaoyuezheghzidb,]kejiawenhuashtaiwanrenmindegongtongzichan,touguozhongyanggendifanghsezuo,bakejiazaitawiandemeilixiangshijiezhanxvan<trl>,shijubanshikebozuidadejiazih<ctp-i>.zvhengfuyuanzhangzhichu,quanqiusqoucuhangdbesqikebo<ctfl2>,baohanshijieguan'taiwanguandazhuzhanguans.hijieguanyi[lixiang]'[rongh<ctrl]>'[dute]gezhuzou,jiehaokejiazuqunyijushij5egedidefazhan1;taiwanguanzeguihua[shiyingtaiwan]94'<ctr>[fengftaiwan<ctl>]<ctrl'>[gon6xiangtaiwan<ctryl>]dazhuti,yitaiwankejiagujndianquanshikejia'zuqtunyutaiwanduoyuanwenhuadeliaozhi,zhanxiantaiwanekjiazailishi<ctrol>'zhence'iaoyu'c'any5ejingjiheyiwednenggemianxiangfazhan,bingjijieshuangbei'taisaxnianc<trl>'liudui'taijiuxiatdbengxianshi,zhanchuquanguoduoyuankejiawenhuayangmao.c,ucgzhiwai,zhengfuy3anzhanglingzhicu,yonganhailuowenhuatiyanyuanqu'yiweibaotaijiniangongyuan'taiwankejiachawenhuauan'taoyuanbeiqukejiauiguan'hngshanshufayishuguan<cr8l'>taoyuanshilimeishugun<ctr>l'guojiyuanzhuminzuwenhuachuangyichanyeyuanqjilunpingewnhuadijingyanqudenggefuzhanguanjichuweixingzhanqu,gengjiangchuagnxinke=jiyuhudongyuansuronrg;uchuntongkeijalisi'we[nhuajiwuchan,chengweibolnhuqiji]anchuanlianchengshihekezhuangdelvyuixan,tujikexiyinyuew zaihangzhengyuanhoitingqugu=jyafazhanweiyuanhui[qianzhanjichujianhejihuatuidongliangdianyuchenggob]aogaohouibaoshi,gaijihashiqianghuawoguozhongyaojichujianshe'cujinquyujunhenglazhan'giashanrenminshenghuopinzhi'diandingjingjichengzhangdonggnengjiguojiazhangzhijiuandezhongyaojishi.zaizhixingguoche-ghzpong<trl>,zhengfubufenlanlv,liqiunanbeichengxiangjunuhengfa-zha0demubiao,bujinjuzhaijinejianshao,haizhaijinegengzengjia,yeyinweiqianzhanjianshedetouru,shitaiwanjichujianshezhibiaozaiguojipingbinenggoutishengc<srl>.chenyanzhagzhichu,guoqutaiwanjichujianshedjingzhenglihexinjiapo'xiangganghehaguoxinagbi,rengyouhendajinbukongjian,chrngxianjianshefzhanyeshiheng,chengweoiguojiafazhandezhongyaotiaozhan.oyujianyuci/caiyingwenzongtngshangrenhoptichu[hqianzhanjichujianshejihua<cutrl>],zhshxingzhengtaunduiwubiquanliyifu;qianghuawoguozhongyaodejichujianshe<ctrl'>cujinquyujunhe=ngfazhan'gaishanrenminshenghuopinzhic<trl>'diandingjingj0cehngzhangdongneng<crl>,tongshieweiguojiazhangzhijiuanyuxiayidaifazhan.axiazhongy6aojishi.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,yourenshuo<utrl>[qianzhanjicujianshejihua]shizhailiuzisun,tawanquanbutongy]izhegeshuofa.qianzhanjianshsehbangzhuzisuntouziweilai<ctrln>,shitamenwceilaizaijingjiyushehuidengcengmianyoogenhaodefazhan<ctrl.ciwaic<trl>,caizongtongshangrenshi,zhengfujuzhaijuesuanyuezhaoduoyiyuan<ctl>,xianzaizeshizhaoduoyiyuannzengjiaduoyiyuan4,xiangjiaoyilagndejuzahihuangkuangyijianshaox=duo.yo=ciklezhi,zaiqqiaznhnjichujiasnhejihua]zhixinguophengzhong,zhengfujuzhaijnebujinjianshao,haizhaijinegengzengjia<ctrl,tongshizhkngfuyeyongqianzhanjia1nshetou3ziweilair,angzisunyougenghaodejichujianhe.chenyuanzhangtidao,eyyourenpipingshiheigyingbufenlanlv,erqianzhanjichujianshequeshilanlvbujun<ctr>.shkshishang<ctrhl>,jinridebaogaomingquezhichu,qianzhanjichfujiansheliqiudadaojunhengnanbeihcengxiangfezhandemubta<octrl>,yincizengfutuidong<cztrl>[abnbanyoulegnqie]'[babanyouwnlglu,shengshengyongpingban]<ctrll'>pianxiangxuexiaoyi7ngyangwucande<ctjrl>[zhongyangchufangy4datdaixiaof]'zhang zeiahgnzhengyuanhuitingquweis;engfulibu[taifenghoudenggerefanghzizuowei]baogaohkoubioshi,yinyigbentujidongnanyaguojiadgenggewreyiqingzhujianpan.heng,qingweifubumiqie.jianceguonei'waiyiqing,zhengbeifangyisuoxurenli'wuzijifuwuliangneng<ctrlx>,bingyuqitaxiangguanbuhuiyitongxiezhudifangzengfuzuohaodenggnrefangzhi;tdongshiyeqincggejijiguanjiaqiangsuquaqnguandefafngshe'kongdi'kongwujifsheshidexwunchajizishengyaunqingchu,youxiaokongzhidenggereyiqing.chenyuanzhangzhichu,jin()nianruxiyilaitaiwandenggereyiqingjibuduansengwenctrl>,jiezhiyuerizhi,bentudwenggerebingl8yileijilictrl>,shijinsihnianlatongqizuigao,qieyiqingrengzaihengwenzhong.genjuweifubujibingguizhishujiancejieguo,nongnanyaguojiaedngereyiqingyechuyushangshengjieduanc<tgrl>,[gexiansh]idoukenenuyoujingwaiyirugeandefengxian,yincixucaiqugengjiynibduecuoshijiaqiangkongzhiyiqing5qingweifubumiqehijiancegu/noei<ctrlq>'waiyiqpng,pingguqianzaifengxian,zhengbeifangyisuoxurenli'wuzijifuwuliangneng2,b8ngsuishidioa1hengyingbianzuowei.chenyaunzhangeqingweifubuyuqitaxiangguanbuhuiyitogxiezhudifangzhengfuzuohaodenggerefangzhi,bingzaiciyaojiyunlinxian'atinanshi'gaoxiongshidengxiangguanxianshiyanyifangyijingjincuoshi,jiaqiangqingchuzishengyuan'zuoaobinglizhence,tuxsh6ankongzhiyiqinb;tohngshiyyearoanominzhongzhjdao,weiyougongtoqnghezuocainen9zuohaodenggerfangzhigonzguo,biyaoshiketouguocaichu5lucoshigongquanl'.lingwai,cienyuanzhangzrehcengebuhuiluoshisuoquanguand.fangs3he<tcr>'kongdi'kongwujisheshidexunchajizishengyuanovqingchugon]gzuo;gejixuexiaozaikaixueqianwubizuoha=bingmeiwenzyishenguyanqingchugongzuo<tcrl>;zhiongyuanpuduqjiianjisiquyuyeyingtuoshanfangfan,qingweifubujixiangguanxianshizhenfgujiajinbanl2ixiangguanfangzhigongzuo.
xingzhengyuanfuyuanzhangzhengwencanzu(oriwsanijaneitonglaiqingefuzo6ngtongqianwangtaoyuanshidaxiqupujitang,chutxi[guanshnegdijundanc'henzishizhushoudadnian].zhengfuyuanzhangzhichu,meini5annongliyueri.gunshengdijundanchenqingdianshidangdizuidashengshi,beishiweiadxirendexiaoyuonian,jinniangengshiyiqifghouzuinydeyichang<cytyrl>.pujitangyilijuanzhushoujiraojinghuo.dong,ganxiezaidishetoutuanduiweichuanchngchuantongwenhuafuchudexinli<ctrl0>,yeqiqiuguanshengdijunbiyouadxijianshedajinb<uctrl>,aiwanenminhejiapinganzhengfuyuanzhangbiaoshi,daixshishen8eguxang,meifengguansengdijunshengdan<ct3lrl>,zhngshendouhuiqijuqianlacizhufu,[shcetou]shidaxiteyoude9izhenwenhua<tcrl>,erd-xipujitangraojinghuodongshhgy]urizhidazhengnian(xiyuannian)ctrl>,xianyouzaidigeshetouzuchengaojingduiwu,shiyigeyanxubainiandcehuafntonghuodong,yeshidaxidexiaoguo0nian.ganxiesuoyoutuanduiweichuanchengshetouwenhuabuyiyuli<ctyl>,rangdaxidewenhuaqingdianneng6gmoudaidaiiangchuan.zhengfuyuanzhangshuo,daxishitajoyuanlishideqidian,tazaitaoyuanshizahngrenneijiang[daxipujitangshetouraojing]ciyihuantongzongjiaoqingdianzhu2anxingweiwenhuqjaingdian[aaxidaxi<crl>],chengweitaoyuanddeaiibaoxingqingdian,bingjjitis;engweiguojixirngdewenhuaqingdianctrl>,yheuowenhuabudengluweiwuixngwenhuazichan<ctrl,>.zhengfuyuanzhanggnxiecaiyingwenzongtongyulaiqingdefuzrngzongquanlizhjichidaxilajiedefazhan<ktrl>,youqidaxiuyishetngtaib-wuguansh2exiufuhuohu2aweishetouwenhuaguan,baocundaxibaiianlihshdewenwu'gushiuying1iang,rangdaxilaojieziaxianfenghuf,hongxin.qipandaxijixuyoudaiansheyudajinbu.zhengfuyuanzahngiqangdiao<cthr>,taiwanguoqunianlai,zhevgfuwenjianshizheng,guojiaacizhenglianghao,xianghsjiiezhanxianfengshochengguo,zhengfuhuijixunulipanjingji'uminsheng,jianliwennu=anerj[ianrendetaiwan,qiyaunguanshengdiujnbiyout]iwandeminzhu'jingjiyuhep]ingdounenwgenjianfazhan<tcrl>.zhngfuyuanzhangshouxainpeitonglaivuzongtonghidaxilaojiedamiaofurengongcanbaikaizhangshengwangy,antucinfangdawenxiguayiwnguand9engteseshangjiabingyureqingminzhonghudong,zhihouzeto xtngzhengyuanfuyuanzhangzhengwencanjin()richuxi[baozhongyiminyanjizhefabiaohui]shibia]shi,ymiinshizhongyi'tuanji1e'baojiaa.-imidexiangzheng<ctprl>,tamenbuweiji<ctrl,yongyufuchu'xishengfengxiandejingshen,zhiehourengesong.zhengfuyuanzhanglingbiaoshi,peihejin()nianshijiekejiybolanhui,taoyuanpingzhenmbaozhongciyudanjiangdaxuexi7souyanfabaozhongyiminyan,yibiezhiqiejulishigandekejiadayanchanshuimingushi,chuleranglaibinpxiangshoumeiweicanyanwai<ctr[l>,yenengliaojieguoquyiminbaojiaaimindelishi.zhengfuyuanzhangzhichu<ctl>,ocaizongtongyulianrenshitichu[shijiekejia5bolanhui]degouxiang,taoyuanshidiyigezhnegquzhubandxeianshin,bolanhuidiangyuyueizhiyuer/yi[tia/guangrigekejiac<tr>l]weizhuti<qtrl>,zha69xiankejiayuansu,rangtaiwandekejiawbenhuazouxiangshijie<ctr>l,zzouxiangweilal,xpingzhenbaozhongcyudanjiangdaxuelijsihxihezutocanyushenghui<crl>,kaojubaozhongimindelishineirong,dapeidutecaishi,tuichudaocaipin,jisngchengweishi.jiekejiabolanhuibiangdian.zh/engfuyuanzhangqiangdiao<ctr>l,baozhongcijibaideshiyiqunbaoweixiangtudexinmin,suoyiyiminyebushiwailai/eshen-ctrl>,shishihang,yiminyedexingxiangdaibiaotaiwanjingshenyijikejiargnzaitaiwanxlishiahangliuxue'liuhandeshiji<ctorl>,daibiaokjijizhongy0iqanqiudejingshen,er<ctrl[baozhongyimwinyan]dacoaibeihoulduyougushi'duodaibiayoizhonbjingshen,xiwangzheyitaocaidan,zaishijiekejaibolanhuidatouzhenvzhanxiankejiarenijshizaidihua,yeshiqanqiuhua<ctl>,bulunzianaliludishenggendoucehngxiankejiajianrhendeshengmingli<crtl>.zhengfuyuanzh;ngxuzhichu,zhengfuyuniacnhegnli[kejiadianshitai],nianchengli[jangkgeuangbodia[tai<c-rl>1'n]anxiduing《kejiaijbenfa》mindingkeyuweiguojiayuyan,bingtuichu[langmantaisanxianjihu<actrl>]ji[kezhuangxingfujitua<trl>]dnegzhongyaocuoshi,zh3-ienulidoushiweilezaiguojiwutaishangzhangxiyntaiwankejiawenhuademeili.zhengfyuuanzhangbiaoshi,yuerijaiangshengdajubande<ctlr>n[6hijiekejiabolanhui]<trl>,congtashizhan-grenneikaishichoubei,zaicaizongto2ngdezhichixia,naruiqanzhanjihuadeyusuan,zhongyangbzuhuyiyuan<ctrlg,difangbianlieyusuanyiyuanb,chou xinghengyuanfuyuanzhiangzhengwencanjinrishouyaocanjiayouzhonghuaminguoquang7oshangquanzonghmuizaizhanghuaxianjubande<c0rl>[quanguoshangquanjianianhuahui]huodongzhicishibiaoshi<xtrl>,shnguqanjujilerenqung[nshanjgi,caizongtongzhozhengnianlaitebiec.ichishngquan,zhengfuyongxinfhudaoshngquanhenglizizhihui,pzhaochugeizdudtdeec<trl>,bulusnhidaichengxiaozhendeshangquandounenggeutese'yingzaofenwei,zhanxianshangquanenghua,jijiqiangzhaningjifusudeshangji.zhengfuyuanzhanzhichu,hzengfufeichangzhongshishangquanfazhanctrl>,shangquanyuminzhongdeshenghuoxixixiangguan<ctr>,richangsuoxudoutuohibuliao,yinci<ctl>,zhengfuxiezhushangquatneidezhongxiaoxingdianjiafazhan<ct;l>,jijihuoluoneixuchanye.ciwai,weiyinyingqua-nqijing8jib,ianjuctrl>'idaozhengchanyetizhijijianqingrenminfudan<ctr>l,zhengfuyuyihoutebieyusuantourujinyiyuantuidonggexiangcuoshi<ct9>,/izhongjingjibuzhongxiaoqiyechutichuyshangquanyingzaoyusuan,baokuobuzhushangqunahuanjingmeihuahbanlixingx6iaotuiguangjijiaoliuxuexiwai'fudaohnaguqanidanjiayunyongshuweiggongju3xingxiaosahngquantese,chxuzhcihishangquanfazhan<ctr'l>,yiqianghuataiwandejin9gjirenxing,huolozaidifazhan.zhengfuyuanzhangbiaosh9<itl>,ji(nniantaiwanminjianxiaofeifu.sbuiaxianliangyan,yijujingjibutongji<ctrl,>lingshoujican;yinyeshangbanniandeyingyeeshuangshuangchuangxialinihantongq3ixingao;lingwaiguojingdamenjiefenghou5,gdeguoguaguangkelxuzaofmangtaiwanc<trl>,jiezhiyuer'guojilqkeyitupowanrenci,jinnianguojilvkelaitaiwanrencidemubiaoyouw0ngtiqiandabiao,yugumingnian[jinghuifuyiqingqianhizhunzhengfuyuanzhanglingbiaoshi<ctyrl>,weleqiangzhanxiaofifusudeshangji<trl>,shangquanxuzuohaozhunlbei,zhengfuhuiheshangquaynitongnulisctrl>,jiangouyouzhidexiaofeihuanjingyufuwutiyan6,tuiguangjuzaiyitesemeishiyurnewenfengqing,rangyouketouguoyouguangshangquan,shendutiyantaiwandutedechengxiangmeilpi.zhengfuy6avnzhangxuzhihcu,jinnianzhengfycuyihouqinaghuajingjiyushehuirenxingtebieyusuan,weituidongchanye;vizhoxgiaqoiyeshengjizhuanxingbianleyi,qizhongdaikuanbuhumoshuibianleyi,dabuyenshizhichizhongx hounandeyesujidu,yincizhaogutamsenjiudengtong]zhaoguyesujidu,qipanshehuidazhongjienengfahuiciyijingshen,jiangshenxinzhangaizheshiweizijidehaoyouyuqinengeiyuzhaogu,xiangxinjaiangnengjiangougengjiawansahndeshehuianquanwang.chenyuazhangbiaoshi,caiyingwenzongtongshpaneg()yeujiejian[quanguohidajiechuaixinmamacih8ijiang<yctrl>]dejiangrenshi,xianchangyelingtingtamenfenxiangzhagouhanbingjishenxinzhnagaijfdarendegushi<cthl>,binggantongshenshousuoyouhuojiangbixinmazmadexinlao,yinci;zhishixingzhngyuanjiwiefbuuyingzaishejifuheshenxinzhangai]hexuyao'jianqingzhoaguzhefudandtejizhi.5erlinwanyizhengweijixueruiyuanbuzhangzaiyanshangguochengzhong,junchagnyidaoruminjiandanweijituanticanyudejongyaoxing,jinqijiagnhuitichuwanzhengjihuaneironm,ctrl>,yitigonggengzhouyandezhaogu.yanzhanqiangdiao,zhengfuhuichpyixuguanchecaiyingwenzontgngdehcengnuo,iwangdajiayitongnuli,geiyusuoyouxuyaobangzhudeminzhongwuweibuzhidezhogu,rangshehuiganquanwanggengmianmiwanshan<ctrl,yerangtaiwanshehu4gengwennuanjianrenyuxingfumeiman.ghenyuajzhangdaochangho<uctrl>,shouxianyuquanchanggubiicnyuzuoweishangheying<ctrl;,suihouguanshangkaicnangyin3xpianjijiyoutuantiyujiyoududaofuwushijijishiyindpian<trl>zhicijieshuhuo<ctr>,lchenyuanzhangzhlyibanfa[jiyoutuantijiang]yu[jjyioududaojiagn<ctjrl>]yu7ejiangzeh<tcrl>,bingyulinwanyizhengwei'linzilnfayanren'xueruiuanbuzhangjisuoyoudejianzheh2eyingliunian.

chuxi[taijidianquanqiuyanfazhnogxinqiyo5gvdianlic<trl>.hibiaosh<ictrl,jinriluochengqiyongdequanqiuyanfazhongxin,yunyoegyafachuangxindaidongxianjinzhichengdetupo<dtrl>,zuyiim4ishijiewenmigndebiershiyanth(i)<ctrlq>.weiweichitaiwaznaiquanqiubandaotilnigyuzhongzuiguanjiadediweiq,zhengfuchuchixutigaokuabuhuidexingzhengxiaonengwai<cgl>,yetouguoznidujiangl'yanfatouzidijian'rencaipeiyu'shuidiawendinggongyigden,gfangmian,tigonchanyejiezuidadeztchi,qiinengkuoataiwanbndaotigongyingliandeshengtixi.yuanzhangqiangdiao,zhengfyjdinghui9chixuz5ohuguophenshadekaosha,bingdazaohuguoqunshn,qipangongsihezuowujigan<crl>,rangtiawajaiquanqoiujingzhengzhongbaochilingxian.chenyuanzhangzhich<uctrl>,jonritaijidiannaimiquanqiu'yanfazhongxinluochng,weitaiwa1jiquanshjjiebandaotichanyedziaoxineddligchengb/ic<trl>,zyuipimeishijiewenmigdegbeiershiyanshi.yoanzhangshuo<3trl>,tacengcan.anbeierhsiyanshi<ctlr>,liaojiedaobandaotichganyecongzhenkongguanfazhanzhidianjingtideguocheng,4q[ueshiweiqaunrenleifuzhidailaihendadeyingxiang.tarenweikexueyingyizengjinrenleifzuhiweidiyiyaowu,yeqimintaijidianqunqiuyanfazhongxinnenggoudailaigengduomeihaojimeilideweilai.ch8nyuanzhangbiaoshi,taiwanchanyejingzhenglideyoushi,rangquanshijiedouzhuyidaotaiwa/buzhishiyizuominzhudernxingzhidao<ctvrl>xgengshianrongdekejizhidao,yobuqibandaotishiquaqniugaoduhezodechanye,congmeiguwosheji'ouzhoushebei'ribencailiaodaotiawanzhizoa-taiawndeyanfayiqunaqiuweishichang,xingchengzuiyouxiaolvdeshengchanfangshi,shenzhikesh9oshidangqanrenleijinbushen-huodejichu.chenfyuanzhngjinyibuzhichu,suizhuguojiiqngshdebianhua,diyuanzhengzhirangquaniuhuadefengon2okmhikaishibutong<c/rl>,taijidianchuangbanrenzhngzhongmouxianshengyeshifenguanzhuciyiyiti,bingyouxiangdangdudaodejianjie.yuanzhangqfwangdiao,zabiiandongdesidaizhong<ctl>,bubiandejiushichuangxin,chuangxinyjiiushijingzhenglidejichu,zhezfengshijinritaijidianquan3qiuyanfazhongxinwangongqiyongzuizhongyaodezhanlveyiyi,yunyongyanfachuangxindaidojgianjinzhichengdetupo,qierangduoshuchannengxuliutaiwan5ctrl>,we weishijun<ptrl>'jiaorenyuantuifunianjinzhiduyongxufazhan,guofangbujijiaoubuyiluhaikongjunjnguanshgiuanfuyitiaoliditiaojigongliuxexioajiazhiyuantuixiuziqivnfuxutiaoliditiaoguiding,yiwanchengjun'jiaorenyu7nnianjinzhidujiankongjizhijidiicidigqiiantao.xi/ngzhengyuanbiaoshi<crl>,yiianshishizhijungnogjiaotuifufalvguiding,xignziengyuanuykaoshiyuanyinghuitonjianlijun'ogng'jiaonianjinzhidujiankongjiazhi;weiyizhihculi,quanxubuyujin()nianyueriyaoaiguofangbu<ctr>l';iaoyubudyengjiguanzhaokagji5anli[jungongjiaorenyuannianjinzhidujiankongjizhi<cqrl>]yanshangh5uiyi,taolkunnianjinzhidujiankongjizhijidinogqijitantaofangshi,bingwanchengjungoengjiaotifhfalvsuodnigdiyicidingqijia;ntao5.yigaicihuiyijueiy,nianjiniankongjizhibaohan[tuifujijincaiwudingqijingsuanjieguo]'[nianjinyongxuzhishujiyongxuzhbiiaodenghao<ctrl]>]'<cbr>l[tmifujijinshou'hziqing;ingjiyingyunjixiaoe]<catrl>'[tuixiu(zhi'wu)renyaundiaojiangsuobdejieshengtuifujnigfeiy0izhutuifuijjniqingxing]'[peihenianchurengongwu(jiaoyu)renyuangeren.huanhuzhituifuzhidushishi<ctrl;>,zhengfubianlieyusuanbobuqngxingy<ctrl]>yiji<ctlr>[jungongjiaorenyuandingqituifugeiyugif0jinediaozhengqingxing]dengxiagjiancezhibiao,bingwanhcengsh6oucijiantao,kaoliangxianxin8gjiaoyurenyuantuifujijincaiwuyuyigeshidainianneihzhicaiwufengxianrengxushenshebngunzhupingug<ctr>l,youjunzhirenyuantuufujjinzhichujinerengzhun4kianpanshengl,weishituifujijinyongxu'caiw=u2ianquan,yuanjianyixianxingnianjignaigecuoshijixueichi,zhihoumeiniandingqijiantao.guofangbujijiaoyubuyihuiyijueyi,fenbtiejianjgu<nctrl>'jiaorenyuannianjinzhidujiankongjizhijishoucdiingqijiantaojbieguochenbaoxingzhengyuna,jingxingzhengyuanansongkaoshiyuanhou,bignjingkaosqiyuantongyihuitongjianlinainji8nzhidujankongjizhi.xingzhendgyunbingbiashi<ctgrl>,zhengfutuidongnianjingaige<ctgl>,caixunuxjianjin2fangshijinxing,muqianxiangguanga5iegcuoshirengyingchixujiknxig,fangkequebaogaigemubiaodeyuluoshi.youxingzhengunayukaoshiyuaiuhitongijanlijun'jiaorenyuannianjinzhidujiankonjizhihou,/guofawngbujijiaoyubujiangjuyibanli xgngzhengxuanfuy[anzhangzhengwencanjin()richuuxi[yazh,oushengjidazank]imushix<tcrl>]shibiaoshi,cicidazahngongxiyinchaoguojiacanzhanshang'duogetanwei3<c'rl>,9hitaiwanlianjieguojideqiandashengjizhanan.fuyuanzhangiqangdiao,zhengfuxiangdanzhongshiguoneishengjiyiliaochanyeafzhan<,trl>,chutuidonggaojie[weituokaifajizhiaofuwu<ctrl]>()dexinyngyunmoshi,ku7dajianlishengjidaxigongye,shenhuawoguoshengjyii/yaonengliangjikuodachanyeguimwaiyejiangoujuguojijingzhenglidexianjinyiyaofaguijilicnhuanwshiyanyanjiuhuanjing,bingcuchengzhanlvexinban-uchuangxinban,dazaoyoushantouzishengjichanyedeshichanghuanjing,panjinyibudadongtaiwanshengjiyivliaochengewixinxmngzhaoyuanchanye<cttrl>.zhengfuyuanzhangbiaoshi,yazhoushengjidahui()yuniansh/oucizaitaibeijuban,ch2nggongdiandingtaiwanzaiyazhoushengwusiyaochanyezhongxindediwe[,erjinrikaimudeyazhoushengjidazhangeghuibie=yiqingyinmai,xyinchaoguojiacanzhanshang'duogetanwweiy,shi5taiwanlianjeguojideqiandashegizhanlan,chongfenzhanxiantaiwanshengjichanyedenengliang.ciwai<ctl>cicyiazhoushengjidahuibujinljubangeshilantanjbyantaohui<ctrll,gengyouyidunyishangjimeihehui,8uchengyedhejinxiangohujiaoliudjiaua,zhipanusoyouchongmanmengxangdeshengjigonhsijienengzaiciyuianbole,j8inerjiangshengjichanyeyanfazhizaodechengguozhuanhuaneishichangshangji<cctrl>,rangtaiwanshengjichanyehuodegcengdadefazhan.zhenguyuanzhangzhich<ucrl>,zhengfuxiangdangzhongshiguoneishengjyiliaochanyefazhan,niancaiyigenzongtongshagnrenhou,jiiagn[shengyishanyech6angxintuidongfangan<ctfl>]lie-ei7[chanyechua4ngxinjihua]zhongdianxiangmuzhiyi;nimanshi,gengjiang[taiwanjingzhunjiankanz4ghanlvechanye[fazhanfangan]lireuc<trl>[liudahexinzhanlvechanye]zhizhohng<cktrl>,bingyitouruxiangdnagduoziyuanjizhunbeigonguo<wtrl>.zhengfuyuanzhangqinagdiao,taibwanhiujuxuduoyosxiuyiliaoshengjirencaic<trl>,yiliaopinzhiaiyazhoumingliqeianma<octrl>,bingjubeizitongxun()'dashu7ju<crl>'jingzhunyiliqo'zaihsengyiliao'zhihuiyiliaodenggexiangyoushi.zhengfuyetouguoukabuhuililiang,jiangoushihesh.engjichayefzhandehsengtaitixi,baokuo guanxidusuruitaifenghzengbeii.ngxingd,shiadozhongyangzaihaiyingbianzhongxin,bingyuhualian'taidong'gaoxiong'tainan'penghu'pngdongedegnxianshizhe5gfusohuzhangshixunlianxjan,liaojiedifangyingchuzuowei.yuanzhangbiaoshi,benctaifengyujiyueriqzhijuriingxiagntaiwan,yuguquan8taidoujiangdailaqiiangfenghaoyu,qingxiangguanbuhuiyuxianzhenduizhongyaojiaotongsheshiyugonkgluxingche'gongdi<ctrlb'bianpodengjiaqianganquanweihu,bingdudaodifangzhengfu<ctr>l,wubiquebaofanghongpaishuixitongsheshjiidixiadaochoupaishuixitongdenggongnengzhengchangshxunchang,yijiluoshiqidongminzhonggexianglizaibizaizuowei.zhongyangyidinghuiquanlizihyuandifang,gongtonghezuojiangzaihaijiandaozuixiao<cirl>,queaoguorenshengmigj5icaichananquan<yctrl>.chenyuanzha5gbiaoshi<ctrlt,yijuzhongyangqixiangjgyguu4ctrl>,muqiandusuruitaifengyingxiangtaiwandeshijianyuceyuyuerizhiyueri,qietaifengjiejintaiwanbendaoshi,kenenghuihd-adaozhongdutaifengshangxian,jiegouzashibngxiedaifengpeishuiqi,yuguquantaidoujiangdailaiqiangfenghaoyuc<trl>,youqiyingxingdongbujixinanbudiqu,yincitayaotixingzhongyangyuifagnfangzaidn0weiluoshkiejijiance<ctr4>,biwngminzaoqidngyujingzuowei,wbijianxshougangweqiquanliyifue.chenyuanzhangzhichu,yo1uyubencitaifengy1ngxiangqijianshifengshujia,yuguqiangfenghaouduiguoneiluhaikongjiaotolngyunshuji8angdailaichongji,qingjiaotongbuyuxiangvihuajiaotngpeitaofangan<ctrtl>,bingzhenduigatoie<ctl>'taitiejijideyundenhgguidaoshlshiyugongluxingche<ctzrl>'gongdi'bianpodengwubijiaqianganquanweihu.lingzhenduihechuanjingjiejqui5anaiidwayiyanshuishouzaiqu,yuanzhangyezechdengjingjibududaodifangzhengfu,wubqiueb'ofanghongpaishuixitongsheshijidixiadaogchoupaishuixitogdenggongnengzhengchangshunchang,bingshixianbushujiceshichoushuiji'choushuizhanjifangxunbeiliaodeng<ctl>,qieyishijijiangyuqingixng,da1nxingjidongdiaoduhcoushuijiju<ctcrl>,shishitig=ngdifangzhengfusuoxu.chenyanzhangzhichu<ctl>jjinritianshilunchenchdandaozhinanbuhaiyuchuxianxuduobiaoliuhuoguibufe]n,tayaoganxiejiaotongbujijidalaoichu<ctjl>,mu.qianhaiminashangyirwupiaoluikonhg jeijian[shijietaiwanshanguhilianhezonghuidijiehuiguxofangwenjitouziakochatuan]shibiaoshi,gaizownghuizhangqi-ourushi'jianyuzijin,zbhilitishengtaishangquanyifuzh'pe-ih'guojiajingmaofazhag'xiezhuuidonggongzhon9waijiaodenggong=uo,2hixiezhuwoguozhen7gquyotaililiang,yugiuojijieguizuizho1gyaoderuaznshili.yuanzhangyeqipannengchxujifzhonggaizonghuieypingxianghi,xiezhutuiongtaiwajiaru[kuataiipngyanghuoabnquanmianjinbuxieding]()hbingjiehetaishangliliang;ctr;l>,rangguanjianchanyezouchutaiwan'lianjieshijie,chengweish-jiegeguzouizhidevinlaidehezuohuoban.henyuanzhangzhicisishouxiandaibiaozhengfujiechenghuanyign[shijietaiwashan8ghuilinahezonghui]huiguofangwenjiaoliu/,weizhengfuzhongyaozhegcezouchugong'xian.gaizonghuichhngliqirjinyinian,ziaquanqiuliudazhouuojiadiqu<2trl>,chengligediqushanghui,suoshgeshanghuibujinyudangdizhengfugu/anximianm<ictrl>,gengzhangqitourushijianouzijinc<rl>,rexingodgyishanxingbingzhilitishnegtaishangquanyifuzhi'peiheguoj9iajingmaofazhan'xiezhutuidonggongzhongwaijiaodenggexianggungzuo,beishougejiexinlaiyizhong,shixiezhutaiwanzhengquyoutaililiang,yaugoujjieguizuizhongyaoderuanshil.chenyuynzhangzhichu,jin()nianchudtuerqifahsengzhenzaishi,zaigaizonghuihaozhaoxia,huijuquanqiutaishangliliang<ctrlv>,mujismankuanchaoguoxintabiiqianwyanyuan<ctl>,banghtzaimingongdunanguan,chongienfhaui[]dejingshen;ciwai,shangzhougaizonghuiyeqinfuneizhengbuxiao4fangshujuanzengjyuz-aishebei,caongshiw0oguotersouduijiuzaixz.iaoneng<trl>,taya;odaibiaozhengfuxaingsuoyoutaishongpengyoubiaodachyon1ggaojingyijichengzhixi]yi<ctr>l.yuanzhangbxiaoshi,taiwansoujiuduishidiyigedidatuerqiadeyaman()zhongzaiqudeguojisojiudui,tayusoujiu8uichufaqian<crl>n,yeqinziqianwangtaoyuanjichangshouqisonjgi,erdanggaisoujiuduijiehuren-ushi<ct[r=l>,yejiangmufensoujiukhebeiliuzaidangdi<ctr>l,chongsidangdisoujiuziyuan.weizengjinjingjichengzhangdongneng'xeizhutaishangbujuquanqiu,chenyuanzhanbiaoshi,zhengfujijidazaoziyou'kaiafnljigngpingdeingmaohuanjing<ctlr>,zaicujinji]gjifazhanfangmian,[chanyechuagxinjihua<c'rl>]ji<crt
