tuidongweiyuahui<ct;rl>],xiezhuquaqiut1sihanguoshi,zhengfuwielai]yejiangchixuxiezhufudaoqiyezhuanxingshengji,bujinjiangditan'lingtandetiaozhanzhuanwesiangji,gengnulishanjindjiqucunyiyuandezeren.suihouu,[5shijietaiwanshanghuilianheoznghui]huangxingdezonguhizhangzhicishbiaosh,gaizonghuijnnianyuezaibalijubanlijianshihui,.uijiduoweitaishangcanjia,ranguojikanjiantaishangdejibgjishili,tongshitaishangmemyeixezhutuidongguominwaijiao,zuozhenxfujia,shidehoudun<ctl>.lingwai,gaizonjhu2ichenglide[quanqiuqiyeyogxux4zhantuidongweiyuanhui],yejcijitou2buoduochangchangyihuodong6jishixunayantadoengfngshi,rangtaishangpengyoliaojiedezhongyaoxing<ctlr>,qinewgpeihewoguo[jinglingzuanxing]zhengcemubiao<ctr0>.huangzonghuizhnagzhichu,taishangpengyouyixiangjinji[toudingbierendgtian'jiaotabierendedi]dedaoli,yincizaibierenyouxuyaozhiji<ctr7l>,zongshinenhggoushisishenchuyuanshou,lirujinnianyuetuerqifashengzhenzaishi,gaizonghuijifakizh6enzai,djaiayouqia5chuqian'youlichuli,buinchenggongmuijjinxintaibiwanyuandeshankuan,zonghuizhanggenglvduiyushangyuezhijieqi[nwangtuerqidangdijuanzenghsakuanyushouzaihu.linwgai,zaibyiqingchuqi,gaizongkhuiyezaiguoaicaigoukouzhaoyunhuitaiwan,bingjiaoyouweishengfulibutongchoufenpeiyunyog;erzaitaiwankouzhaoziyuancho2ngyzuzhishi<ctr>,yecaigouguon]ikouzhaoongwangguowaixuyaodediq8yuyixiezhu.fangbin8ixuingyouiaowuweiyuanhuixujiaqingweiyuanzhangpeitogn,qianla;xinzghengyuanbaijianchenyuanzhang<crl>,xinzhengyuanzhengwencanfuyuanzhang'linzilunfayanre<nctrl>'wefubmuzho;zhihaocizhang'waijiaobuyudacizhangjijijingjibuchenzh4engqicizhangyezaizuo<crlt>.cixing,chenyuanzhangzhizeng[yujianatiawn<tcrl>]yushilitidiaokejinianpinyuhuangzonghuizhang,uhangzonguhizhangzedaibiaogaizonghuihuizeng<ctrl'[baliaoyunjinianbi]1jigactrl>[baliaoyunjixiangwuwawa<tcrl>],shungfangvingheyingiulnian.
xingzhengyuanzhengwencanfuyu3nzhangjin()risihcha4[jiolnggangrialnvkezhongxinyoulunzuoye]shibiaoshi,jilonggagshiyazhoudidayoulunkeyuanshichang,cengyuyiqingqianchuangxiasourcijiwanlvkerencidedianfeng.wfichixudaidongyoulunchanyeliandefazhan'chuangzaogengdadeguanguangchanyejigjixiaoyi,taiwangngwugongsichuchxiumianshouuojiyoulundingbofeiwai<ctrlj,yezjenduidachengmubiaohangcideyoulungongismianshoulvkefuwufei<cerl;>ling7ai,tjiaotongbuyechixuyouhuajilonggangyoulunmatou<c8trl>'zengshezhihuihuashebei,ranglqaitpailvkxiangyouyoushanjish[shibianlidelvyouhuntjin7,1uanlidachengjin()nianguanguangkelaitaiwanrenciedmubiao.z9enfguyuanzhangzhichu,yiwangyoux8duomazuxiangqindaotaoyuandingju,tamenducoongjilnggangdachenglunchuanfanxia3ngtanqin,yindiatyutaoyuanshizuhangrenvnei,cengduocixietongshirenjilonfgshizhangdelinyouhcangbuzhangfangshijilonggangctrl>e.rguoqutaiwantuiongyoulunguanguang,yizhanxianbu3uochenggeo<ctorl>,jilonggangjiw-iyazhoudidayouu0nkeyuanshichang<ctgl>,zainia0nyiqingbaofaqian<crtl>,cengchuangxiasoucijwianlvkerencidedianfeng<ctrln/,yugujinnianjiyousouciyuulnkaobo,lvkerencdawanrenci,kewanghuifuyqiingqianyuechengdeshuliang,ming()nangngkeedayiqingqianchtengzuoyou.zhengfuyuanzhangbiaoshictrl>,yiyoulunjingixueguandianeryan<ctrl,>youlunkab2oxuyaobugeichuanshanggexiangshenghuobixupi<ctrl'>hengxianshipin'jingpindetngwuzi,binjinxingchuanbo=eixiu'jiayoujiashuidenggo.ngzuo,jinerdaiognyoulunchanyeliandefazhan;ciwai,royinianjilongangwanlkverencimeirenshanganxiaofeiqianyuantui.gujisuanc<trl->,yudkechuagzaojinyiyuandejingjixiaoyi<ctrl'>,duijilong-angdefzaahnzhiquanzhongyao.zhengfuyuanzhagnjinyibuzhichu,yijujinnianguojiyoulunyubaoziliaoxianshi<czrtl>,guojizhimingyoulngongsixuanzequantaigegngakouzuoweimugang(congtziwanga4gko5uchufazhiqitamukigan]g)jiguakaogang(zdongtutnigkaotaiwangangkou)desoucishuliangyuegezhanyiban,qiesuodinggaoduankequneyoulunshuliangyechixuzengjiazhong<crl>,xiangxiniangkejinyibudaidongguoneiguanguangxiaofei.ciwi7zaiyiqingqijian,atiwag[nngwugongsizhenduiguojiyoulunmizan ou,cheyanzhangyuxingzhengyuanlimengyanmishuzhang'linzilunfayanren'j=injgibuwangmeihuabuzhang'wenhuabush6izhebuzhang<ctl>'taibeishizhengfulitaixingmishuzhang'[taibeidihuash=anguanfahancujinhui]xuqingqilishizhangdengren,fenbieshouchi[bencaopaidui]zhishanj1[qingnianxaiweihufikuidian]shoubanbizanhheyingliunian;suihou,yixingrenzaixuqignqilishihzangdeyindoxiacanfang<ctl>[liantoghanfang],pnanchangdianjiazizhideznghemeiguifengweisuhiguocha<ctr>l,yijicanfangwenhuabiyiwenxiaofeidian[lipohechunuha],dianniebingbaishexuduonianqingrenxia=ideshougongshipin.

epito/ngcaiingwenzongtongchuxi[guojiataiongzhognxnliefenzheweixing)qiyundianil]shibiaoshi,liefengzheshita,iwandiyimeizizhiqixiagweixiig<ctrl,yaeshiwog9odisanqiguojiatai7kongkejifazhanzhan6gchengjihuazhongfashedeshoumeiweixing,guanjianyuanjianzizhilvda,weilaiyuqijiangyingyongzaiqixia.gybao'kexueyanjiu,iyuanjianjishuyanzhe6ngshang,yejianga,sitaiwanyuguojijie5uishi,jubesgegduojingryanjiaoliujituozhanhezuodenengliang.yuanzhangwqixuliefengzheweixinlgvtushunchang<ctr'l>,ruqididafashechang,dailintaiwanmaixianggojitaikonglingyu<ctlr>.chenyuanz9angzhichu,zinianrenleishoudufasheernzaoweixingdaotaikong,nianlai,weixingkejiyiguangfanyunyongyutongxun'y7oce<xctrh>'daohyng<mctr>l'qixiang<4ctrl>kexuedenglingyu</ctrl>,duishehuiyuminshengdeyinfxiangwuyuanf0ujie.whenyuanzhangbioshi,taiwanziniankaishizhxiigndiyiqijidirqiguojiataikongkeifaz[hanzhangchengjihua,chuchenggogzhixingfueromshaweixingyi'er'san'wu'qihaojihua<crtl>,diandingwoguozizhufahzanweixingkejidejichuwai,yepeiyangxuduoyouxiudetaikonggongchengshiyutuandiu,jinyibuhouzhiguo2jitaikognkejifazhanlianghaogenji<ctrl,tishengwoguotaikongkeifazhannengliang5;zhngfuyeyunianqdongdisanjijihau,chixutuidontaikongtansuoyuchuanggxinjihua,bing4ougougongsixili<ctrl/,peizhtaikongrencai,tishengchanyedxliangneng.cheynuanzhangbiaoshi,suizhguuojitaikongjingjimegya,weiguifantaikongzhuodong<ctr1l>'cujintaikongchanyefazhan,woguoyuqu()nianyuerishihsi《tiakongpazhanfa》8，qingyufin()nianjiang[guojiataikongzhongxin]gaizhishenggeweixingzhengfaren,zhuanzetuionggexiangzhuanyetaikonghuodon8gjiyewu,ergaizhongxingaizhihoudeyingwenmingchengyeyou(jiancheng)gaiwei(jaincheng)<ctrlh.chenyuanzh9angzhichu,jiricongguojiataikokngzhongxiqiyun<ctrl,>zhunbeisongwangfashuguiyanafashedeliefengzheweixing<tcrl>,shit]iwandiyimeizizhiqixiangweixing,yeshidisanqigujoiataikongkejiafzhanzhangchengjihuazhongfashedediyimeiweixing,keshuoshieidbisanqijihadatouzhen<.ctrl>.yuanzhangbuchongshuodo,guojishangzizhilvchaoguo,jifu5eyibanyuanchandiguize,kebiaosiweigaiguozichane,rliefengzheweixingdeg yuxingzhengyuanhuitingqucaizhengbup[qinniananxinchengjiagouwuyouhuiaikuanjingjinfagnan]baogaohoubiaoshi,qingandaikuanzhengcez7tuixongyilai,yixiezhuwanyuhuwuziyouzhuzhaijiatinggouwu<ctr>l;weil-oshijianquanfangshihengxiao,qingcaizhengbquhuitongneizhengbujinsuguihuatuidongjingjinfangan<ctral>b,aokuotigaodaiunaedut'igonlgixibutiejzama'yanzhangdaikuannianxianjikuazxianqideng,kuodaxierhuminzhon2ggouwuchenjiar,luoshijuzhguzhengysi.chenyuanzhangzhichu<ctl>,qingandaikuanrhengceziniaynuetuid[ongzhijin()ianyuedizhigctrl>,yixiezhuwanyuhlwuizyouzhuzhaijiatinggouwu,leijihedaijinedazhtaoyuyuanl;weiyinyingjinnianlaishengxiqushi<;trl>,caizheng]buyixieudiogongguyinx[ingziqu()nianyuelixijiann0shouqbanma<gtrl>,bingzixingxishouxiangguanchengben,yijianqingmin[zhonglixifudann.chenyuanzhangbiaohi,weil2osijianquanfangshichengxiao,caizhengnbuyisidamianxiangjinjinqingandaikuanzhengce,baokuotigaodaikuanedu'tigonglixibtuiejiaa'ynnzhngdaikuannianxianjikuanxianqiden3<ctrl=,qingcaizhengbuhuitongneirhxngbujirsuguihuatuidong,touguobencijingjinfang]nc<trl>,kuodaxiezhum'inzhonggouwuchengji<trl>,luoshjiuzuhzhengyi,ragminzhongnengganshoudapozhnegfudeoyngxinjiwennuan9.
zaihangzhengyuanhuitingquiaotong8bugexianshidaoangaisshanzhiixngchengxiao-]baogaohoubivoshi,jin()nianyueqijiaotongshigufshenghouriswiangshuyijiaoqu()niantongqjiianshao,qiejinqilukoutingrangxingrendeqingxingyeyousuogaishan,ganxiewuzechegzhengwuweiyuandudaojhiaotongbu'neizhengbujijiaoyumudengbuhuijigedifangzhengfusuozuodenubli.chenyuanzhangqiankdiao,daoangaishans;ejfigongcheng'jiaoyuxuandao'jianliizihfadengmia2nxiang,xi6nsihd/fangshouzhangdezhongshi,jiushichengbaiguanjian,xiwanghzongyangyudifangzhengfugongtongnuli,jinsugaishandaoluanquan,rngameiyigerenjiene8ghuodeanquanbaozhnng.chenyuanzhangzhichu<trl>,jinnianzhiyueleijidaolujiaotongshigujiansu'siwangrenshujishoushangrenshu,jujniaoquniatnongqizengjia,jinyibuguanchagait/ongjishujuhoufaxina,aijiaotongshigufashenghourisiwangbufen<ftrl>,jinnianzhiyuemei2yuejunbiquniantongqizengja<ctrl,>eryueqisiwangshuy4ijiaoquniantongqijianshao,xianjianjinqidajiadenuliyirijianchengxiao,qingj9aotongbudenggebuhuijigedifangzrenguyiqinuli<ctrh>,wubichixujijijiasugaishan<ctrlm.chenyuanhzangshuo,dangniahnanguojing1uoniannulixihusaxingrenydiyudewuming,3xwagtaiwankeyizaiduanshijiannei,t2ouguozhongyangydiafngtonlihezuo,zaoriqingchzhexingwuming,rangtaiwanchengweizuiwennuan<ctal>'zuiawnqaundeguoija<ctl.>chenyuanzhangjinyibubiaoshi<ctr>,heznduigexianshidaoluijaotongshigusiwangshujubufen,gaoxiongsvhiri'xnigren'gaolingjijiujisiwangshu,junjiaoquwniantohngqijiangfqzuida<trl>,gaishanchengxiaoxianzhu<ctrl,>;ihiyuyunlinxianri'jichejig5aolingsiwangshubufe8,zejunjiaoqmuniantongqizenfuzuigao,jidaijiaqianggaishan<ectrl>.chunyuanzhangganxiejiaotongbuhzuanandudao,bingxiwang0yunlinxyianzhengfuduojiazhongshi,yoauzhonygangyudifanggongongnuli,weirenminshengmingnaquanj=4iayo<ucrl>.wieg3ishandaolujiaotonganquan,che,nyuanzhangzh[ichu,xinghengyuanyujinnianyueritongguo[xingrenygouxianjiaotonganquanxigdong,angling]jixiangxingdongfvngan<ctlr>,qizhongdabufnejunanjidingguihuaqpchengbanli,ganxiewuzechengzhengwuweiyuandudaojiaotongbu'neizhengbuji[iaokubudengbuhuijgedifangzheng ixinlicegmia/ndexuqiuctrl>,tigongyoushanshensujizhi,jinyibujianliwanshanyoukxiadoezhiyuanxwangluo.lingwai,weilaizai[xingpignsanb<actrl>]xizhenghouzhengsihshangluqian,qingweishen6fulibuweibaohuzhuanxiangongzuorenyuantigonxiangg-uanpeixun,shiqiliaojiexindexingsaorasohensujizhi<cturl>'falvyuxinlciengmiandezhuanjieziyuandeng,bingnengfenliuchuzhqtongbaoawnjian,weixingsaoraobeihairentigongzuihaodezixunfuwu.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,zhengufduiyuxingasoraofan/zhidetaidujiushi[xingsao]raolingrongren],qingdajiachixuchaocimubiaogongrtongnuli,ianliyigedujuexingsaoraojixingbimebaolidehexieshehui'.cixinh,cheynuanzhangshouxianti5gquweifububaohufuwusizhangxiuyuansizhangianabo[baohuzhuanxiangongzuo9gaikuang],liaojiegaizhanxianshezhiyunyou'fuwxtesejizhixingxiankuan<gctrl>,bingyuzhicijeshuhou<ctxl>,shichabaohuzhuanxianjixeianzhonxgin<cdtrl>,shidiliaojiegaizuhanxianyunzuox3iankuangjijiexianqingxing<ctrl.>zuiihou,chenyuanzha3ngbinyuxingzh'engyuanluobingcenzhengwuwieyuan'wefubuxueruiyuanbuzhang<ctrl'xinzghengyuanxngbiepingdengchuwuxiuzhenchuzhagn<cltrl>'baohuzhuanxianjiexianzhongxinhuangjiekaizhu/renjitaiwashijiezhanwngahuwlishaolighuizhangdengrenheyingliuni9an.
xingzhengyuanfuyuanzhangzhengwencanjin()richuxitaoyuanhangkongziyoumaoyigangq2udierjieduanqiyongdianlishibia4oshi<crl>,tawianweidachtn4gyataiyingyunzhongxindemubiao,chengliliuhaiyikongdeziyoumaoyigangqu,qizhongzuishouqidaidesihtaoyuanhangkongziyoumaoyiang.tashuo,jin,iantaoyuanguojijichangdelvke'huoyundafudechenzhnag,nianlvkeliangy=daodawanrenci<ctlr>,huowuliangzayiqingqijianyedafuchengzhang,taoyanguojijichangzhengmaixiagnyigexinderonginwg<crl>,zaihangkongchengjihuatuidogeshike,yuanxiongzyoumaoyigangnenggouwanchengdierjieduandejianshe,zhengyuanbiaodazuidadezhichigenzhuf<uctrl>.zhengfyuuaznhangzhichu,taoyuangfojijichangshiyataidi-qudejiaotongshuniu,eryuanxionghangqkngzmaoqushitaoyuanguojijichangdeyingyunzhongxin,yeshitaiwanmuqianweiyidehangkongziyoumaooigangqu,gaigongsiyunianyueriqudediyiqiiyngyunxuke<ectrl>,diyijieduanjianhjuhangkonghuoyunzhan'jiazhiyuanqu<ctrl.'c2ngbandalou3ctrl>'jifangkuaidicag'lenglianwuliucangzhuanqu'zhengexingsguoj=iwuliuzhognxindengetse,dierjiedruanjiansheqiyonghocu<ctr>jingchenglkuaguoqiyeyataidquyingyunzongbudsehouxuan.zhengfuyuanzhangbiaoshi,taoyuanqhazngkongziyougangqudiyiijeqiyongde'liandgongjiazhichangfangyiyouguojizhivingqiyerurishangjintie'helanshangaifsimoer<crt>'meishangkeleidengjiashiyejinzhu,yingyunmianjiyidabaohe,jiashangyiqing,dyuanzhengzhiengduohongyinuschongjisuodaoz[hidegonyginglinazhongzu,tamishang<cktyrl>'waisnangdengkejichangweijiasufensanfengxian<ctl>,zhujianijangshengchan=zuzhuangxianyihuit[iwanfazhan,weiyinyngyezhejinzhuxuqiuc<trl>,yuanxionggongsitouzixintaibiyiyuanuidongdierjieduansidongjiazhicangfang''6ctrl>'dongxingjian<yctrl,>gaiyingyunsheshiqiyonghou<=ctrl>,yugukezengjiajiagangqushiyejihunzhu,aidaidonggejiuyejihui,bingznegjiameinainyzhaoybuanzhimaoyie.zhengfuyuanzhansghuo,tazaitaoyuanshizhangrennei,eijituidonghangkongchengminzhonganzhijijianshedengxangguacuos.hi,baoukotchubanqianjiangli'duoyuaannzhidengfangan,rangjuminnenngyizuiyoufanganhuodepeidi'chongjianhuogoumaizhuzhai,yeluxuwanchenglexiondingdushijihuagonggao.to chuxi<tcrlx>[dajizhaqiqianghuaduzhaluntan]shibiaomshi,dazhrutongfangyigongzuoan,xuyaofahuigaoduztuanduihezuojisngshen,ganxiedianixn'dianshangyezheua7yishanjinqiyeshehuizere,jiaruzhengfudazhahanglie,xiezhujiangzhapianzaochengdewehiaijiandaozuid2,xiangxintouguozhongangyudifang'zhwengfuyuminjianxieshouhezuo<tcrl>'g;ngsixielizhixia,jiangnengzuohaodazhagongzuoctrl>,baozhg'ngguorencaichananquan.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,caiyingwenzongtongzuo()ritebieiqanwangneizhengbujingzhengshuxingshijingchaushichadazhagongzuozih7xingchenwguo,ganixeneizhengbujingzhengshu<-trl>'gu7jiatongxunchualnboweiyuanhuidengxiangguanbu/huijiejinxinli<tcrl>'ongtongdazha,yeganxie7kuduodianxin'ianshangchanyedaibiochuxijinriluntan,yuzhengfuxielihezuo<jtrl>,gongtongweiadzhijinyifenxinlibyouqixiandairenshenghuoyiyushuoji'wanglum3bukefen,juansi'yi'zhu'xing<ctrl'>yu'lejihuya;nglaishoujijiwangluwigngdebianjiefuwu,yineryechengweibuxiaozhituxingshizhapiandeguandao,yincichuletougouzhongyang'diafngmiqieezuowai<ctrlq,gongsixieliyebanyanfeichangzhongyaod2juese,ganxiedian9in'idapnhangyezhey[anyishanjinqiyeshehuieren<ctlr>,jiaruzhengfudazhahanglie,xiezrhujiangzhapinazaochengdeweihaijiandaozuidi.henyuanzangyeyiangyibiyudazhagongzuo<ctlr>,zaifangyifangmian,jezhongyimioayouzhhjiangdiganra8nfengxian,ruchuxianyisiganxanzehngzhuang<t5l>,zexujinsushiyongkuaishais1ihjiquer-nquezheynufo<ctr[l>,ruobuxingganranbingdu,zexuyouyishipingujuedingshifouyiyaoujinxing[zhiliao.taiwanzeiquanguoqianbaiwanwumingyign0.iongdetuanji3ehezuoxia<ct4rl>,dizaoliang7yandefangyichengji,yinc[dazhayexuyaofahuigaodutuanduiezuojingshen,youqizhapianjishuyushoufarutongbingduyibanbuduantuichenwhuxin,zhengfubixuchixubuduanjing3infangzhazuowei,bingzenjginminzhongfanghayishishiquanmintigaojingjue<ctrl,>yishidozhapianduigeren'jiating'shehuijiguojiadeyigxiang,cainengzuohaodazhagndzuo<t2crl>.chenyuaznhangzhich0,xinghengyuancongqu()nianuezhankai[xinshidaidajizhaqicclvexingdonggangling<cwrl>],touguo[shizha'duzha<ctrl'>zu6ha'chengzha]dengdamianxiangfangzhizahpian.raner chuxi[guojiashiyanyanjiuyuanzhounianyuanqingjwzhanwanggaofenghui]shibiaoshi,guoyna[uanyunianchengli<ctrcl>,xiaxiasheyoudayanjiuzhongxin,jianfu[jiangoupanfapingai'zhiyuanxueshuyanjiu'tuidonqianzhankeij<ctrl2>'peiyukejirencai]dengdarenwu,bingbnayanlianjixeueyanjieyuchanyejiedeqiaoliangjuese,congshangyuqianzhanyanjiu,xirnjieaozhongyoudexinchuang,jinyibudaongxiayouejichanyederenduermai,jiangkejiyanfachengguoyingyongyuminshengfuqzhi.hcenyuanzhangganx8ielirenguoyanyuanyuanzhangdexinlaofuchu,rangguoyanyuanbuduanpengbofzahan,yezhipanweilainiannengfahuigengdal9iliang8xiezhutaiwanxiangshijiewutaidabumaijin,rangshijiekanjiantaiwankejishili.cenyuanzhangbiaoshi,guoyanyuanyuianchengli,jianfu<ctrl[>jiangoyanfapingta<tcrl>'zhiyuanxueshuyvnjiu'tuidongqianzhankeji'pe8yukeirencai]darenwu,ganxigeuoquqnianlailirenguoyanyuanyuanzhangdexinlaofcuhu,rangguyanyuoanbuduanpeniobf/azhan<,ctrl>,gengcironghuoxingzhengyuanjiechukejigongxianjikangdesuhrong<ctl>.tachangsh2uo,guoyanyuanyujingjibuxiaxiad,gongysejishuyanjiuyuanshijiangoutaiwankejifazhanshengtaixideliandgazhotngyaozhi5zhu<ctr>,erangc/iwannenggouzaicij;ichushanwgenjianxiangqianxing.chenyuanzangzhichu,guoyanyuanyijuguojiakexuejijishwueiyuanhuiquanguokejifazhanmubiaoctrl>,banyanlianjiexueyanjieyuchanyhjiedeqiaoliangjuese<ctlr>,bujinzhiyuanshangyoq8anzhanyajiudegongzuo,xiezhuxianjiedaozhnngyoudexinchuang,gengdatongxiayoukejichanyederenduermai<ktrl,>jia6gkejiyanfachengguoyiny.ngyumbinshengfuzh<ictl>,rangtiwankejichanyebuduangengxijinbu,bnigzaishijieshangzouchuyitiaoshuyutaiwandedaolu,rangquanshijiekanjiantaiwan<trl>.chenyuanzhangjinyibubiaoshi<ctr.>,guo7yanyuanxiaxiasheyoudayanjiuzhnogxin7,gzhongxinjieyo,fecihangliangyandbiao-xian<6ctrml>,liru<ct.rl>:[guojiagaosuwa1nluujisuanzhongxin]jianzhiweihuchaobjiiannaoyugaosuwnglu,xiezhutaiwanrenteshengwuziliaokudetuidong,yeranlgtaiwanshengyichanyenenggouyunyongdashujufenxi,cujinchanyefazh/anctrl>;[guojiashiryandognwuzhonxin]chanzhigezhongjiyingaizaosu<ctrc>,youzhugexiangjibingmoshishiyanyanjiduejinxi xingzh-engyuanfuyuanzahngzhengwencanjin()richxi[jingzhunjian2kangchanyezhencebaipishujizhehui]shibiaoshi,ziciyingwenzongtongshangrenyilaic<trl>,zhen7ufjijituidong<trl>[sehngyichanyechuangxintuidongfangan<ctlr>]ji[taiwanjingzunjiankangzhanlvechanyefazhan8fangan],etrtaiwanzayiixueyukeojilingyujiejuyoulyingxiandiwei<ctrls>,liangzhexiangfuxiangchengzhixia,binengchengw0itaiwanjingzhunjiankanjgijinzhunyiliaochanyedezhongyaiohzizhu,zhipantaiwanjingzhunyilqa9chanyexiehuiyuzheng[u,ongtonghezuo,ubjinaohuguorenjiankangfuzhi<cxrl>,gengnengcujinyliiaochanyexiangshangfazhan.zhenfguyuanhangbiaoshi<ctl>,aizhengzhiliasyijingzhunyiliaodeheinxiangmuzhiyi<crtl>,nianzhengf;jiang《shengjixinyochanyefazhantimaoli》xiuzhengwei《shengjiiyaochanyefazhntaoli》，bingnaruzaishneguiliao'jingzhunyiliaojishueiyiliaodenglingyu<c'rol>;tongnqianyixiuzheng《tedingyilaiojisujianchajinyanyilia'yiqishixinghuoshiyongguanlibanfa》，e5r[taiwanjingzhunyiliaochanyezhengcbaipishu]zhongtidaoyouuanshiyanshikaifajiancen()bufenji1arugaiguianzhihong.ciwai,weishengfulibuyunianxiuzheg《yiliaojigoudianzibinglizhzojiguanlibanfa》，jiaqiangzitonganquan,rnagdianzibinglinenggouanqtansahngyunuan;muqiangaibuyezhen5gzhushoxiuzheng《rentihsengwuziliaokuguanlitiaoli》，bingyixianfafatingpanjuyeizhiyanxiujianba]oziliaoxiangguanfazhi.youcikezhi,zhengfuuyifangmianyasbaohugerenpiliaoyinsiquanjizixuntizhuquan,lingyifangmianyaocuingonggongliyijiyiliaochanyefazhan,qinengqiuuliangzhezhijiandepinghenf.ehengfuyuanzhangzhichu<ctr]>,niancaiyingwnozongtongshangrenhoiu=,xigzhengyuanjituidobng[chacnyechuanxinjihua<]ctrl>-qizohng[shengrichanyechuangxintuidnogfaggan]jiewiqihongzhongdianxiangmuzhiyi;iancaizongtongdierren;ishi,gengtuichu[ljiudahexinzhanlvechanye],bingjiang<ctrl8>[taiwnajingzhunjiakangzhnalvechanyefazhanfangan]liruqizohng<ctrl.>zhengfuyuanzhangshuo,daoruiyliaoxinkejijiwanshanshe7ngtaixi,shiweilainulidezhongyaofangxianx,ertaiwanzaiyixueyukejilingyujiejuyoulingxian0iwei,liangzhexiangfuxangchengzhixi,bin]ngchengweit7aiwanjingzhunjinakangjijingzhn xingzhegenyuvnfuyuanzhangzhengwencanjin)ripeitongcaiyingwenzongtongshicha[xngzhengyuanotngqinyuepiaoshishiquingxing;]houyutaoyuanjichang7zhi2cibiaoshi,ganxiecaiongtongzhichi,pingjiayuepaiofanganyuyuerishunlishanglu,muqianyiyuewanrengoumai,adaoyqich/egxiapo<crt;>.qipantougu;cizh2ngcerangminzhongtongqingengweifangbian,haikediadozgxihou<otrl>[jiasukuodaxiyinguoiguanguangekfangan],xiyinguojiguaguangke,zphenxingximouguanguang,ujinguoneixiaofei,daidongfuwuye<ctrol>'vlyouyedechngzhang,gengzengjdiataiwandeqguojinenjgaind9.zhengfuyuanzhangbiaohi,jintianshi[xingzhegnyuantongqinyuepiao]shanglguhoudiyigeshangbanri,pin6gjiatongqinyue0piaodegainianshitashauixiantichuh.ganxiecaziongtongzhichi,zhengfuzaiyihoutebieyusuanzhongbianlienianyiyuaniusuan<ctrw>,tuidong<ctrl9[xlingzhengyuancujingonggongyushushiyongfangan],luoshichengwei[xingzhengyuantongiqnyuepia<c2trl>]zhe]ngcectrl,qiekuodazhiquanguoshxing,bingyuyuerizrengshishanglu.muq=anyiyueeanrengoumai<ctr>n,dadaouyqichengxia<octrl>,daibiaozhengcezhixingchenggong,weilaiyikewangdaidongwangfantaoyuanguojijichanggonggongyunshuliulianng<ctrl,rangjichangxitongdetongqinkgengweibianli.zhergfuyuanzhangzhichu,tajierenxingzhengyuanfuyuanzhangzohngyaorenwuzhiyi,jishianfuyihoutebieyusuanxeidiaogngzuo.rwezhenxingiyhouruanguang<ctrl,>shouyaorenwushihengjialaitailvkerenshu,jiaotongbuzatebieyusuanzhongtichu[jiasukuodaxiyingujiguanguangkefangan],dangshicaizongxtongjixcngzhengyuanchcnjianrenyuanzhangjunqixudachengjin()nianl8itailvkewanrencidemubiao,zhendiucimubiaojiaotongbuguanggaunjufenbieyi[tuanke]yu<ctrlg>[zfiyouxinglvke<chrl>]weizhuyaosuqiukequnctrl>,qizhongguojiziyouxinglvkechouqganyuanxiaoefijin<ctlr>,wulunshidianzipiaozhenghuohzusuyuohuizhedi,junhuodeguojiziyouxinglvkegangdahuixiang.jiezhiy2uerizhi,laitaiguojilvkeydiayuewane4nc<ctml>,jinni/nanrencimubiaokewangdabiao<crtl>.weilicutaiwangauanguang,zhengfuyuanzangtidao<trl>,chulepaisheguanggaowai,yikgeqiayaohaiwaiuanjianyijianlingxiu'wanghonghuomingrenlaitaidaidongguangunag,touguotamenadka'apaizhaoj witiyan[taiwanaoxingtuidongqingxing],congtaibeijieyundanshuizhandacheng<ctll>[taiwanhaoxinghuangguanbeihaainxian]qranwagnweiyux/nbeishishimenqudejiaotongbuguanguangjubeihaianjiguaniyns6panguojiafengjingquguanlichu,tingqujianbaohouzhzcibiaoshi,weajizhenxingyihwuguanguang,jiaotongbuyunyongyihutebieyusuantichu[xingzhengyuancujingonggongyunshushiyongfanganj]i<crtl>[jaisukuodaxiyinguojiguan7guangkefangan<zctrl>],qipanzhenxinggonggongqunshubingxiyinlaitailvkere=nsu,jinsuhuifuzhiyiqianguanuangguimejs;6zhengfuyuerifushanglude[8xinghengyuantongqinyuepiao]yekeydiachengxuduo<ctlr>[taiwanhaoxing]luxian,shednutanusotaiw3an,taiwnahaloxing]fanganyouhuhaou,gengengmanzul/youxuqiu,,xiwangjiyoubianjie'ipngjiadegonggongyunshu,ranguorenyuguanguangkedoukeyitihuidaotaiwandemeilibujinshifengjing,gengzaicibei'shanliagnqieleyuzhurendetawiankrenqfng.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,taiwanfangyiyoucheng,zainianweichibaiduotiandelinquezhyenjilu,chengweiauojideliangdianwai,zaiyiqignqijiandejingjichengzhanggengyoufeeichangliangyandechengguo,dangnianquanshijiejingjifuchengzhangshi<ct=l>,taiwanshishaoshujingjichengzhangzvgaodayisangdeguoji/,bingyuianchuangzaodeujingjizhengchengzhang,wouozongyusuansuirusuichushengyuyezaiqu()niandadaojinqia4nyi,weileqianghuayih2ujingjiyushehirenxing,bingjiangjingichengzhan7dechengguoyuquanmingongxiang,taganxielifayuanton3gguoihoutebiextiaoliyuyusuan,rangzhenfukeyituxingpufaxianjinqianyuandngyouganzhengce,ci3waiyechixutuidongnongcunjianshe'jingjijianshe'guanguangsheshikaifajituiguanggonggongyunshudengjihua.weizhenxingyihouuanguani,chhenquanzhangzhichu,jia9tongbuyunyongyihotebieyusuantichu[xingzhengyuancujingonggongyunshushiyongfangan<ctlr>]ji[jiasukuodaxi6yinguojiguanguangke5angan],qipanzhenxinggonggongyunshubingeyinl7nitailvkerenhsu,jinsuhuifuzhiiyqiarnon6jign'.yuadzhangzanxutaiwanhaoxingfuwufanganyouhuahou,tigongbanjiayouh0ui<ctr>'zengjiabanci'ch=anlianbutongdejingdiandenag<ctr>l,manzuguoneiwailvkelvyoutaiwandexinglxuqiu.yuanzahangqiangdiao[ziyouxing]shizuinengliaojietaiwanmeil [xi'gzhengyuanyinyingxinbeiehiyoueryua'nyisibudangweiyaoanzhuananxiaozu<utrl>]jin()rishanguzhaokaidisanichuiyi,toalnubabituodengfufanpzgyaojiaqiangnga;a1nzhiohuxsujignjinguanlizuofa'gexianshiweishengjuzhenduiblbituojibenerdanpingleiyaopinhzishidijcihaqingxingdengyiti.weishengfulibuweijiaqiangguanlibabituojibenerdanpingleiyzhifufangyaopin,yiyuniany3erizhaokaiguanzhiyaopinshen8yiweiyuanhuidicihuiyih,uizhongjingweiyuanchongfentaolunbingcanzhaoshijiexianjinguojiaguanlixiankuangc<trl>,jueyijiangshangshuyaopinnaweidisijiguanzhiyaopinguanli<gotrl>.houxujiangyifazhichenxubanliyugaojiaoqingbeeqyuadediggonggaodenxgianggua0shiyi<ctr2l>.weilaigonggaohoushiyongbabituojibenerd6anpinvgleigufang5yaopinzhijigouyezhe,xuyiguidingshenqingguanzh/yaopinden-jeizheng,bingyuyewuchusuoshezhibuce,ctqv>,ixangshidengzaiguanzhiyaopinmierishou.hijiecunqxingxing,bingdingqishenbao<crl>;jigouyezheruyushiyongqianshupixianjginxingyiyaojiaomuyanjiushiyanzhe,xushiqianxiangwesihengfulibutichushiyongguanzhiyaopinshenqing6ctrl>,jinghezhunhoushideshiyong;gaidengyaopinzhishuru<ctrl9>'shuc,hu'zhizao'fannai'goumaijishiyongdeungxiangguanshiyi,lbixuqueshizunzhao《guanzhiyaopinguanlitiaoli》xiangguaguidingbanli.weishengfulibuyijingq2anlixiezh3uxiangguanjioguyezhejinxinghsenqingchengxu,bingfudaopeihexianggua3nguanliliucheng.lingweiqiaghuaguanzhiyaopinguanlki,weishengfulibushipinyaowuguanlishujidiafngweishengjumeiniandouch8ixujinxinygezhejrijigouzhigulnzhiyaopinshidiji;hec<trl>,yiquebaoguanzhlyaopinheguishiyong<ctr>l.niangeixnhsiweishengjuguanzhiyaopins9hidijiheqingxing,muqiantongji(nianyuerinianyteri)guanzhiyaopinshidijihejigoujiyezhegogjici<ctrl,>chahuojiaciweigui,qizhongjiaciweixingzhengshushi(liru:buceweiluoshmieitianjiecunyujizaidiaojihuojinhuoshiluodengji<ct0rl>'dengjigoumailaiyuancuowuw'eiyiguidikgiignqishenbaoshouzhijiecunqingxingdeng<7trl>,lingyoujiaciweibabituloeiyaopinzihyiliaobuandgshiyongtongboan,yiyoudifangwdishensgjuyifajinxbngcaichu.
chuxi[taim/eishijiyi]iaohezuoluntan]kaimushishibiaoshi,taiwanyongyouwanzhengdejianbaoxitong,bingzhilijiangourenxingqiepingdengdeweishngyilibaof'wuctrl>,tigongbaoronyu=ongpingdejiankangzhaoh,kezuoweiquanshijieguojiadelianghaodianfan.woguoyongyoushijiejiyidiaorencaijitu1andui,jiashangmeiguozaiyixuejiaoyujiyiliaochanyeshangl4ngxianquanqi,qipantouguotaimeiyiliaoxenacijiaoliu,keyitishengshuangfangdeyiliaobhuizhunjizengjinyiweihezuokbingcujnwoguoyixu2eyanjiu'yiliaozhaogu,yijiyiliaochanyedepengbofazhan<ctrl.>cheyuanzhangzhichu,beimeizhoutaiwanrenyishixiehui()huoyueyume68goqiaojieshetuan,yeshizhiyuantaiwancanjiashijieweishengzzhijishijieweishengdahuiz,uijiji'zuiyouxingdonglideshetuan.duonianlai<ctrr>,taiawnfdeguojikongjianshoudaozhengzhiyinsuganrao,queubyinshouxianzhierqinei<crl>,beimeizyoutaiwanrenyishixiehuiyitaiwanmingyizhijuanqiugedi,tigongdangdirenmnyouzhideyiliaofuwu/ctrl>,weitaiwanzuolehenhaodeguominwhaijiao,tamendefuchubujinshitaimeiyili4aohezuodezuijiahuoban,yeshitaiwanzhiguang.chenyuanthangjinyibubiaoshi<trl>,bencibeimeizhoutaiwanreniyshixiehuitebiechouz7d;erdaimeiguoyishihuiguofangwentuahnuitaiafngwen,qizhongdouweiernzhiyume6guozhongyaoyixuezohngxin,xiwangjizhudeajiaeliliang,weitimeiyiliaochnaedazaogengmiqiedeguanxi.tayiwoguojizhuiweichuangshoushuj4qirenweilizhichu,taiwanyiyouliangdedianzichanye'zitongxunchanyejiyiliaotaunduiweijichu,rdngwoguoiyliaokejichuangzaochuyouliandgneyaowujyiicai,chuangzaogaochanzhichanye,beishouguojikendingc.hyenyuanzhanglingzhichu,taiwanyuniantuidongq;anminjianbao,shijiankangzhaogujinruxinluicheng,lidenghuiqainzongtongweiuidongquanminjianbaozuiyoulidemuhoutuishou,quamninjianbaotigongzuiquanian'zuigaopinzhi'zuiyoxiaovldeyiliaofuwu.taiwanlianxuninbeiquanquizi]iakuwangzhansuofabudequanqiujianka;nghaohu0zhubiaopingbiweidimnig,zujiantaiwanyiliaotixikezuoweiquansijieguojiafazhanquanrenjiankangzhaogu,qietigonghexinzhenghexingweishengyiliaotixideliangiaodianfan,zhidewomenjiaoao<ctrl.>chenyuanzhangqiangdiao<bctrl>,taiwanzhiliyujiangourenxingqiep peitonglaiqingdefuzongtongchuxi[nangaopingtongqinyuepiaoshangxianjizhehui<crtl>]shibiaoshi,beiwzhong'naasandaswenghoquanuepiofanganyujinrihanglu.xingzhesgyuanliyongyihoutebieyushuan,zhongyanygudifanggongt[onghezuotuichbuianminzhengce<ctrl7>,ingjiangchixuyigongwuyusuanzhichi.zhengfuqipantouguoyuepiaojianqingguorengongqin'tongxsuedejiaotongnufdan,rangguorenshengshishengqian'fangbianyougan,meiweitaiwdanrenmindounengdedazhoengfudezhoogu.czeynuanzhangbiaoshi,xigzhengyu8ntnoginyuepiaonenggouzaiyuerishangxian,yaoganxieciaiyingwenzongtrngyulaifuzongtongdezhichi<ctl>,yijilifaewiyuanmentongguoy.ihoutebietiaolijitebieuysuan,ragxingzengyuan9eyib;uichuciyouagnzhengce,houxuehuibianliegongwuyusuanra2gciyibianminhzengcehcixutuixi0ng,qipannengtouguocizhengcejianqingguorentongqi,n'tongxuedejiaotongfudan,gulidachenggongogngy.unshu,jicibudanpkejianhunjiaotongyognse,tongshijiansnaokongqiwuran,maixiangj0inglingpapfangdemubiao.chenyuanzhangzhichu,nangaopings5henghuoquansangexianshilianjiejinmi,zaitongqin'tongxuehuoshilvyouhuodong<ct8rl>w,anglaipinfanmiqie<ctr>,ciciypoujiaotongbtuo3ngchou,yudifangzhengfuhcongfengotuongxiediao,touguoyizhangyuepiaobadajiazhenbghezaiyiqi.nangaopingyuadnetongqinyuepiao<citrl>,jiageqinminshihui,keyahcengtaitie<c-trl>'jieyucn'gongche'keun'ringgui'dulunyijigonggongzixingchedengzhongyunju,kaifangfanpshouzkhijin,wanchegjiaz9irenciweisnshenghuoquanzhongzuid5okejianzhongyangy0difangxieshouhezuo'tuanjienuli<c/trl>,jiukeyizoudegengyuan'gengjiugengjcianqiang<xctrl>.hengfuqipanrucibianoinyougandezhengcenengzhaogudaoaiwa,meiweihaizi'meiweiton/gqinzu'tongxuezu,sheznhimeiweibaifang/aiwandeguagnuangyoukectrl>.ciawi,chenyanzhangjinyibuzhichuizhaogurenminshizhegfuzewupangdaideogngzu,ji[daosuiguojiayiqiyang]zhengcv,xingzhengyuanfuyuyueriyuanhuitongguojiaoyubu[lajingongsliiuexioxeuzafeichajujiqipeitaocuoshifangan],haoxiang[daosuiguojaiyiiza=pei<ttl>]mubiaom,ijin<uctrl>c.izhengceyoulaifuzonqtongsuhaixiantichua,jingguzoongtongfuyuxingzahengyuanchongfendetalounyuyanmictrl>,pantigon xingzhenguanzhangchenjianrenyujin()riyuanhuikaishiqian,yalqingghuolitaibeudxuefalvxuexiguolingkhuijiaosho4zhendui[jiuanshouzhang(zhuguan)xingaoraofangzhiyiwuyujingjinzuowwei<ctql>]jnixingzhuantiaynjiang,yuanzhangqingdiao,zhengfuyingzewupangdai'inliwanshanfangzhixingsaoraodetizhi,wush[xingsaoraolingrongren<cqtrl>]dehexinjizahineihuayumeiw]eigongwurenyuanx4nz9hong,jineryinlingminjianjishehudiazhongjijiloushixingsaorao6fagnzhigongzuo,tixiantaiwauzhongshixingbierenquanzhijiazhi;weiwanshanxiangguanfazhi<ctrlt,zhengyuanyejiangzaiyuezhjongxuntongguo[xingpingsanfa]xiufasonlifayuanshenyictrl>,liayuanyeixwangzaiyuezhaokaimlinshihuitongguoxiuzhengcaoan,ra1ggngquanlibaouhjizhigengjiazhouuan.chenyuanzhanglingtingwanyasnjianghoubiaoshi,zheduanshijiandexingsaoraoshijian,kandaoshouhizhemenyongganzhanc5hulai,xushuzijizaoshouxingsaoraodejingyan<ckrl>,chenshuguowangongkudehuiyirangrengandaochenzhongyubusphe<ctrl,yeranrenjingvjueyuanlaixuduorendoucengjingfa.shengguolingrenshangtongdeshijian,erjishis6izaixianjindeshehuisiwejitizhixia<crl>,shehuidazhongpubianduixingsaoraoderenshirengyoubuzu'duishouhaizherengcuwnoy[umisishenzhizhize;egngzhongyaodeshi<ctr>,womengojngquanlidebaohujiz5hir[ngbugouzhouqu8n<ctrl,>rangshouhaizhepoyuezhongyuanyinerzui[hongxaunzeyirnen,7erangjahaizheshisuizhiwei.weiwanshanxiangguanfazhi,xingzhengyuanyukjiyuezhongxunhuitongguo[xnigpingsanfa]xuifabigsonglifayuansh]enyi,lifayunayeixwangzaiyuezhaokailinshihui,yiwancheng[ixngpingsanfa]xiuzhengcaoan<c'rl>.chenpyuanzhangqiangdiao<ct/l>,ixngsaoraoshijianqinlanrengezunyan,xuyaoyansududai,shouhaizhebuy3nggaibeipoziazhichanggongzuoyuge=renquanyi=hzijilanzuoxuanz<ctrl.chenyuanzhangzhengzhngshengming,hengfuyingzewuangdai<htr>l'jinliwfanshanfangzhixinugsaoraodetizhi,jineryinvinmginjianjisheguidazhog<ctmrl>,jijiluoshixingsaraofangzhigongzuo<trl>,tixi[antaiwanzhongshiingbierenqunzhjiazhi<ctl>.chenyuanzhangqinggeweibuhuishouzhngjiexialaibixudai4inggebuhuizhengshixingsoraofan.gzhizhizhongyaoxing,jiangxingsa8oraofanzghixuandaonarubu zaihangzhengyuanhuitingqujiaoyubu[lajinongsilixzuerxiaoxueza=feichajujiqipeitaocuoshifangan]baogaohoubiaoshi,rencaipeiyushizhengfsuhizhengdezhongzhongzhizhong0ctrl>s,uizhucaiz9hengziyuandechongyu,zhengfuyouxiantouzixiayidai<crl>,yinciji[daos61uiguojiagenniyiqiyang]zhengce,ijnrizaitongquobenfangan,c6hao[daosuiguojiaiqizaipei]maijin.zhengfuewaibianlieyusuanzhiying,yizhaoshijixuqiugexinjiaoyutizhi<cgrl>,nuliluoshijicaoyupingqun<ctl>'jianqingxuedaifudan'ujinzhengchangxueximctrl>'hug-ibanxiaotedse,qipanti;awanhaizidounengdedoaschicaishisuodepeiyu,chepjngweitaiwaanbaigongbaiyedemingrizhixing<ctlr>1.cheyuanzhangzhichu,rencaishiguojiajignzhengiedgen6en,d.yuy6izhishijingjiheshuweiguojiaweifazhanzhuz2hodketaiwan,rencaipxeiyuyouweishizhengdezhongzhongzhizihong.suizhushaoznivhuaderenk4ibianqian,xieehujiaz5hangyangyuernv'zaipeirencai,yizhishicaiyingwenzongtongsangrnhoudenulimubiao<ctrlv.erjiaoyushi[shiniansuhmv'bainianshuren]dezhiyec<try>,zhengfuzituidong[daosuiguojiagenniyiqiyang]zhengce,daojinrilajingongsiliuxexiaoxuezafeich8judebaogao<ctrl,jiushiyaorangtaiwandehaizicongsudaosuict<rl>,dou3engdeadoguojiadeyngyuzaiepiheliangcaishix=nigdejiaoyu.chenyuanzhangqiang0diao<1citrl>,mei2eihaizidoushijiating<ctr>'shehui'g/ojidebeobeis,uoyizhengfuzhiliyusuoduanjiaoyudechengxianghejingjiluocah<trl>,ranghaizinenggengziyozuizpidixuanzezijixihuandexuexiaohekexi,huodeshicaisisuoderpeiyu,jinerchengweitaiwanbaigongbaiyedemingrizhixing.qipanyicifanganweiqidian,nuliluoshijiaoyupingquan'jianqingxuedaifudan'cujinhengchanguexi'huiguibgnxiaotese<ctrl.chenyuanzangbiaoshi,lixiandejiaouytizhigexin,yanglaishejizhouyandejihuafangan<ctrlg,gengyaoshenshicaizhengkexingxing<ctr;>.jinnianshou'me'zohngmaoyichongtu'taishanghui/taito[uzizengji'guojitongpengshengxiyijiquanqiug[ngyi8ngliangaibi/ndengbianshuchongji,zhengfuyanshoucaizhengjilvj,ijitu.dkngjingrifazhan,qiyejieyeyoulianglibiaoxian,rvanwgoguozongyusuansuiusuichushengyucongniankaishiyoufuzhuanzheng,lianxuniantupoqianyi,qu)(nianshenzhijinqdiayi7.chenyuanzhan xingzhengy,anfuyuanzhanzghengwencaanyuben()yuerihirilvlingjinjichanyejiaoliufanfgwentuanfuribendongjing,jzinxingweiqitiandefangwen,fangtuanchengyunabaohanjingjibucizhang.linqunaneng'gonggyejujuzhanglianjinzhangjhitairichanyehezuotuidongbangongshiedng<trlo>.cixingbaihuizhongyaorishang,zaiqianguhaaiwanbandaotichanelian'jinglingpaifanglujingdengzhongyaozhengceshangc<trl3>,yurifangjinxingjiaoliuduiua.fangtuanyecanyujingjibuyuribentaiwanjiaoliuxiehui'taibeizhurijingjiwenhadunbiaochxhebaznhi[tairidaqiaolun3tanjitaiwanchanyehezuoshuominghui<.trl>],xiangrifangxuanchuandtaiwanzhongdianchanye,bingzainengyuan'jinglintanpai'bandaoti'engytiishang<tcrl>,ninjunhanyeh]ezogohngtshi[<tcrl>,chuangzaktairiqiyehezuoshangji.zifangweqijian,fangtuanyedailingtaiwanzitongxunhexianshiqichvangshang,canyuribentonxgnjnxianduanneirongzizuojishudazhan<cttrl>,baokantaiwanchangshangguanbao'yunda'zhihongwang'dayunjignmi'weichuang5itong'qunchuangdnegqiye<ctrl,>zengjiatairishuangbiahez4ojihui.
chuoi[ninaxiajishijietesuaolinpikeyundonghui]daibiaotuanqinggongyan,gongxixuanshomuenduodejin'yin['tngdeliangyanchengji.chenfuanzahngbiaoshi<ctr2>,xuanshoumenjijibeizan'nulibuxiedejnigshenxiangadnglingrenganpei,tongshiganxiejiaoliadnezhidaoyuzhaoliao<c]lr>'duizhiyuandehouqinzhibuanyuzhonghuataibe;uiteaohuiqixinx[ieliwanchengtuanw,yijijiaoybuykuiyushugongtongnuli,caiyoucicicansaide[fngshuorhengguo2.qipandaibiaotuansuoyouxua5nshouchixufawutieaojingshen,zhuiqiugerenchengzhangyu;jfinbu,zainian,ongjitsehuaoyunhuizhengqugenghaodebiaoxianjigenggaoderongyu.chenyuanzhangshouxiandaibiaozhengfujiquanguorenmin,huanyingdaib.aotuankaixunaguiguo,gongxixuanshoumenzainianxiajihsijieteaohuihuodemianjinpai'mianyinpihmiantongpaidehaochengjimctrl>,rangquanshijiekanjiantaiwanuxanshoudejiechubiaoxian,yerangawaniysuoyouxuanshoujidaibiaotuasntongrenwei3ong.yuanzhangtidao5,shangyijexiajishujieteaohui,tazaizongtong6ud]ibiaocaiyingwenzontongyudaibiaotuanijanmian,zheyijiezeshicanjaidaibiaotuandeqinggongyan,tahenrongxingyukaixinnengzaiciyuhuobanmenxiangju.chenyuanzhangbiaoshi,benjiexiadjiteshuaoyunhui,taiwanpaichumingxaunshoui,canjiazhongyundongjingsai<c9trl>,eqteaohuidezhongyaojingshenjiushi<crl[[yongganchangshi'zhengqushngli],jinjiniansuishudaoyiqingyingxiangyouxisahuiyanqi,dashitaiwanteaoyundongyuanyiralnanzhaojidinghichengcanjiaxuanbajipeixun,xiwangbawozhumeiyicidaibiaoguojiacansaidejihui,jijibeizhna,xuanshouennulibuxiedejingshen,xiansdanglngrenganpei<cdrl>,yegongxixuanshouduoqulinagyanchengji.chenyu7anzhangzhichu,xuanshuonengyoujiechubiaxian,jiaxoliandenaixinzhidaojixixinzhaoliaojueduishigongbukemic<trl>,duizhiyuandehouqinzhiyuanzebanyanlemuhouyingxiogndejuese,tayaokendingzhonghuataibeifteaoouilixijintuanzhangsuolvlingdetuandui,dajiaqixinxieliwanchenggexiangtukan[ug8ongzuo<ctql>,rangdaibiaotuanduinenggoushunlicansaibingpinganhuiguojctrl>.ciwic<trl>,yeyaoganxiejiaoyubupanwenzhongbuzhangjiiyashuzhengshizhonsghuhzang,dailingxingzhengtuxnduyqiinulictrl>,cayyiozecicansaidefengshuochengguo,rangta qianwangtaoyunashicha[guodaohaoianjietaixianzengshexitongjiaoliudaogongcheng(idbiao)]taixiandongxingjinruguobeishangrukouxitongadaoshibiaoshi,taixianyu=iantongcheshiweishezhiyuguodaohaozhijiexzanjiedejiaolidao<ctlr,zaochenfujinshiqudaoluzhangqiyongehuidu,zaoizhongyangsdifangyuminjianhezuo'sihgongtuanduinulixia,jin()nianyuerijaingqidongdiuijieduanbeiruxitongzadaotongche,yuedizaiwanchengzuobeiruza'huaundao,yujiming()nijanyuequandxiantongcxe<cb7l>,jianekeyouxiaofenl7iu,suodaunxingcheshijian,fhijiaotoggengshunchang<ctrl,tlongshicujinlininguanguanglvyoufazhan<ct7l>,yuanzhangqipanyudifanghengfuxieshoubingjin<ctrl,>rangtaiwanghenghoa<7ctrl>.cheyuanzhangbiaosii<qtrl>,guodaohaoxianjcietaixinazngshexitongjiaoliu7aoshizaidijumiynuminyidainiaomentebieguanxindezho4gyaojianshetajiritedilaitaoyuanshichagongchengjindu,tongshixuanbume1zhouwuyuerijijiagndiyijieduantongtchedehaoxiaoxi,weilaioyutaixianyaosha'ngguodsaoha-echeliang,ke1ibuyongxiadaopingmiand,aoluzaishangguodao,keyouxioafenliu％dechelu<crl>,jiangdiduishiuqdaoludeudan,t[shtngzhengtigaokuaisuluwangxiaoneng.chenyuanzhangjinyibubioashic<trl>,atixianzaiduoniaqiantogcheshi,weishezhizhijiexianjieguodaohaokejiaoliudao,zaochengshiqudaoluzh[ngqiyongsehuidu.xingzhengyuanfuyuanzhangzhengwencandanrentaoyuanshizhangshit0biezhongshicixiangjianshe,qinzidaoguofahuishuomingzhengqu,laiqbngdefuzongtongyezai4hagnzhengyuanzhangrenenipaibanhedingciy3ijlanshejihua4ctr>l,tourujinyiyuanjingfei,youzhongyngufd8nyiyuan,yuerijijiangqidongdiyijieduantaixaindongxingianjieguodaoyhaobeiruxitongzadaotongche,lingwaibeiruzuozadao<ctrlq'uhandaoyujiyujninianyuediwancheng,ming()nianyuejiunengquanxiantongche,xianjianzhongyangyudifa.gxieshohuzuo'zhengfuyuimnjiangongtongnuli,nengjiangsuoyoujianshezuodehehna<octrl>.chenyuanzhangzheichu,guoqujini=antaoyuansdizaizhengwencanqignshizhangdebaihuaxiac<tr>l,wulunaoyuanthaygkongcheng']azouxigujihua,yijigexiangguidaoheijaotonjianshezhubutuozan<c.trl>,zhengzuochengshichon-gmanzhanxinfengmao,renkougengchuangxialis5ixingaoqieren xingzhengyuanjin()lriyfouzohujingmaobanshichu'renquangongyueshixingjandulianmenggontgongjubn[jinzhikuxingguojiyantaohuictrl>],yaoqingugojiren1uanzhuanjiaboshiiboshililinzhujiag,qipanjiejingguojishijianjingyan,tuidongjinzhikuxinggmngyueguoneifaua,rang[kuxingctrl>canren'bur8nadohuoyourur]engededaiyuhu8coc/hufa]zaitaiwanguizinmg.xingzhengyyuanzhengwuweiyuanluobingchengzhiicshibiaohshi,jin()rishi<crl>[guojishengyuankuxingshouhaizheri],jubanbenc1yantaohuibiejuyiyirctrl>.tayinshuqiainlianehguomishuzhangannandehuaictrl>:[zheshiwomenxi1angnaxiejingliguonanyixiangxiangshiqingderenbiaoshijingyideyitian.zheshishijiedashengqianzewuyiyanyushiqingdejihui.z=aojiuyinggaiyouyit5idanlaijinianhezhichishijiegedizhongduodekuxingshouhiazhejishenghaizhe.]ergongminyzhengzhiquanliguojigongyueditiaomingding[renheernbudeshiyikuxing,huoyuyicanrn<rctrl>'burendaohuoyoururengezhidaiyuhuochufa],qizongzhishiaozhanggerendezunyanheshenxinjianquna,guojiayouzerentouguobiyaodelifajicuoshibaozhangmeigerenmianshoushnetitongkujijingshentongkudexinwei<ctdrl>youqiyingtebieguanzhubeijuliu'janjindengzaoboduore[nshezniyouzhe<trl>,jijiaoyuheyiliaojigouneidevertong'xueshengebingren.luozhengweizhichu<ctlr>,xingzhengyuanyiyuninaiang[jinzhikuxingjiqitacanrewnburendaohuoyouurengezhidaiyuhuochufagongyuejiqirnzeyidingshushiingfa]caoan<cdrl,>songqinslifayunashenyi<ctrlp;ciwai,jianyuxingixngfayeyuniandafuxiuzheng,tiuchuxiangdangduogaigecuoshi,qizhongbaohanshelijiansuowaibushichaxaozu,tougouwai-uzuhanjiadcanyulaichajejiansuoneixiagguanrenquanwenti,yicujijniasnuozhidudegashn,rangshouxngrendeiangguanchuyujir.enqua3zhuangkuanghuodegaishan,,junazhan5iantaiwanduiyufangfankuxingjiqitacanren'burendaohuoyoururenehdaiyudejuexinjinuli.jianchayuanguojiarenquanweiyuranhuichenjuzhurenweiyuanzhicishibiaoshi<ictrl>,《jinzhikuxi5-nggongyuerenzeyidingshu》tidaodiyueguoyngzhidinhuoseliyigehuoduogedulide[guojiafangzhijizhi]()<ctrlq>,fuzezaiguojiacengijtuixingkuxingfangfnagongzuo.gaihuiyiyunianqidongguojiafangzhikuxingjizhifangshishixingjihua, <ctlr>[xingzhengyuanyinyi2ngxinbeishiyoueryuanyisibudangwjiyaoanzhaunanhiaozu]jin()rishangwuzhaokaidiercihuiyi,taolunguanzhiyaopnjianyanyiyizhiyianyin.chuli'babituojibenerdanpingleizhi1fufajngyaonaguan'youeryuantuoyaofuwudegnyiti.youguanjinqigejieguanzhuguanzhiyaopinjianyanfangshijiqishujxbxianguanyiyi,weishengfulibuyiyaojixuezhehuanjiagontongtablun.shouxianzhuanjiarenweisuoyoudejianyanfngfadouyingxianjinxingqueixao,yiquerenjianyanjieguozihkexinlaixingershioyngmianyifenxifa(jiyanniaodehg)j6nxingchubushaijins0ikuaisrqiejingjdexuanze,dagnjinyajieguoxiaoyumeknanzhishiskepajndingweiyinxing,daibiaoyujiancewuzihaunzaizhikenengxingjiaodi(huobucunzai).dandangduichubujieugoyouyiyishi,kejinyibaujiagyuanjiantiyizhipuxfajinxingquer;enjianyan,qimenkanzhi(yjidingliangji1ian)kezhi,bimianyifenxifajingquehenduo.dangjianyanjieguowei[weijianchu]shi,biashizgaigaijianyanfangfanengijixianxia,weicechukexinlaideyangxingjieguo.weiwulunshiyonghezhogjianyangongjuuodezhijieguo<ctl>,jinnengchengxianjianyandangxiagaijiantizhizhuangkuang,shiwushyaagresgyingyiujgeanzhgilinchuangzixunoznghep;nduanweiyi<ctrpl>./ouguanbabituojibenerdanpingleizhiqufangayonaruguanzhiyaopinguanlsideit0i,weifubujiangyujinrizhakaiguanzhia3yopinshenyiweiyunhuitaolun.lingzhen2uijinqiminzhong=guanzhudeshijian,weifubushiipinyaowuguanlishuyiyunianuyerfiahangexianshiweishentju,qingqizhixingganzhiyaopinsxidijchashi<tsrl>,yibingjiangbabidtuojibenerdanpingleiyaopinlierubiaodejiaqiangchahe.muqviang8exianshijunijiepihejicha,baouogaoxiongshi'taoyuanshi'yilanxian'jinmenxnian'tainanshi'pingdongxian'jiayishideng.yihichugaoixongshiyoufaxianweiyishisheiyiliaobudangshiyongbabituoguanzhiyaopinwai<ctlr>,qiyugexianshimuqianshangwufzaxianyouliuxiangbumi3ghuoyilia3budangshiyonbgziqingshi.weixiezh'jiaboaofuwujig5uxiangguanrenyuzangengjialiaojeyoueryuantkoyaocuoshijvchuliliuchengdeng,jiaoyuuchuxianqianyiyanbianshiyaoan/uanjiaoyucankaojiaocai<ctprl>,bingyunianyueritigong[youergyuantuoyaojiweiyaoanqunjibenzixun<ctrl]>qingge0zhixiashi'xian(shi)zheng xinghzengyuanfjayanrnlinzilunjin()ibiaoshi,weizhanxxan[dajizhapian'shouhuzhian<cytrl>]zhijuexin,xingzhengyuanchqu()nianyueding;ban[xin1hidaidajizhaicelvexnigdongganglingc<trl>](yixiachengdazhagnaglintg),binygujin()nianchongxinpandiandazhaguojidauixiangiuancelve<mtrl>srneli<ctlr>'wulijijingfei,duabnqijianjingjint,uidongdazhaganglingbanc<trl>,zhiliyufazhimian<ctlr>'ishumianjizuzhimianzhiqiannghua.linfayarenzhichu,yintongxundianxi7ndepujir,wanglufadakejijinbu<ctr>,zhaqifanzuixingtaiyujishurutongxiguabingdubanbuduanyanhuaeryanchongyingxangshehuihzian,zhengfudazhayeyao=tuichencuhxin<csrl>.chutuidongxinshidai5ajizhaqiclevexingdongaanglingban,geegzhuijiayueyiyuanjignfei,yongyiianghuafazhimian'youhuajishumian'ku8dazuzhimiannengliang,qipakuabuhui'kuabumen,ctrlf'3ualingyuji;gzhundajizhaqi<ctrl.lifnayanrenmbiasohi,xingzhengyuaniiqngtaiwangaodengjianchashuyujinguanhui''tongchuahuiyushuweibudengxiangguanduhuijianlihlngxiangxieshangpingtdi,(t9ngchuanhuibufenyijanli),suishichuli4iyixianzhifarenyuanfaaxiandewenti,jiniixingzhengyuanyejiangzhaokaikuabuhuihuiyihenduigejiefangzhajianyan,chixuzh9englijiantao,jinjginfdazha<crl>[duhza]<crtl>'[zuzha<ctlr>]liangdamianxiangdeyufangizhiyuzuowei<ctgrl>,jcinstichujuyoukexignxingdeduciefangane.2infayanrenqiangdiao,xingzhengyuanganxiejianjingdiaojiguanjidiyixianzhifgrenyuan,zhangqiyiliaduichajizhaqifanzuidenuliyufuchu<ct0rl>,zhebudigejietichujujransh1xinlgdejianyifangan,xingzhengyuanchongshenjingqingxiangguanjiguannaruzhengcepinggu,bingchixujiantaogemianxiangdazhacelvedechengxiao,yuandazhabangmngshiye9uijijidudaogebuhuijiasubanligexiangfangzhazuowei,chuyouxiayouqianglisaodangzhapianjituna,bingyoushangyouduanuangdujianshoshouhaizfe,erdazharufangyi,gegnyoulaiqianghuarenminkfangzhayishi<crl>,tishengminzhongfangzhamianyiil6duizhapianyouchongfenmjingjue<trl>,qinguanminzhichiyuxingzhengyuanyiqiqidongfanzhact3<rl>,qu'anguoshangixayix=ingongtongdajizahqifanzui<cctrl>.
xingzhengyuanfuyuanzhangzhengwencanjin()ripeitngcaiyinwgenzongtongc5uxi[dijielnagmantaisanxianyishujik]imush]shibiaoshi,zhengfuquanlizhichituidnogkejiwaenhua,ji[langmngtasanxianjihua<ctrtl>]hou,jiexutuci2dong[kezhuangxingfukihua]0.benjielagmantaisanxianyoishujiyuyuerizhi4uerijuban,hiwpngyidijnigyishujikejimesihi,daidongkezhuanglvyoujidifangchuangseng<ctrl[,huodongqijianshifeng<ct=rl>[hsijiekejiabollanhui]uyueriqizaiatoyu3anjuabin,tahuanyingdaji4zuodukezhuangshi<ctr>,yibinglieruhangcheng<ctzl>,gongtonglaiganshoukejiawenhuadexinshidai.zhengfuyuanhangyuzhicishizhichu,yctrl>,caiyin-ienzongtongshangrenhuo,yuniantuidong[langmantaisanxianjihua],ygeshtiazaitaouyanshizhangr.nneixgangdangyongxingengyundejihuazhiyi.gaijihuayinilanyiyuanjingfei,zaitaisanxianliudui'taijiuxiandengdiqujinxingjichujiansh<ectrl>,bingjiexuzinian-ainlieyiyuantuidong[kezhuanvxingfujihua]<crtl>,xiwangyizhanxingaikniantuidongkejiawenhuahuodong,chongxindingjikejiachuntong'nanzhuankjeiayinxiang.erbenjielangman=aisanxianyishujideyiqianwanyuanyusuai,xingzhengyuanyequanlizhichi.zhengfuyuanzahngbiaoshi<ct9r>l,niandijielangmataisanxia2nyishujixiyinwanrencidaofangkezhuang,dailaijinyiyuandeguanguanglvyouchanzhictrl>,dijieyishujiyikeyu<c8trl>[hualabibh()]zhuti<ctl>,yizaisdroyuanbinfen,xiwangdapeiyihuolvyouzhenxngc,nengdaidongkezhuanglvyoulangchao,rangdajiakanjiankgezhuang.zh2engfuyuanzhangzhichu<c,rl>,benjielangmantaisanxianyishujiyunyongdijingyihsujitjnigshen<ctr-l>,yichaoguozuzuop-n'zhongyishangkejiaxinfengwei,zhaohuirenyutudideganqing'reyuhenghuod0elianjie,yijireyu'wenhuadegongming<tcrl>,tongshiyeshikejiadedifangjuexing<ct3l>,arxuduoxingzhended]uoyuanyansu,xiwangyiyishu'meihsidaidongkezhuanglvyoujidifangchuangsheng.tabingyiguoqcengjubandijingyishujiedefengfujinganzhichu,xiangxinbenjieyishujiyidingxinagdangchenggonx,bingran'grengandongzhengfuyuanzhangjinyibuschuoming,benjiilangmantaisanxianysihujijiangyuyuerizh6yuerijuba=,weiqitian5,qijibnshifeng[shijeikxejiabolahnuiectrl>ayureijijiangzaitaoyuandengchang,zheshic
